11.content:
=====================
Nonaka Residence...
Summer...
=====================

It had been 6 years since the defeat of the D-Reaper, and about 5 1/2 years since the Digimon had returned to their partners. Rika and Renamon had spent their time getting closer and closer, practically becoming lovers through the time they spent together.

(At least, that's the rumor Kazu has been circulating. Even if it is partially true by this point.)

Today they had just woken up, both having slept together in Rika's bedmat, and were getting ready for a new day.

Renamon waited patiently as Rika got herself cleaned up and dressed, mediating by the door. Rika came out, clad in her usual ensemble of form-fitting jeans, sneakers, and blue heart t-shirt, a style made more glamorous by how she had filled out over the years.

She had definetly inherited her mother's figure, shooting up until she was a foot taller than Renamon's five feet. Her breasts were a D-cup, and her hips were pure curve. Her body was taught with muscle, a product of training alongside Renamon to become stronger. Her face remained as pretty as ever, growing slightly aqualine with age. Her hair was now hip-length, and she wore it in a long, braided ponytail that Renamon liked to bat around when no one was watching.

Even now she gave it a playful tap as Rika emerged. Rika gave the grinning fox a mildly amused, mildly disdainful look and motioned for her to come downstairs. Renamon nodded, and followed.

Like all the Tamers and their now, Rika and Renamon had a mental link, one that kept them in mind-to-mind contact with each other all the time, no matter the circumstances. The only way to break the link would be to kill one, which would in turn result in the death of the other. Few words were needed, as their thoughts intermingled with each other constantly.

So Renamon could feel instantly the anger and frustration Rika felt when her mother showed up with her 'breakfast.'

"My special little girl! Good morning! I've prepared your tofu and ricecakes, so eat up!" she said. Before Rika could say anything more, Rumiko Nodaka kissed her on the forehead and turned to leave.

"I wish I could spend time with you this morning, but I have to be at the airport for a photo shoot in Acapulco. I'll be back in a week, sweetie! Have fun! Renamon, take care of her!"

"As always, Ms. Nonaka," Renamon called out as Rumiko left the room.

Rika sighed, and ate her meager breakfast, Renamon going off to fix the both of them some REAL food.

After they had eaten, they walked over to the park, Renamon trotting along on all fours, frowning as Rika grumbled under her breath.

"Stupid Mom... I know she cares about me and all, and wants me to stay healthy, but this 'health food' garbage is almost as bad as when she tried to get me to be a model like her."

Renamon sighed, deciding to devil's advocate. "Rika, you are in the best shape you've been in years. She just doesn't want you to become overweight."

Rika snorted. "Sometimes I wish I could."

Renamon blinked. THAT certainly was unexpected. "Could what?"

Rika sighed, and said, "I wish I could become FAT! I wish I could become so fat that I'd be too huge to move!"

1111.content:
The Digital Field vanished, revealing in its place as massive, hulking Digimon. It was vaguely humanoid in appearance, with bladed insectile armor colored gold with black stripes. A massive stinger adorned the creature's abdomen, and a stern expression on his face. Held casually over his shoulder was a massive, insect-themed sword as big as Gallantmon, looking like it could cut MegaGargomon down in a single slash.

Rika gulped nervously, and Renamon took a step back, suddenly unsure of her ability to win.

Rika's D-Arc chose that moment to kick in, analyzing the Digimon.

---EmperorBeemon, the Insect Warlord Digimon. Mega Level. Attacks: Domination Sting, Beheading Sting. Sub-Group: Royal Knights. This evolution of JewelBeemon, while a powerful warrior who values battle greatly, is dedicated to his hive. He will try to find at least one queen to rule it alongside him, two being ideal, and fatten her up tremendously so that his hive will thrive.---

Rika, as she read the entry aloud, blinked. Renamon turned back at Rika and stared, confused.

Then EmperorBeemon noticed them.

"My QUEENS!" it bellowed in a thunderous voice.

Showing a startling amount of strength, EmperorBeemon swung his sword around as if it weighed no more than a piece of paper and slammed the tip down into the ground, creating a tremor powerful enough to knock both Rika and Renamon off their feet.

"My queens," EmperorBeemon said, "At last I have found thee. The visions hath told me of a human tamer and her Digimon, both warriors beyond compare, and at last I hath found thee!"

Rika giggled nervously. "Umm... Hi!"

Renamon frowned, still confused from the listing in EmperorBeemon's DigiDex entry. But she decided to be polite.

"Welcome to our world, EmperorBeemon. We hope that you do not wish us any harm," she said.

The massive Digimon shook his head. "Nay, my queens. E'en before innocent Calumon returned Digivolution to the world, I didst not partake in the war games of Zhuqiaomon's devas. My only concern was finding a queen. And I hath found two! Oh joyous day!" he said, laughing.

Rika frowned. "What do you mean by 'queens?'"

EmperorBeemon smiled. "I wouldst take thee back to live in my hive, set in the most beautiful forests of the Digital World. The only thing expected of thee wouldst be that thou eat constant and gain massive amounts of weight and fatness. For the life-giving honey that my people doth need to survive can only be provided when at least one fat queen is in the hive."

Renamon and Rika traded looks, and then Renamon asked. "How does that work, anyway? And if it's what you need to survive, why come looking for us now?"

EmperorBeemon sighed. "Alas, 'tis my own fault. I didst think that I could avoid having to draw two lovelies away from their life by using magic to sustain the life-giving honey. And it didst work for a time. But now the magic is wearing off, and I must find at least one queen quickly to sustain the flow of honey. As for how it works... I doth confess that I do not know for certain, miladies. But I do know that the fatter the queens become, the more honey is produced, the more healthy our lands become. I suspect magic be involved in the process."

EmperorBeemon gave them a pleading look. "Miladies, I doth humbly ask thee... Wilt thou be the queens of my hive and save my people?"

Rika frowned. She had wanted to gain weight, but this was a little much. "How certain are you that having the two of us get fat in your hive help your people?"

"As certain as the sun is bright, miladies," EmperorBeemon said, "When things started to become bad, I went to another hive run by another EmperorBeemon to barter for some of their honey. They gladly gave some without asking anything in return, for because their queens, a LadyDevimon and Angewomon, had gotten up to seven tons in weight apiece, and they had honey to spare."

Rika and Renamon went wide-eyed. "Seven tons? And they had no health problems?" Rika asked.

Renamon spoke up, then, "Actually, that's not surprising, Rika. The Digital World operates under different rules than the human world."

Rika looked thoughtful, considering. Renamon shrugged. She'd go with whatever Rika decided, being moderately curious about what being fat was like herself.

EmperorBeemon, seeing her indecision, said, "My ladies, you would be safe from all harm. Your every whim would be catered to, anything you wanted would be provided. Entertainment, games, pleasure, anything. All we ask is that you don't stop gaining weight."

Rika grinned softly. This was too sweet a deal to be passed up.

"Okay, I'm in. Renamon?"

The fox Digimon shook her head. She somehow knew that Rika would agree. Her frustration with her mother's forced diet and Rika's own bull-headed stubbornness practically guaranteed her acceptance of the offer.

But that was part of why Renamon loved her.

"I go where you go," Renamon said.

Rika smiled warmly, blushing. EmperorBeemon was delighted. He stood up and hefted his massive sword easily over his shoulder. "Excellent! We shall depart at once!"

"Hold it," Rika said, "I want to let my mother know where we're going. I may be doing this to defy her will, but I don't want her to worry too much."

EmperorBeemon gave her a pained expression, and then said...

Rika grinned and hugged her partner. “Besides, I’ve been having fantasies about fattening you up and using you as a soft, cushy bed,” the human girl said.

Candy Monzaemon led them through a grand set of doors into a massive room, one filled with elegant, opulent tables and, to Renamon's surprise, beds.

"Newest Residents of Gluttony Palace, welcome to the most important room in the castle. The dining room!" Candy Monzaemon said, gesturing grandly.

Candy Monzaemon chuckled. "Well, the beds in here are also have invisibility screens. I like to offer privacy to my guests as much as possible, so the gaps you see? They're cloaked guests. The barriers also block out unwanted sounds."

Renamon nodded, pleased by this.

Rika shook her head, chuckling at the ribbing. "Well," she said, licking her lips, "I'm starving. Let's start getting us fat!"

Candy Monzaemon gestured, guiding them to a seat at one of the opulent tables. He motioned towards the kitchen, and a pair of fast-moving drones came out, carting huge trays of food, a massive pizza, a huge meatloaf, a plate of twenty overstuffed burritos, and a massive steak. The drones set the pizza and burritos in front of Rika, and the meatloaf and steak in front of Renamon. Rika clapped her hands excitedly and began to devour a burrito. It was delicious, rich and heavily meat-laden, with thick vegetables and salsa. "Mmmm," she said, moaning at how delicious it was. "I'm gonna enjoy getting fat, I think."

Candy Monzaemon grinned. "Most people do, I've noticed," he said, calmly sipping a cup of honey.

Renamon for her part, started out small, taking a knife and fork and eating bites of her steak. But as she ate, the exquisite, smokey taste of the steak got to her. She took bigger and bigger bites, before dispensing with the knife and fork completely and ravenously gnawing at the steak, moaning at how delicious it was. Rika, having already stuffed herself with her third burrito, watched in amazement as Renamon gave in to gluttony. She giggled, and began eating faster to keep up with her. The two of them stuffed themselves, their bellies swelling out as they stuffed themselves. Their stomachs bulged out greatly as they polished off their meals and had another one brought out to them. Their bellies started to swell out, growing into their laps as entree after entree was devoured. Their stomachs worked to digest their meals as best they could, their limbs bulging out with fat, their breasts swelling out as they digested.

Finally, after five straight hours of stuffing themselves on the most delicious food in the history of EVER, they stopped, groaning and caressing their huge, heavy bellies, belching over and over.

"Man," Rika said, happily belching and caressing her overstuffed stomach and breasts. "I got huge..." Her butt had grown out as well, pulling down some her pants. Her belly now hung out a foot wide, her breasts having grown to DD cup size.

Renamon groaned, belching over and over. "Me too," she groaned, caressing her massive stomach. Her belly was bigger than Rika's, although her breasts were smaller, as she had been flat-chested before.

"Let's take a nap," Rika said, "Let all this digest into fat."

Renamon belched, groaning. "Fine with me," she moaned, barely able to think from how stuffed she was. Candy Monzaemon led them over to their beds, the two gluttonous girls drifting off to sleep fairly quickly. Candy Monzaemon smiles benevolently at them, and left them alone. And as they slept, they dreamed.

Rika and Renamon, fatter than whole galaxies, devoured all that lay before him, content to just be with each other, each of them a fat, gluttonous, all-consuming blob...

The dream aroused them both. Renamon was surprised by this.

They woke up yawning and stretching, looking at each other with mild amusement. They had become twice as big as they were when they had gone to sleep. Their limbs, their breasts, their bellies, all had become fatter, a second chin starting to form on them both. Rika giggled. "Looks like we bulked up while we slept," she said. Her clothes had burst off her body, leaving her naked. Candy Monzaemon had left a pair of extremely stretchy sweatpants and a tank top, which she gratefully put on. She didn't mind people seeing her fat, but she was hesitant about nudity.

Renamon was glad Rika was happy. And as she rubbed her massive belly, she realized that this wasn't all that bad a feeling. But she couldn't escape the nagging feeling that something else was going on, some scheme that would endanger them later...

111212.content:
"Now, let me show you to your private 'sweet'." Candy Monzemaon chuckled at his own pun as he lead Rika and Renamon through the gates and into the palace.

Rika and Renamon marveled at the beautiful decore inside the castle. All over there were beautiful statues and tapestries. Occasionally Rika and Renamon saw tall, waifish robed figures with metal hands and masks whisk by, carrying covered trays with them. "Who are those?" Rika asked, "Are they Digimon?"

Candy Monzeamon shook his head, "No, there just drones, I made them from loose packets of data with the help of the local digimones to help attend the other guests."

"What other guests?" Renamon asked, "I havent seen anyone here since we got in."

Candy Monzeamon laughed, "Each digimon and human, and in your case tamer/digimon pair, get their own private room where they can eat and grow without restriction. We do occasionally have mixers where the more mobile guests can meet with each other and chat. But most folks eventually become too fat or lazy to leave."

Rika nodded, as did Renamon, although she was starting to feel uneasy about this whole thing.

"Were here!" Candy Monzeamon said cheerily as she presented a large heavy looking door. On the door was engraved an outline of a young woman, and of a young digimon next to it.

"This emblem will change as you two put on weight, the bigger you get, the more it shows on your emblem." Candy Monzeamon explained as he opened the door, letting Rika and Renamon in.

Rika and Renamon gasped as they looked around the room; it was HUGE! the two couldnt even see the ceiling it was so massive. the walls were lined with book shelves and a huge televison. and half of the visible floor was taken up by a massive bed.

"How did you fit this room in here!?!" Rika asked, still shocked by the massiveness of the room.

"Simple distortion of space, we have great carpenters on hand. there's a bed, television, and all the reading material you can imagine. If you desire anything, simply call the drones and theyll bring it."

Renamon looked around, she could see several of the cloaked drones standing in the distance, waiting for a command.

"Looks like a system designed to promote laziness." The fox digimon commented.

Candy Monzeamon smirked, "Thats kinda the idea."

Rika walked across the room to the bed and climbed into it. She groaned in pleasure as she sank into it.

"oooh, this is comfortable. I could lay here forever." The tamer cooed.

Renamon walked over and sat on the bed, a shiver of pleasure going up her spine. Much as she hated to admit it, Rika was right about the bed.

"Well, its getting to be that time." Candy Monzeamon said, "I have to go check on some things. the drones have been pre programmed to start bringing you food in a few minutes. Ill check up on you later. Happy gaining!"

As Candy Monzeamon exited, Renamon stood up.

"Whats wrong Renamon?" Rika said, sitting up.

"I want to look around." Renamon said. "But I want you to come with me, I dont feel right leaving you alone in a strange place."

Rika thought about it, Candy Monzeamon didnt say they COULDNT look around, but she did want to get to gaining as soon as possible. Eventually, she decided...

Reluctantly, Rika had stood away from that heavenly feeling, the comfort was nice, and while she did want to get to gaining right away, it would be much better if her partner was satisfied as well, besides, exploring the castle could be fun!

As they left out the door, noting that the door's human and digimon emblems were shaped more like themselves, and also that they felt less comfortable, not uncomfortable, just... less.

The corridor seemed to stretch on endlessly either way, lined with several doors, some marked with emblems of various shapes and sizes.

"It's like a maze.." said Rika, and as if on cue, an electronic map sprung up beside them.

Examining the console, it seemed as though it did go on forver, oddly enough, theirs and several other corridors seemed to not be connected anywhere, even the entrance!

Finding it odd, Rika tapped one of the other corridors out of curiosity.

In a flash, Rika was gone, after Renamon cleared the spots from her eyes, she looked at the console for some answers, finding a large red dot placed where Rika tapped, moving slowly down the hall.

Using their technique to communicate with each other, they decided to explore on their own, if one of them gets in trouble they could call the other to use a console to reach the other.

Rika, taking another look at the map, noted two buildings in particular, the cafeteria and the lounge, maybe she could get a snack or find someone else who could tell her more.

Meanwhile Renamon was more interested in Candy Monzaemon's office, she might be able to sneak in, while she wants Rika to be happy, she also wants her to be safe.

Coming out from her hiding spot, Renamon sees the digimon that called her, a dark coloured skinny male Renamon holding a plate with a piece of chocolate cake.

asked as though he already knew the answer,

He walked over to Renamon, and held out the plate to her,

*grumble*
Renamon had not eaten anything that day, her stomach's protests finally getting through, bolstered by the presence of such a delicious treat.

Taking a tentative sniff, an intense aroma of sugar, chocolate, and strawberries washes over her senses, unable to resist any longer, Renamon takes several large bites, unable to control herself amidst the rich, sweet chocolate.

Licking the plate, desperately trying to catch any morsel she may have missed, a giggle brought her back to reality.

"Couldn't wait to start without me?" snickered Rika, seeing her normally mature and dignified partner do such a thing was just so cute!
"and here I thought you were against the idea!" exclaimed as Rika wiped a little chocolate off Renamon's chin.

"I... err.." stammered Renamon, a deep red blush mixing in with her cheek fur.

"anyways, lets get going, no sense staying out here when we have our own private sweet to use" said rika as she called over the console to teleport her back to their room.

Stalling for a moment, looking over to where the mysterious black renamon had been, Renamon follows after Rika.




A figure walks out from behind one of the pillars...
"...I'm so glad she liked it..."

==========================================

Back at the room, they run into Candy Monzeamon, pacing back and forth in front of their door looking worried.
Turning, he see's the pair return, a look of relief passing over his face,
"Oh, I'm so glad you two are okay!" yells Monzeamon as he scoops the two up in a monzeamon-sized bear hug,
"I forgot to tell you something important, when I realized I rushed back here, but you weren't here and I worried something happened!"

"Woah, woah, calm down!" Shouted Rika, being squeezed a bit too much,
"we're okay, but we won't be if you don't let go!"

Calming down a bit after releasing his grip, Candy Monzeamon explains the situation,
"what I forgot to tell you was that the corridors were meant for drone usage, teleporting directly into the guest's rooms had caused a few complaints about privacy, but the drones are simple-minded, they'll deliver or feed the food to the first living being they find on their route, if you got caught by an order by one of the more... experienced guests in such a small corridor, the situation could have been really bad!"

Escorting the two into their room, he explains further,
"There is a similar console placed in each of the guest's rooms as well, it's voice activated, you can use it to move you to almost anywhere inside of the palace, as well as to control your own room, from the softness and size of the bed to calling for more food to locking it out from the rest of the palace, just say 'help' followed by what you would like to know about and it will explain it further..."

Panting, exhausted from worrying and running around trying to find them, Candy Monzeamon excuses himself, heading to his office to rest, but not after explaining the "emergency" command...


Alone in their room once again, what do they plan to do now?...

The bed suddenly pulled backwards, sucking Renamon in and making her fall backwards, the impossibly soft and warm bed falling back at her weight, enveloping her and pressing into her sides, the feeling making her murr at the pleasure, losing all tension in her body, Renamon enters a state of pure bliss, losing all of her worries, just feeling wonderfully comfortable...

*whump!*

Startled, Renamon gathers herself, looking at the empty plate, table, and Rika, she wonders just how long she was "out", back sitting upright, with her legs and butt still enveloped in the bed's fluff, Renamon cringes, curling her toes at the pleasurable sensation, fighting back a moan, she returns to the panel, noticing a new icon having popped up in the corner with the picture of an envelope on it, clicking on it out of curiosity, a note pops up on the screen reading:

1112121221212.content:
The light following Renamon spreads, lighting the corridor fully and revealing Renamon to be surrounded on all sides by drones.

Renamon watched curiously, why were there drones here? Did she fall into a trap of some sort? Candy Monzaemon had plenty of opportunities to trap them already, why now?

Renamon watched intently as one of the drones in front of her slowly rolled towards her, stopping a few feet away, it was not carrying any food, but a small device on it's arm pointed up at Renamon...

Renamon eyes wide open with shock, is hit with a small blue beam from the device, falling backward onto a cushion another drone had silently brought out, feeling her body go limp as she feels all energy and resistance leave her body, unable to move to protest as the drones start bringing up the food and start stuffing her with the endless supply of food...

Embarassed at herself, her jaw slack, the drones manually chewing her food, drool pouring out onto her fur while not stuffed with food, Renamon remembers something she heard before...

"what I forgot to tell you was that the corridors were meant for drone usage, teleporting directly into the guest's rooms had caused a few complaints about privacy, but the drones are simple-minded, they'll deliver or feed the food to the first living being they find on their route, if you got caught by an order by one of the more... experienced guests in such a small corridor, the situation could have been really bad!"

whimpering, Renamon is powerless to stop the torrent of food entering her body, the weird sensations of her stomach filling up yet emptying just as quickly as her body digests the food at a rapid pace, turning it into soft fat, her body bulging out more and more, belly swelling softer and rounder and plusher, thighs pushing together, muscles losing definition becoming soft, cheeks bulging out with food and fat, breasts billowing out over her soft belly, butt and hips squishing out to the sides...

Renamon fights back a moan as a robotic arm presses into her belly, but as a series of robotic arms start massaging and kneading her swollen belly, breasts, and thighs, the pleasure becomes too much, growing softer and bigger, Renamon re-enters that blissful state as she develops her third chin, murring at the food subconsciously.

A few hours pass by as the feeding continues, until somebody shows up to try to rescue Renamon...

After what seemed like minuets to Renamon's mind, she awoke slowly as a fog lifted from her conciousness.
"Ohh, my head." Renamon said out loud, trying to rub her head, but somthing stopped it. That was when Renamon realised she was having difficulty getting anything to move properly and as swiftly as she used too. She was laying on her back, that's what she knew right now, but it felt like there was more "back" touching the ground than it realy should. Once her eyes finaly adjusted she let out a horrified scream that was only reserved for the worst of occasions.
"WHAT HAPPENED TO MY BODY!" Renamon screamed as she saw her body in a mirror possisioned on the ceiling.

Renamon was now a fat balloon of her former form, laying on her widened backside Renamon's white belly stretched upwards three feet while it stretched off her sides two feet each way, making Renamon four feet wider. IF that was the only thing effected, because not even her gigantic stomach could cover her even larger legs, her thighs were three feet in diameter, pushed her legs appart, and distorted the tattoo on her knees. Her butt was huge, each cheek was larger than the biggest of overstuffed beanbag chairs, making Renamon six feet wide and gave her a promonent pear shape. Her fire extinguisher like arms threatened to rip apart her gloves and stuck out of the sides a bit, while her breasts have plumped up conciderably, up to a size EE cup. Renamon even saw her once trim and sharp face now plump and developing a third chin.

"Well, it could be worse" came the voice of the black renamon as he approched her.
"WORSE!" Renamon yelled at him, shaking in anger, causing ripples in her fat body.
"Yes, worse" the black renamon replied, "you could be immoble." The black renamon then grabbed Renamon by the shoulders and helped her get back on her feet.

Once on her feet, Renamon tried to walk but was reduced to a very wide and slow waddle that caused her fat body to shift side to side. Her considrably wider back formed large rolls as Renamon's fat neck bunched up behind her head. Her entire body sagged a tiny bit because of the large amount of weight she piled on.

111212122121221.content:
Renamon is stunned into silence.

...Pretty?

"No. No, I don't think you understand. My purpose is destroyed! I...no... I've got to get back to Rika, this is bad..." Renamon barely manages to squeak out, sobbing periodically.

Despite the fact that she was only complimented, too much has happened too quickly for her. She has gone to this new, strange place. She has seen both Rika and herself transform, physically and mentally, in just a few days. Now, her body is ruined, and, thanks to this, she even has a suitor! Not only is this insulting to her pride, only being found beautiful after becoming huge, but she is inexperienced, never even really being close to anyone but Rika, and that is hardly romantic.

Hardly able to contain her sobs enough to move relatively smoothly, she walks backward into the shadows, moving instantly through the castle back to her room, leaving the black renamon standing alone in the hallway, rejected and vulnerable. However, he was not too weak. He pulls himself together quickly, just as Renamon herself once did so easily, and decided to bide his time. He could understand Renamon's pains, whether she knew it or not. He was, after all, a renamon as well. Proud, noble, and never without a purpose. He'd had his purpose stolen from him as well, and knew that Renamon would need all the support and aid she could get. However, he couldn't follow her through the shadows... He'd have to track her down again, when she next left. He would preserve, and he would not lose his purpose again.

Renamon stood outside her room,breathing deeply, calming herself. She didn't want Rika to see her this way, and she needed to regain control of herself. However, her concerns ran too deep for relaxation and rational thoughts to solve in any significant way. Oh, food sounded so wonderful... She wanted to just finish the job. She was already ruined. And the food is so good... Why fight, when the fight is lost lost already? She stood outside for a moment, and considored what was happening, one last time, rationally. She was going to have to rediscover a meaning, and she would do that by throwing her old one away altogether. She grinned at the prospect, to throw herself into a new way of thinking. She opened the door, and stepped through it into a new mindset, a new way of life.

Rika has fallen asleep in the time Renamon has been gone, resting like a big cat, curled up within a small mountain of small kegs, every one totally drained. Her stomach is round and smooth, filled tight with liquid. Renamon smiled at that, glad to see her tamer so happy, but more at the huge pile of food on her bed. on top was a small note from Rika.


Renamon;

I saved this food for you. I hope it's enough. And, well, you know, if it's not, just order some more, and it'll be here quick. Hope you get back soon! I miss you.

Rika


The note had small splotches scattered over it which must have been drips from Rika's drinks. Renamon made a small mewling noise at the kindness of the gesture, but realized that she would most definitely have to eat more. She knew that she was extremely hungry, and... Well, now that she thought about it, she liked that the black renamon liked her bigger. It had been confusing earlier, but she had since given up on understanding it, and so now it only made her feel warm and very hungry inside. It was time to eat.

She began at a relatively moderate pace. not wanting to overdo it right from the beginning. In fact, it took her two bites to eat a piece of cake, compared to one. She ate with one hand, exploring her newest folds of fat with her other paw, feeling it's mass, it's smooth, flowing texture, the way it rolled in some cases, bulged in others. It was all very fascinating now.

Feeling herself like this, however, was making it harder to keep her pace slow, so she decided to use both hands to eat now. Renamon appreciated Rika's choices of food to save; it primarily consisted of sweet, fatty foods and filling carbohydrates, often joined together in cakes, pastries, and sweet breads. She chomped them down with a certain amount of grace, her mouth and hands in perfect synchronization, her motions quick and efficient. She was really beginning to enjoy eating.

Soon she began to stop thinking hard, and just enjoy eating, the feelings floating away on a sea of food. Despite the fact that Rika had nearly covered Renamon's bed in food, it lasted her less than two hours, and it hardly dented her appetite. It must have been something in the food she'd been force fed, or maybe just that she'd been force fed, and now her stomach was stretched out even further, but it had the same result in the end. She only wanted to eat now, more and more. Now she would have to order more and more, as well.

"Hey, you listening, Candy Monzaemon?" she said quietly, to not wake Rika. "I want more food. Lots. As much as I got out there when the drones gang-fed me. A lot. and could you do it quietly? Rika's sleeping and I don't want to disturb her."

Whether Candy Monzaemon heard her or not Renamon might never know, but in a few seconds several drones hovered into the room, silent as ever, and began to feed Renamon slowly. Not willing to put up with any baby treatment, Renamon began to help stuff herself. They got the message quickly, and fed her fast enough for her satisfaction. She imagined the powerless, forcefully relaxed state she'd been in before, and laid back, reliving it. Although it had been shocking at the time, it now seemed almost the height of pleasure, being able to just give up all energy and eat. She couldn't think of much beyond that. Everything was the moment, eating.

They fed her constantly, more and more drones filing in to replace those with no food left. If Renamon had been paying attention, she would have realized that, with the numbers of drones entering the room, the line must have stretched far down the hallway, all for her. However, being fed like this exalted her more than any amount of attention or attendants.

Soon she began to notice her stomach swelling with food, her folds growing with fat, and she felt amazing. The feeling of growing was intense, pervasive, and now all that Renamon wanted. Soon, however, she began to feel drowsy, and had to stop. She wanted to enjoy the feeling of every bite, and asleep who knows how much she could miss. She had been eating for hours, and that was adequate. With a chuckle, Renamon corrected her thoughts. It wasn't adequate even. She could keep this up for days it seemed. And how surprised Rika would be, when Renamon could keep up the next time they ate...

1112122122.content:
Feeling woozy, Renamon decided to take a nap after her big meal. As she lay back to a peaceful slumber, much kicking and screaming could be heard coming from the huge mound as its unwilling occupant struggled to break free. About an hour later, however, the noise had subsided. Rika Nonaka had now ceased to be, having been digested by the now massive fox.

When Renamon woke up, the first thing she noticed was the fact that her globulous stomach had deflated slightly, but it was also softer. Indeed, the wily fox felt she was heavier for whatever reason. Curious, she pushed a button by her bed that summoned a singular drone.

"Get me a scale, please," she asked the drone when it rolled up. It soon left to run its errand, and it gave Renamon some time to think. She had been fit and fighting for practically her entire existence (things weren't made any easier when Rika managed to tame her). With her trainer now... indisposed, she felt like she no longer needed to be held to a higher standard. She resolved to just sit back and relax now that her duty was done... and if she managed to become massively obese while she was at it, then so be it.

The drone soon returned with the requisite scale, which was reinforced so as to prevent premature destruction due to massive weight. As Renamon stepped on the scale, the drone bent down to read the numbers.

"Ma'am," it said in its monotoned voice, "you now weigh approx. 524 lbs. Congratulations."

Renamon was shocked. She couldn't have gained that much weight in a short amount of time! As she got off the scale and the drone left, however, she soon figured that it was only natural for Rika's own bloated weight to be added to her own. She got back in bed, now somewhat disappointed that she didn't weigh more. Then the light bulb turned on in her head: she had resolved to be slothful and gluttonous, so why not start now? She pressed the button by her bed to summon the drone again.

"Drone," she commanded, "get me the most fattening foods you have here in this castle." The drone bowed and made to exit the room.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------

Option 1: The drones return with the requested food, and Renamon feasts. After a couple of weeks, she soon approaches 600 lbs, and shows no signs of stopping, but soon gets the urge to vore another fattened-up resident of the castle...

Option 2: The drones return, not with food, but a request to have Renamon see CandyMonzaemon. During the meeting, the bear accuses the fox of voring her partner, but the irritated Renamon just vores him instead. Now the lady of the castle, Renamon knows just what to do: starve the residents while she gets all of the food she wants!

Renamon couldn't believe it, but after a short rest, no more than two hours, she was ready to eat. Again. She'd never detected this gluttonous side of herself, yet here she was about to gorge herself yet again. She was beginning to understand how Rika felt, how she could throw all risk to the wind, and enjoy eating like this to the full. there was nothing real to worry about, only hunches. With that logic, Renamon could almost feel her guard slipping down. She had to balance Rika's carelessness, for her own protection, but this food...so good...and so fulfilling.

It seemed like the more they ate, the more restfully they napped, since they were only sleeping in bursts of a few hours, but they both felt more and more rested the longer they ate. Maybe it was succumbing to pure temptation that was helping them feel so elated, so perfectly content. Even their digestion seemed to be increasing, since now Renamon could easily hear Rika's stomach gurgling in hunger, rather than digestion, as they both strained to sit up, so eager they were to begin eating.

Within seconds of Rika's order, the drones hovered in silently, as laden with food as they had been before, except for the first. It only held a small envelope, which it offered to Rika. She ignored it for a moment, long enough to snatch a large snack from another drone, before she even took any real note of the envelope. Using one hand to chomp the cookie, the other to hold the envelope, she fumbled with the seal, lamely with one hand, and after some attempts, she opened it.

She read it for a moment, then her eyes widened, and a cookie covered grin split her soft face.

"Rika, what's it say? I don't want to be kept in..." Renamon then ate a piece of cake that would have been a whole meal before in only two bites, "...suspense."

Rika turned to Renamon, her smile not breaking, and shoved the letter into Renamon's soft fleshy folds.

"It's from Candy Monzaemon. Apparently, we're moving up, since I've decided to confirm as a permanent resident. A bigger, better room, a kitchen suite with a whole squad of drones to fetch anything we want practically instantly, and, he says, 'additional benefits'. Sounds good, huh?"

Renamon was a little confused and more than a little suspicious of the offer. What was the real benefit? They already got ll the food they wanted, in mere seconds, their room was capable of being huge no matter how big they grew, and...Well, she just couldn't help her suspicions.

"Rika, do we really need to move?" Renamon asked, hoping that she could use her own tamers logic to win. "I really like it here..and I just want to eat..."

Rika sighed, then turned to the drone. "Will you tell Candy Monzaemon that we'd like to see the room before we decide? Not to be rude, but we want to know if it's worth the move."

Renamon gaped. Rika was so rarely polite! and, even though she seemed blunt, that was the nicest Renamon had heard a request phrased by Rika, ever. She was changing so fast Renamon didn't know if she could keep up. All these changes were starting to get to her. And, how hungry she was! all those drones standing around, hardly lightened of their load in the minutes they'd been waiting. Renamon wanted to get started; Her loudly rumbling, tremendous stomach communicated that most effectively to Rika.

Rika waved the drone away to deliver the message, and the drones moved in with their platters of sweets, enticing Rika and Renamon into an orgy of eating, on a scale unrivaled. They downed whole cakes in minutes, ovenloads of cookies by the handful, and all other manner of pastries, confections, and appetizers with nearly preternatural swiftness, their luscious bellies visibly filling and swelling with the tremendous load of food disappearing into them. Between bites Renamon wondered exactly how the drones managed to keep up with them, bringing food until the limits of her food lust was met in full. However, while she gorged, the thought left her. They did it because...she wanted them to.

Both Rika and Renamon lost al sense of their surroundings while they were eating. Time, place, were nothing. They only felt their tremendous, empty midsections being filled with the most immeasurable pleasure, and they were in their heaven now. Slowly, they became believers in one thing, their stomachs, and whatever led to the greatest pleasure for their stomachs must be the best possible path. Even Renamon, especially tuned to her inner morality, did not detect this change, and in fact, embraced it willingly, somewhere deep and fundamental.

Soon, hours or days later neither of the girls knew, they finished, the drones filing out neatly, their strange, yet comforting hover floating from the room, leaving Rika and Renamon to stew. they had grown obviously with this feeding. Rika could no longer reach her belly button, over her chest and stomach, with the thick flab of her arms in the way.

Renamon's armbands were no more than scraps, buried under her flowing girth, her fur laying silkily against the overflowing softness of her body, her breasts, limbs, and belly having fully caught Rika's for all effects, and she could not even entertain a shadow of a doubt that this pleasure was what she lived for.

Renamon and Rika sat in their room, sinking down into the mellow folds of the bed, their pliable bodies matching each contour of the bed with sensuous perfection, they rested without worries, the occasional sigh escaping them as they felt some particularly satisfying bit of digestion, or found some new, more comfortable position in the plush mattress. Candy Monzeamon slowly wandered into the room to see how to pair were coming along.

"It seems you two didn't waste much time did you!" he said, noticing how large both of them had become already.

"Of course not, I could go on like this for days," Rika retorted, shifting her weight.

"Well, I think it may be time to move you to a new room, seeing as how you may outgrow your current one soon." Candy Monzeamon set down a large box in front of him, "I also brought you some clothes in case you wanted to explore some."

Renamon hefted herself up at the sight of the outfits, "I was thinking I could use some support now that my chest is...well...huge." She looked down and slightly lifted her large breast, letting it drop. With a sigh, she pushed herself off of the bed and waddled over to the box.

After a moments searching, she found a few things she thought would fit. Renamon grabbed a large pair of white panties and slowly began to put them on. She pulled them tight against her fat butt, ending just below her enlarged tail. Pausing a moment, she slapped her rear and noticed how much it caused her to jiggle.

"I really have put on a lot of weight..." Renamon grabbed the matching bra and attempted to attach it to her rather large bosom. With slight difficulty, she eventually snapped it on, and felt relief as her fat boobs were now lifted by the bra. Checking herself over, Renamon grabbed her ample belly, still feeling the effects of the previous gorging. She looked over to Rika, who had yet to move from her bed.

"Rika, come on, we should get you up for a bit." Renamon motioned to her with a flabby arm.

"I don't know Renamon, I'm bigger than you and it takes so much effort to even stand for me." She reinforced her point by attempting to lift her body, but only succeeding in sending waves through her fat body. "I think we should just stay here and eat some more."

Renamon glanced down at herself, her large breasts and fat stomach obscuring most of her view. She hadn't really wanted to go along with any of this, only for Rika's sake, and was worried she would just become an immobile blob within days. Renamon waddled over to Rika, her huge butt shaking side to side, trying to convince her again to move.

"Are you sure you wouldn't rather get up?" Renamon reached for her hand.

Rika hesitated for a moment, "Well...

"When you put it that way..." Rika said, thinking hard. "I guess I should get up and about."

Struggling to the edge of the bed, Rika stood slowly, taking her time to find her center of gravity.

"Whoo...this is a lot harder than you made it look, Renamon." Rika said as she finally managed to stand. As she felt how much her flab weighed down on her, she began to smile.

"Come over and grab some new clothes, Rika." Renamon stated simply as she waddled over to the box, Rika following close behind.

Rika pulled off the tattered strips of cloth that hung to her body, then reached into the box. Pulling out a large pair of shorts and an enormous tank top, she held them up to her flabby body, still smirking.

"Can't believe that I need such big clothes!" she muttered excitedly as she slipped the short shorts on, her body wobbling from standing on one leg. After managing that, she struggled to heave her enormous breasts into the tank top. The top, originally designed to be loose, was stretched tight, as were the shorts. Both articles looked like latex on her body, stretched taut as a snare drum.

"What was that, Rika?" Renamon asked as Rika finished pulling the shirt on.

"Nothing. Just talking to myself. Let's get going!"

11121222122211.content:
Rika began to lumber forward but it was harder. Bringing her leg up it felt like it came falling back to the floor with more weight on it, Rika managed 3 steps and a total of 2 and a half feet traveled before it felt like the impact was getting painful.

"Renamon, just how fat am I?" Rika asked, examining her body, as she shifted back and forth. Her arms drug against her rounded sides, the friction slowing her down and even getting harder as the pressure they fought to drag grew and pushed them further out. "I think I'm worn out already... it feels like this is getting harder..."

Renamon, several steps ahead of Rika, smirked and gave a smart-mouthed response without even turning around "I'd say you're 2 pounds from being a beached whale. Seriously though you might want to slow... down..." Renamon trailed off having turned to look at Rika. Rika looked back at her puzzled, Renamon's cocky smirk having dissolved into shock. "Rika... you're fatter!"

"What...?" Rika tilted her fat head to one side, the fat of her chin and neck spreading out under it until her rounded cheek could touch the mass of fat that used to be her neck.

"Rika! Hey Rika!" Renamon screamed.

"What?!" Rika cried getting scared. Several robots rushed into the room and surrounded Rika. A brown mesh harness lowered quickly from the ceiling and came to a rest behind Rika, still several feet above the floor. "Whats going on?!" Rika yelled, trying to back away but only pushing into the mesh. Three of the drones rose up while three more slid in just under them and towered before Rika, as a team the robots rushed Rika and shoved her into the mesh. Rika's massive body oozed into the loose fabric, swinging backwards about seven feet before reversing direction and slamming the drones clear across the room. As the drones slammed into the wall and broke, a great many more blitzed the room, surrounding Rika. Renamon waddled in behind her still screaming Rika's name. The army of drones grabbed the harness and brought it to a halt. Rika looked up at the 4 thick straps holding the four corners of the mesh and saw they attached to a digital reader. The display on the reader flashed to life and number began to add up on it quickly. 200, 300, 400 the numbers climbed until they slowed resting at 587.

"Hey! Hey Rika!" Renamon yelled through the crowded mess of drones.

"Renamon stop yelling and help me!" Rika called out to her "What are these drones doing?!"

The digital display flickered and two letters showed next to the read out which was slowly going up now at 596. Rika looked up straining to see the small letters, "lb", the abbreviated symbol for pounds?. The numbers by them was now up to 612 Rika tried to look back at her body but in her reclined state all she saw was her fat cheeks rising up into her sight and a mound of fat laden breasts beyond. Rika looked back up, now 650 pounds.

"Thats my weight?!" Rika shrieked "I'm getting fatter?? Renamon do something!!"

"Riiiiiika! Rika you lazy pig!" Renamon shot back.

Tears rolled down either side of Rika's fattened cheeks. "Renamon what are you saying?! Please just help me!" Rika started to sob, hurt at Renamon's taunts of her situation. The numbers still climbed 722 lb now. Rika tried to reopen her eyes but her vision was a fraction of what it had been moments before as the fat engulfing her face pushed her cheeks into her eyes and enclosed her sight, what little Rika could see was blurred by tears.

"Rika just get up!" Renamon spat, sounding annoyed.

Rika couldn't respond. The numbers hit the 800 mark and so did Rika's weight, her body was so engulfed with fat she could barely move a finger. In her smaller younger frame what would be immobility was shear surreal obesity, Rika's body was a mass of fat and her limbs were being consumed by it. Rika whimpered one last time looking up to the reader, 873 lb, Rika's sight slowled dimmed to darkness as her cheeks forced her eyes shut.

"Rika! I'm not kidding you lazy cow move it!" Renamon screamed and Rika's massive body shook violently as she felt a furry paw smack her shoulder.

"Ow!" Rika howled sitting up suddenly.

"I'm sorry Rika but you fell into one hell of a food coma. You fell asleep eating and even then you kept letting the drones feed you! I'm not sure how long they were at it to be honest, as long as your mouth kept accepting food they kept feeding you! If I hadn't ordered them to stop they might have fed you till you popped!" Renamon stamped her foot "Rika I don't like this place! You're going to end up as fat as a cow at this rate and everything about this place seemed designed only with the purpose of fattening you up forever!"

Rika was shocked to feel her body was a great deal smaller. In fact, aside from a swollen gut and a minor bit of softness all over Rika's weight was almost back to where she was when she got here. "You might be right..." Rika said poking her belly to see if it was real this time "I just dreamed we were here for several days and I was up to 500 pounds because of it, all you did was nag about this place, and get just as fat..."

"Thats because I am nagging you about this place!" Renamon said, decidedly miffed, "Although I doubt you could grow that fat that fast, I still don't like it here!"

Rika sat up. She wasn't overly plump yet but her gut was still stuffed and her clothes fully intact. Rika motioned to a drone over and two came to stand on either side of her. "I'd like one of you to bring me a snack and one of you to bring me some more information about this place. One of the drones zoomed off and returned a few moments later with 2 other drones. They each carried a large 10 gallon jugs of a light brown milkshake. The second drone had also taken off for the bookshelf and returned with a flat pad that had a screen on it. The drone handed it to Rika, who handed it to Renamon.

"Whats this?" Renamon asked

"I dunno," Rika responded "The information I asked for I guess," Rika accepted a hose from the drone in charge of her snack that led to the 3 jugs and began to suck on it, it was a rich chocolate syrup in a thick milk and cream with a hint of cinnamon and marshmallow fluff, the drink was so decadent Rika's cheeks curled back into a smile at first taste. The hearty drink was more meal than snack. Rika relaxed and flipped on the TV.

Renamon played with the pad finding it was like a small laptop but just a screen with touch pad capabilities. After thirty or so minuets of thumbing through the pages Renamon tossed it to the floor.

"What a bunch of trash," Renamon spat, "Candy Monzaemon must have written this. It practically makes the act of becoming a lazy slob sound heroic. Rika, we have to get out of here... Rika?"

Rika's eyes were dull and far off, she had tottaly zoned out watching TV and slurping on her treat.

"Rika!" Renamon yelled snaping Rika from her trance "This is insane, you're taking to this crazy digimon's lifestyle way to easily! I mean the only reason you made that stupid wish to be fat was to spite your mom! is this what you really want?! If we stay here we'll be balls of fat in no time!

"Um..." Rika hummed, still dazed, "I don't know..." Rika sucked on the tube some more and spoke between gulps. "My mom is so over bearing... *slurp* I want to do this to prove I can... *slurp* I don't know... *slurp* if I don't want to get so fat I can choose to stop can I? *slurp slurp* I'm sure sticking around a little longer won't be so bad, I'll give you a definite answer after I've gained 5 pounds... *slurp* you know just to show up my mom... *slurp*"

"You've gained 6 or 7 since we got here!" Renamon said, glaring at Rika

"Uhhh..." Rika moaned, trying to watch TV, "Fine, *slurp* when I've gained a total of 15 pounds *slurp* I'll make a choice. Happy? Can I watch TV now?" Rika took a long full sip of the milkshake

"Rika, I think we should investigate Candy Monzeamon. I just don't trust this place enough" Renamon said, sighing and shaking her own gut, upset to find she too had a pot belly started.

"Rika!" Renamon snapped giving Rika a light tap to the back of her head to snap her out of the trance again.

1112122212221121.content:
Rika's Glassy stare was lost in the TV as she guzzled her way through the first of the 3 jugs of milkshake. Rika's mind slowly turned off and her conscious thought slowed to nearly nothing as she zoned out watching the mind numbing junk that was daytime TV. The TV got both the real world and Digimon realm broadcasts and Rika had found a crazy digimon soap opera. Rika watched thoughtlessly as a small amount of the shake escaped her mouth and dribbled down her chin. For Rika the seconds flew by as if the world around her just faded out. Renamon however was suffering, she wanted badly to get out and find out what Candy Monzeamon was up to. Renamon slumped over the edge of her bed trying to keep her eyes off the TV, she was bored enough without that to make things worse. Renamon lay upside down with her head hanging off the edge of the bed and scanned the upside down room, the place had simple decorations but it still looked lavish with silky drapes hanging down giving the room a somewhat regal feel. Renamon looked at one of the many bookshelves and scoffed.

"probably more trash and lies" Renamon dismissed not impressed after what she had read in the info pad. "Rika are you done yet...?" Renamon whined bored but Rika gave no response

Renamon rolled from side to side groaning now and again getting anxious to get out of here, but after what seemed an eternity Renamon was about to die of bordem. Only 45 minuets had passed but Rika was still sucking away. Renamon laid on her pot belly and frowned, she was starting to get hungry but she was afraid to eat anything else. Suddenly Renamon heard a beeping noise coming from one of the drones, Renamon's eyes darted to see one of the drones zooming towards her. Renamon tried to get up but her legs were already getting thicker too and she had only managed to flip herself over and prop her arms up to support her self, the drone stopped at the edge of the bed in front of Renamon, the frightened Digimon wondered if she could kick the drone from her position without setting off some kind of alarm, she didn't want to expose Rika to danger in her current state. The drones apparently were programmed to track the eating pattern of residents to ensure they got more food as soon as they finished digesting the last to guarantee nonstop eating and laziness because the drone before Renamon suddenly shoved a pastry into her mouth. "He-*gruph*" Renamon tried to protest through the mouth full of food. The sweet frosting and cream melted onto her tongue and her tastebuds sang in delight. As Renamon savored the taste the drone began to come at her again with another pastry but Renamon saw it and began to move backwards to avoid it. However a pair of metal hands blocked her, behind Renamon a drone had appeared and placed warmed soothing hands on her shoulders and began to massage them. Renamon cooed as a day of stressing over this place melted away under the drone's skilled hands. Renamon's body relaxed and she leaned back into the drone. The first drone offered up the pastry again and Renamon gave in under the pleasure of the massage and opened her mouth.

Renamon fell into the same trance Rika was in and two hours passed as Renamon consumed more pastries than she could count. "Ugh, enough" Renamon ordered the drone offering up another pastry. The drone bowed and backed away as the second drone helped Renamon to the edge of the bed. Renamon rubbed her stuffed belly and looked towards Rika.

(( http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/7719/... ))

"Hooooooooooooooooooooo, yeah!" Rika exclaimed as she pulled the second hose of 3 out of her mouth. "That was soooo good!*hic* Renamon you gotta try this last jug this stuff is amazing!" Rika showed patting her sloshing gut. Rika was already softer her face seeming more rounded as her cheeks had become somewhat chubby. Rika's gut was a sight to see, having consumed 20 gallons of milkshake in nearly 3 hours it was huge. Of course it had digested as she drank she still had nearly 3 gallons sloshing in in her rounded gut that spilled in all directions. About the size a sack of potatoes or maybe the volume of 3 balloons filled with water her belly seemed unreal.

"No thanks I'll pass" Renamon frowned mad at herself for pigging out so much on the treats the drone had fed her. "Can we start exploring now please?!" Renamon whined

"Fiiiine" Rika moaned. Rika swung her legs over the side of the bed and slid to the floor. As her weight bared down on her legs Rika's knees buckled and she bent down half way to the floor trying to balance the weight "Whoooa, that feels so weird!" Rika marveled standing up and rubbing her gut. The smile Rika wore as she kneaded her belly in her hands made Renamon shudder in fear. She cared deeply for Rika, her partner may not have wanted to be fat for real but her devotion to getting back at her mother and how readily she was taking to this place Rika's fate was sealed if they remained here much longer, Renamon had to get some dirt on Candy Monzeamon so she could convince Rika to escape with her. Rika stood up straight and her gut hung down put of her tight shirt, Renamon looked at it as if it was only the tip of a vary large iceberg.

"Come on lets move" Renamon nodded and hefted herself off the bed with a small fatty grunt. "I want to find out what Candy Monzeamon is really up to"

Renamon and Rika made for the door, Rika's stride was awkward as she lumbered partly from side to side, her waddle wasn't from fat but rather the weight of the milkshake in her stomach as it sloshed back and forth. Renamon turned left as she exited the room and crept along feeling uneasy, suddenly Rika let out a shocking cry " Renamon...!"

"Renamon" gasped Rika pointing, "Look!"

A red tail could be see lashing out behind a corner. At Rika's startled exclaimation, the beast began to flee. In a hot pursuit, Renamon followed down the corridor with lightning speed.

Though the hallway wasn't all that far, Rika was panting to catch up, holding her large swollen belly in her hands.

"Sooo fat" she said, massaging her bloated mass, and finally, turning the corner, she found Renamon standing next to what appeared to be Guilmon. The lizard was quite fat, his belly spilling forth and his limbs bloated with a new fatness.

"Guilmon, what are you doing here" asked Renamon. Guilmon looked at Renamon confused as if in a daze.

"Must...escape..." He began panting, "Get out NOW"

"What are you talking about?" Asked Rika joining in.

"Don't eat the food" Began Guilmon. "Don't get fat"

But before he could go on, a pair of drones came from the darkness behind him, and began to pull him away. A third drone produced a piece of cake and began to bring it to Guilmon's mouth.

"No do...mmph!" Before Renamon or Rika could stop them, the drones began to stuff Guilmon. His eyes glazed over as he was fed, and he unconsciously began to massage his large belly, all the while he was pulled away. Renamon lunged as if to help him, but just as she did, a scream was emitted behind her.

"Renamon!" came Rika's voice. Turning around, Renamon saw Rika meeting a similiar fate, and as the first pastry hit her lips, Rika became a mindless drone.
