111212221222112121.content:
Rika recoiled from the metallic hand closing in on her as the cream puff was pushed into her mouth. Rika grappled with the next arm holding it at bay as the cream puff sank in and the sweet surgery taste settled in on her. Rika's world became fuzzy as she tried to focus...

"Where was she?"

"What's was going on?"

"Well she was in this great castle to gain weight for... What was it she was gaining for?"

"Well there was some reason she had to gain... Whatever the reason was could wait, more importantly why was she holding that robots arm?"

"It had a cannelloni in it's hand!"

"Why would she be pushing such a delicious thing away? If she let it go maybe it would let her eat it!"

Rika let go of the metal arm and the robot brought the calorie packed treat to her mouth. Rika greedily accepted the sweet and practically sucked it out of the drone's grip as she tried to take it. Rika reveled in the absolutely rich cheese, relaxing her body letting the drones take her where ever she wanted as long as they had more of these things for her. Rika's eyes became glassy as she was pulled back towards her room.

"Get off her you bastards!" Renamon screamed as she charged the cluster of drones swarming over Rika. Renamon lunged for a drone but fell short, she was heavier than she remembered and didn't get the distance she was expecting, the drones movement towards her room caused her landing zone to fall right at the feet of one of the drones. The robot turned to look down at her and brought a danish to her mouth. Renamon didn't intend to open her mouth but when she tried to look up at the drone to formaly protest she inadvertently used her jaw to prop her head back since she was laying on the floor, with her mouth slacked the drone had no problem shoving the pastry past her lips and before Renamon knew it her world was a haze, all she could remember was more drones showing up, and the only reason she remembered them was because they had more of these yummy things, otherwise they;d have been as unimportant as everything else seemed. Renamon was rolled onto her back and pulled behind Rika back to the room, both girls curling up to clutch their bellies and massage the soft flesh.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------

Candy Monzeamon hurried down the hall panting heavily in a panic. He had just received the report about the escaping Guilmon. He was panicking because much to his dismay the drones reported three targets neutralized. Candy Monzeamon rounded the corner and approached the door to Rika and Renamon's room, He stopped a drone about to head in with a large platter of pastries.

"Damn it you mindless drones" Candy Monzeamon snapped "They were just exploring not escaping! How do you mistake two girls in the hall for and escaping Guilmon?!" Candy Monzeamon tore back the drone's hood to reveal it's head. The drone had a large monitor centered where a face should be. "Now... did you give them the 'special' pastries?" Candy Monzeamon asked with a glare.

The drone stood silent as a message appeared on the screen "Affirmative"

"You mindless little...That Renamon is suspicious of this place! She'll be even more suspicious now that you've fed her those things, when she snaps out of it she'll wonder why she let herself get taken back to her room after seeing something so suspicious!" Candy Monzeamon paused looking at the drone "You did stop feeding them the pastries didn't you...?" He looked at the drone worried

The drone still stood like a statue as the information was displayed on it's screen "Affirmative, more conventional food was administered to the subjects after they were neutralized"

"M-more?!" Candy Monzeamon reeled "they just spent 3 hours being stuffed! How could you feed them more?! I created you drones to know when the child or digimon were full! Can't you tell they are stuffed already?!" He exploded fearful the drones may endanger Rika's or Renamon's life

"Negative" The drone replied on it's screen "The subjects showed more hunger separate from the artificial hunger the special pasties install, they are now full but the human female seemed able to consume 2.6 more trays worth and the digimon drank the remaining container of milkshake after being returned to their quarters."

"Are you serious?" Candy Monzeamon asked to stunned to realize the drones didn't have the capacity to be anything but serious "They've been eating non stop since they got here... These two just may be what I've been searching for..." Candy Monzeamon muttered peering into the room

"ooooh..." Rika moaned in delight rolling forward trying to sit up "That was so good, I feel stuffed...: Rika sighed still a little fuzzy. Rika rubbed her hands on her swollen midriff, despite the soft layer of flab it was visibly distended from the sweets packed inside, it looked like she had eaten a small watermelon whole. "What did I tell you Rena? That stuff is amazing isn't it?"

Renamon was on her back with the tube from the Chocolate milkshake jug in her mouth sucking in the last few drops. The drone removed the tube and backed away as a second drone lifted Renamon's back for her so she could face Rika. "Ugh..." Renamon groaned stuffed so full she was afraid food may spill out of her mouth when she spoke. "It was great yeah..." Renamon tentatively said, focus returning to her mind "What just happened? Weren't we in the hallway? I thought we saw something..." Renamon rubbed her head

Candy Monzeamon watched from the hallway almost jumping with joy at the sight of the two stuffed girls "Their perfect!" He squealed "I think we've found the Pretty Plump Princess foretold in the Chocolate tablets of Sugar Plum Mountain! The prophesy said they will lead us to the land of endless sweets!" Candy Monzeamon turned quickly back to the drone "Double the food intake of every other child and digimon in the castle! I want them all stuffed nonstop! We must prepare the Pretty Plump Princess's subjects to be as fat as possible when their powers awaken! And I want every drone not busy feeding to be searching both the digimon and human world for more possible subjects! Use the special pastries if you have to! My purpose in this life is to make everything prefect for the Princesses and I want them to have all the fattened subdued servants we can find! Now go!" Candy Monzeamon ordered

The Drone saluted Candy Monzeamon and sped away. Candy Monzeamon turned and entered the room.

"Renamon! Rika! How good to see you two, I came to apologize for what happened earlier" Candy Monzeamon beamed

"For what happened..." Renamon shook her head trying to remember "That's right!" She suddenly yelled pointing a finger at Candy Monzeamon. "That Guilmon was telling us to run then your drones took him away, and us!"

"Yes I apologize from the bottom of my heart for that" Candy Monzeamon grinned "Guilmon gets confused sometimes, ever since an accident a year ago his trainer tells us, He sufferers from wild moments of demensia that cause him to become paranoid or hallucinate. He's asked us to feed him those pastries when he gets like that, they contain drugs that calm him, and regardless of his mental state he finds it easier to accept them in the form of sweets, he should be calmer now, if you like I can call up his room on the TV and you can speak with him over the screen."

"No..." Renamon glared at Candy Monzeamon "I would like to see him for myself, in person"

"Wha?" Rika asked hurt "I'm so full... I don't want to go anywhere"

"That's fine" Candy Monzeamon told her motioning to a drone to bring a cart "You can watch on the screen, I'll take Renamon, is that ok?" Candy Monzeamon turned asking Renamon.

Renamon looked at Rika who was already scooting back to the pile of pillows on her bed and relaxing, She really didn't feel safe leaving Rika alone, but she couldn't give Candy Monzeamon a chance to fool them with a faked image or something, she had to see Guilmon for herself. "Yeah I guess..." Renamon said at last

A golf card pulled into the large room with a huge double sided sofa like seat pulled behind it on a second cart. Candy Monzeamon took a seat and motioned to Renamon to sit beside him. Renamon shot him a dirty look and took a seat on the other side of the sofa with her back to him and the drone pulled away. Another drone brought Rika a bowl of ice cream and turned on the monitor.

Rika allowed the drone to spoon feed her the ice cream and watched the screen. Inside the other room a girl could be seen laying on her bed being fed cake by several drones. She must have weighted 400 pounds, her belly spilled out in front of her and pinned her the bed, the girl didn't even seem to notice the monitor before her showing Rika on the other side, all she seemed to care about was the cake. Renamon and Candy Monzeamon pulled into the room and stopped between the girl's bed and Guilmon.

"Hey Guilmon!" Candy Monzeamon greeted "Renamon here wanted to see for herself you were fine. You gave her a scare earlier when you were having on of your episodes" Candy Monzeamon laughed shaking his hands in the air to gesture a crazy guy.

Guilmon was laying on his back stuffed full of pastries with a confused stare like he couldn't focus on what was being said. Guilmon Just looked back at Candy Monzeamon trying to grasp the situation. Candy Monzeamon brought Renamon to his bed side and stood behind her, holding up another cream puff he got Guilmon's attention pointed to a drone's monitor displaying a set of lines. Guilmon got the idea and looked back to Renamon.

"Umm.. Hey Renamon..." Guilmon said in a daze "I'm just fine... sorry to scare you like that, I apparently get like that sometimes... um, I hope I didn't scare you away from these amazing... delicious... sweet creamy..."

Candy Mozeamon realized he was losing Guilmon's focus and quickly rubbed the cake on his fuzzy arm. Moving up beside Renamon, Candy Mozeamon put his arm around her like a friend gesture making sure the chocolate crumb covered arm was drapped right next to her sensitive nose. Renamon's mind got fuzzy, she was having trouble remembering what she needed here.

"Tell her everything is fine" Candy Mozeamon told Guilmon

"it's uh... fine" Guilmon said eyes half shut

"Oh..." Renamon said dreamily "Ok... I guess..." Renamon couldn't think straight, she got what she wanted... didn't she? He said he's fine... right? Renamon shook her head something seemed off, maybe she'd feel better if she went back to her room... and took a nap... Renamon climbed back onto the cart, a drone handed her a box of donuts and got in the driver seat, Renamon watched dazed as Candy Mozeamon waved goodbye to her and remained in the room. As soon as they were gone he turned to the monitor.

"Rika, why don't you take a nap, you look tired." Candy Mozeamon looked at the drone by Rika "Give her some of the special cream, she'll sleep better" Candy Mozeamon smiled knowingly and shut off the monitor. He motioned to a drone to bring Guilmon a reward for behaving so well.

"No..." Guilmon protested "I have to... get out... gotta get Erika free of this place..."

"Erika do you want to leave?" Candy Mozeamon asked his trainer

"Huh?" The large girl asked "Do they have more of these wonderful sweets outside?"

"No" Candy Mozeamon told her "You like it here right?"

"Then I'm fine..." Erika said "As long as you have more of these pastries I love it here"

"Excellent, Drones bring these two a nice big treat" Candy Mozeamon smiled "They are much to small to serve our Princesses
111212221222112121.title: Prophesy of the pretty plump what?

choices: Renamon, Always On Edge
Candy Monzaemon, the Unexpected Enlightener
1112122212221121211.content:
Although Renamon had technically gotten the answer to prove that something was wrong in Candy Monzaemon's set up, and he'd given her the donuts, which did little to quell her growing hunger and suspicion. She cast her mind all over, to everything Candy Monzaemon had said since their arrival, the activities of the drones, and other than explainable misconceptions, it seemed that there was absolutely nothing she could think of to feel suspicious about.

The ride back to the room she shared with Rika seemed shorter with the company of the donuts, although the whole ride she was oppressed by a watchful feeling. She knew it was the drone, but why a robot would be watching her so hard she could feel it was a mystery to her. When the small cart pulled up beside the room, Renamon was all too happy to disembark it.

Once inside the room, Renamon was calmed only slightly by Rika's smiling face. She couldn only wonder if the happiness was real, or induced somehow.

"Renamon, come sit down, you don't look too god. What's wrong?" Renamon sighed, knowing that, if she were drugged, Rika would have had a hard time coming up with a phrase that coherent. She did as her tamer suggested, and told her about her feelings, how she was sure Candy Monzaemon was hiding something.Rika listened with rapt attention, and they both did their best to ignore their stomachs roaring to be fed.

"Well, hey, listen." Rika said kindly, "I know how you feel, and I've learned that your hunches are unerringly right, but until we know something, we should relax, right? It doesn't make sense to just worry and worry. Between us, we'll know if something happens." Renamon was immensly relieved by this. "Besides, it seems like the food here is endless! Why should we try to get ourselves kicked out, or worse?" This again made Renamon suspicious. Was Rika even trustworthy? Or was she just gluttonous? Well, there's only one way to solve this, and that's to wait it out. And, why not see if gluttony can make her feel that much better.

The hunger, and incredible eating power, of the duo was not unnoticed by the drones. When Rika and Renamon called for them, it was less than three seconds before the door opened and the mechanical waiters filed in, trays piled to the brim with their random assortment of sweets, ranging from chocolates to fine pastries, cakes to pies, and everything in between.

The thoughts of doubt plaguing Renamon evaporated quickly into the heavily perfumed air, and her mouth began to fill with anticipating saliva. Both Renamon's and Rika's stomachs emitted the most thunderous roar yet, and the drones rushed in to quell the hunger.
Renamon, a bit exhausted from the events of the day, lounges in the heart of comfort, as a drone feeds her, another massaging her body all over to take out the strains of stress and copious eating. More and more food passed through her mouth, more than she could ever have imagined. She was amazed at her ability to eat, not feeling any piece of food in particular anymore, just the constant flow of food down her throat..

Rika was receiving similar treatment. Her body seemed to almost be a part of the bed now, how long she'd stayed there without moving, her body growing a hole for itself. She did not need a drone to massage her, as she was doing that herself. the feel of the folds of fat all around her was one of the most pleasurable sensations Rika had ever felt. Instead of a massage drone, she had two feeding her, hardly able to keep up with her endless hunger. She didn't miss a crumb, thanks to an agile tongue and the very helpful drones, and Rika couldn't have been more happy, the icing smoothly sliding down her esophagus, the feel of a hot piece of pie sending bolts of pleasure through her body, she could not have asked for anything more even if her mouth wasn't full.

====================================

Candy Monzaemon has increased the cream pastry output more than triple since he'd decided that Rika and Renamon were the Pretty Plump Princesses. But, what did that mean? Would Rika and Renamon ever find out? What could he know about them that they don't?

#1 - Renamon, after sleeping off the latest meal, still wants to look around, and try to see what's happening.

#2 - Candy Monzaemon brings some kind of information to them.
1112122212221121211.title: Eating is the Only Constant

choices: Renamon finds nothing of suspicion
Renamon gets a little to close to some of Candy Monzaemon's secrets
11121222122211212111.content:
Renamon awoke to the familiar sounds of eating. Looking over, it was Rika, somehow continuing to gorge. The girl was definitely starting to fill out, folds of fat forming at her sides, her limbs had become thick slabs of fat. Even her fingers looked thick and chubby. Renamon watched her with some concern, the girl still massaging her massive engorged belly, drones feeding her at an intense rate. She was completely unaware of anything except the food in her mouth. Then something snapped in Renamon's mind; I've got to stop this.

Launching her body from her bed, Renamon attempted to leap onto Rika, failing due to her own flabby body. Renamon looked at herself momentarily, and found herself - like Rika - to be quite out of shape. A pair of large breasts sat atop a large, flabby belly rolls had also begun to form but not quite as many as Rika's. Her thighs were rubbing together as well.

Ignoring her fatness however, Renamon again, lunged herself at her tamer.

"Rika, STOP!"

The girl didn't hear her, in fact, it seemed her eating quickened. Renamon attempted to forcibly stop the drones, but Rika's eyes flared with anger. For a moment their eyes met, Renamon's soft with care and worry, but Rika's were full of hunger. Soon, Rika lurched forward, opened her maw and began to stuff Renamon inside. Swallowing viciously, Rika began to devour Renamon. Renamon kicked and screamed to her full abilities, but to no avail.

Renamon shot up with a jolt, panting uncomfortably. It was just a dream. Nonetheless, it was all to vivid to simply give up. She knew it since the moment they had come to this place - something was amiss. She quickly looked at Rika's sleeping figure - still fat but not as bloated as in her dream. The same could be said for her own body. With a sudden bolt of duty, Renamon sat up and left the room,

"It's time to get to the bottom of this."

She walked the maze of hallways cautiously, expecting any sudden movement to be met with attack.

--------------------

Candy Monzaemon waited intently, his plans for the Pretty Plump Princesses were making him quite giddy. His glee however, was met with a sudden interruption.

"My lord" began a shawoded figure, "The Renamon is on the loose again and I..."

"Bah!" Retorted Candy Monzaemon impatiently. "Let her go, she won't find anything of use. Just lock the guest rooms. Then he thought for a moment, "But also make sure she doesn't get to close to THAT room." The servant nodded knowingly, and took particular interest as Monzaemon mentioned that particular place.

"As you wish" and the servant left to make the necessary arrangements. Monzaemon watched Renamon move about with interest.

"What are we going to do with you, my curious little fox?"
11121222122211212111.title: Bad Candy

choices: Renamon feels it would be best if they scoured the castle again, as a team.
They decide to confront Candy Monzaemon directly with the bargaining high ground
111212221222112121111.content:
Despite Renamon's impressive observation and intuition, the confused design of Candy Monzaemon's castle proved to be too great a challenge for her. She searched for several hours, her suspicions great enough to smother her increasing weariness. However, she realized over the course of her search that she could wander these halls for days and find not a soul, let alone any secrets Candy Monzaemon might have hidden.

Disappointed in her failure to find anything incriminating, Renamon slouched back to the room she and Rika shared. When she entered, the fading memory of her dream made her pensive, but luckily Rika was still asleep. She could sleep for quite a while, Renamon knew, as her body dealt with the tremendous amount of food and fat building up within. Renamon decided to lay down as well, her body aching from walking around the castle for so long. The sheets of the down bed felt like cloud nine as she sank into the bed. Despite her fears, she finds herself able to relax in the bed. The faint sound of Rika's breathing was one of the most soothing sounds Renamon had ever heard.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---

Candy Monzaemon watched as Renamon slept with a mixed look on his face, something between a smirk of satisfaction and a soft smile of real appreciation.

"She has no idea how important she and her tamer are to me... I just wish that she'd relax and enjoy the ride!"

He sat back and observed in silence for a while longer. Even he couldn't deny the peace of the scene. It gave him a nice atmosphere to think.

"...Soon... I'll just increase their intake, it'll all be done son enough. Bare with me, I'm almost as impatient as you are..."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --

Soon Renamon's half conscious state was broken by a slight stirring from Rika's bed, followed by an obscenely loud rumble of Rika's stomach, echoed in turn by a roar from Renamon's. Almost time for breakfast.

Rika sat up slowly, scooting back in the bed and leaning against the headboard. She blinked blearily, looked around, and saw Renamon. She smiled, then looked at herself slightly disappointed. Renamon smiled with one eyebrow raised, and Rika fully woke up, and explained.

"I had this strange dream. I was eating again, more than ever, then you tried to stop it. I was a lot bigger."

Renamon's grin slipped off her face, realizing that Rika had the exact same dream as herself. This gave new root to her suspicions, although this happened relatively frequently between them, how close they are.

"Strange, I had the same dream. It scared me, to see you eating so much... Don't you think that there's something wrong here? Some part of the picture we just don't know about?"

Rika's face clouded with thought. Even though she was hungry, she was thinking more logically than she could if she were full or eating.

"I see what you mean, but... Do you really have to worry? Have you found out something strange? There is a feeling, but even your intuitions can be wrong. Lets have breakfast."

Renamon feels defeated. Her tamer won't even listen to her! Then she feels a small tickle in her mind, and recognizes it. Rika is trying to contact her mind. Renamon already feels relieved.

I am sure that Candy Monzaemon has some way to monitor us all the time. I'm pretty sure that's how the food gets here so fast. I have an idea. We can go out tonight, or we could even confront Candy Monzaemon directly. No matter how much he lies or tries to control us, we still have the upper hand. He wants us here, and we can leave, so there's some things he just can't step on.

Renamon is overjoyed, but keeps it inside, for fear of Candy Monzaemon getting a hint. Still, she doesn't know exactly how to proceed...

Rika senses Renamon's thoughts, and replies with her own.

Let's have breakfast. You can think about what you'd like to do while we eat. We don't want to raise suspicions by not eating as we have been. Renamon gives a mental affirmative. Rika smirks and adds, Besides, I'm hungry!

Renamon can't decide whether to be angry or amused, so she relaxes. It seems like everything is under control.

"Alright, let's have breakfast!" Renamon states to the room. Within seconds, a platoon of food laden servants enter the room, eager to serve. Rika grins outright, obviously very hungry, and Renamon can't contain an anxious look at the food, her stomach grumbling louder.

The drones perform as they've been taught by their frequent visits in the past. One feeder per girl, to massaging each belly, the rest to move more food in as it's depleted. They even seem almost energetic, as if they can feel the pleasantness in the air, with just a hint of tangy excitement as Rika and Renamon plan the night before them.

They eat for a while, Renamon about forty five minutes, and Rika about an hour and a half, both eating nonstop until they end. Neither of them fills up completely, or even really comes close, but they have to save room for lunch and dinner, and both promise to be tremendous and scrumptious.

The breakfast is mainly comprised of small snack-like sweets, such as strawberry sandwiches and donuts. The sugary fillings and sweet coatings of each delicious morsel swirled together in an orgy of taste bud bliss, which quickly transformed into the satisfying feeling of fullness which Rika and Renamon are rapidly becoming addicted to, which even more quickly becomes the soft puppy fat wrapping itself around the Pretty Plump Princesses.

All too soon, however, the servants leave, and Rika and Renamon are left alone to psychically discuss their plan for the evening...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --

Candy Monzaemon is in a good mood as well, monitoring the digimon and tamer. From his view of the room, he can see Rika and Renamon acting strangely, and smiles as he formulates the perfect way to keep them down until they accept their fate.
111212221222112121111.title: Finally Renamon gets a word in!

choices: Renamon sleeps restlessly...
Renamon is awoken in the night...
1112122212221121211112.content:
It wasn't until late that evening when Candy Monzaemon came to greet his two guests. It goes without saying however that the two had ample time eating, which was becoming more evident with each meal. Renamon was absolutely stuffed; she lay on her bed groaning and moaning while massaging her bloated mass of belly. As much as she hated to admit to being a glutton, Renamon was actually starting to enjoy engorging herself with an almost sort of sick pleasure. She couldn't help but feel disgusted with herself but the pleasures of the feast were enough to ignore her own gluttony. At least for now.

Rika however, was faring much better then Renamon, sucking unconsciously at a shake, her belly exploding out from her shirt and bursting from her pants, revealing the smallest pantie line; her belly hanging over heavily. With one hand occupied holding the shake, the other contently rubbed her vastly overfed belly, extremely taunt with food. Occasionally Rika would let out a small "mmmph" of pleasure, enjoying her food stuffed stupor immensely.

Candy Monzaemon smiled as he entered, and as the door slammed behind him, Renamon did her best to look up.

"Well how are my two favorite guests doing?" Renamon opened her mouth to speak but Rika beat her to the punch.

"Fantastic! I can't get enough of it!" exclaimed Rika excitedly. Candy Monzaemon chuckled at Rika's gluttony, and turned to Renamon as if expecting a similar reply.

"Um...yes, things are going...*URRP*" Renamon blushed, unable to stifle a belch, and Monzaemon's chortle became all the greater.

"Ho ho ho! You surprise me Renamon! You've proven quite the eater!" said Monzaemon happily with a wink. Renamon's bashfulness increased and turning her head away, Candy Monzaemon made for the door.

"Well if everything is al-"

"Actually!" began Renamon with a start, sitting upward a little to fast, disturbing her exhausted stomach. Wincing slightly, Renamon continued,

"The food and the drones...everything is great, really it is. But Candy Monzaemon, I can't help but feel..." Renamon looked down and searched for the word, "Well I just feel like we're being used or something." She furrowed her brow to emphasize her seriousness, "I want to know what you're purpose is for feeding us and all the guests."

Rika looked on with much interest, studying Monzaemon's face carefully. The crazed digimon however showed no sign of discomfort and suddenly burst into an uproar of laughter. Renamon looked at Rika, who merely shrugged and tossed her empty shake glass aside and let out a wet belch. Finishing up on his laughter, Candy Monzaemon cleared his throat importantly and began to speak,

"I can understand your concern my sweet little Renamon," Renamon scowled remark but Monzaemon took no notice, "But in no way am I trying to brainwash or control you. What good would that do? I'm just here to make sure you're happy." A smiled crept onto Monzaemon's face, "But of course if indeed you feel uncomfortable or unhappy in anyway, you're always free to leave." Candy Monzaemon looked serious now as he motioned towards the door. Rika and Renamon exchanged slightly confused looks but before they could say a work, Monzaemon began one last time, "However, if you do wish to stay - and I do suggest you do so - I will admit that you two are quite a special case, and truthfully...I do have great things in mind for the two of you." Candy Monzaemon smiled, a glint in his eyes.

"But enough of this, if you wish to leave you may do so at your own displeasure, but if not then sleep and eat and be merry my friends, after all, you're be treated as royalty here." With that, Candy Monzaemon left the room, whistling pleasantly to himself, leaving Rika and Renamon to themselves. Sleep would have to come.
1112122212221121211112.title: Great things to come

choices: A storeroom full of food
A pair of drones on night watch
11121222122211212111122.content:
Renamon's hunger awakened her. She rubbed her massively bloated gut and rolled out of bed, quietly leaving the room. She wanted more food, whether or not it was safe to walk the halls. All she cared about at the moment was filling her stomach.

She kept an eye out for drones as she waddled down the hallways, her body's soft coating of flab jiggling with each step. Her belly growls loudly, getting impatient. Suddenly, she sees something...
11121222122211212111122.title: Renamon is awoken in the night...

choices: Rika need..needs.. to try this... (Lure her here)
More.. (Greedy time)
111212221222112121111221.content:
Rena cursed quietly to herself as she glares down at her growling gut, pointing to it much like a parent scolding a child. "Will you quiet down..?! I'll deal with you la..." She paused in the middle of her sentence at seeing a particularly curious looking door. "Ter..." The vulpine did her best to sneak upon her tip-toes closer towards it. The door's label read: "FOOD/INGREDIENT STORAGE"... Of course as if her stomach had a mind of it's own, it growled delightfully at such a name.

Biting her lip, Renamon peered down to her stomach, then to the door once again. The door itself didn't seem to have any sort of locking mechanism on it, nor did it look like there was any sort of security in place. "Oh what the hell.. If I do this, will you shut up finally?" She speaks to her tum as if waiting for a reply before quickly turning the knob to sneak her wide frame inside. After closing the door behind herself, her eyes went as wide as they possibly could. Shelves upon shelves of carefully stored foodstuffs, drinks, and the like all were bared before her! "Oh.. my.." She found herself suddenly speechless at this point. With her ravenous hunger overtaking her impulses, she swiftly began to dine. Chocolate brownies under beautiful glass covers, succulent candy coated fruits and pastries all slid down her throat to rest within her belly.

After having her fill, she scritched her muzzle in slight guilt of losing control like that. Carefully she placed the lids upon the containers to make it seem like noone was ever in here, though unfortunately a thirst began to seize her.. After all.. she did have quite a few of those pastries and needed something to wash it down. Renamon moved carefully to avoid upsetting her full gut and stood before what looked like a row of wooden barrels with taps placed upon them. Out of curiosity, Rena placed her fingertip under one of the taps to swipe a bit of the pink liquid it leaked to test with her tongue.

It could only be described as an incredibly divine sweetness which deceptively hid the understones of liqour much like that of brandied chocolate candy. though it also gave her such an incredibly satisfying euphoria.. Though after just a tiny taste test, she had the oddest sensation like as though her belly just got the tiniest bit bigger. "Not possible.." She shrugged and thought it was just her imagination..

Renamon groaned, but caught herself nearly suckling the entirety of her finger and pulled it from her lips. "...Why not..?" Her mind spoke to her, giving her all the assurance she'd need about this little sinful deed.. With a grin, she lowered her head to wrap her lips around the tap and pulled down firmly on the small lever to begin gulpping large mouthfulls of the delicious candywine.

After a few long moments, she pulled her lips free to rest her entire body against the shelf, her cheek rubbing up agaisnt the barrel. She never felt so warm and content in all her life..! She felt like she was in such a wonderful dream.. A loud hiccup seized her, causing a large pink bubble to escape her. She grinned drunkenly, groaning in bliss as her body began to gradually expand. Another hiccup produced another pink bbble to float happily away.
111212221222112121111221.title: A storeroom full of dreams

choices: She's discovered!
Renamon drinks it all!
1112122212221121211112212.content:
Renamon couldn't help it, the drink was too delicious, she had to have more. Placing her mouth under the tap again she suckled eagerly at the huge barrel of delicious candywine, unaware that with every gulp her frame seemed to expand more and more. In minutes she'd emptied the barrel and gained easily another two hundred pounds. She tried to stand but found herself falling all over her large body, giggling all the while in a drunken daze.

What's more, every time shegiggled a stream of small pink bubbles blew out of her mouth, and every once in a while a large hiccup would produce a larger one the size of a football. Renamon just smiled at the strange bubbles that floated around her, barely paying any attention at all as she rubbed her belly, now as big as a armchair and softer than a pillow. her whole frame had thickened accordingly. Her armguards now strained at her thick folds, her tatoos on her thighs were greatly distorted from the added rolls, her butt could have filled a sofa on it's own. And still she swelled slowly with gentile sloshes and giggles all the while.

Idly she looked around the room again, through the glowing cloud of pink bubbles that filled the air ans potted another barrel of candywine. This one however had a sign on it. It took Renamon several attempts to read it as she had a hard time fopcusing her eyes.

"Consh... Cashin...Conshintraited..." she slurred, wondering what that meant in her drunken state. Unable to think it through she smiled and bent under this one as well, ready for more delicious filling.

This one had an even better flavor and Renamon couldn't help but moan between mouthfuls as her belly gurgled and lurched forward, even more bubbles produced everytime she stopped for breath and a few more hiccups.


Option one: Renamon is discovered and dragged back to her shared room in a drunken stupor and continued to produce bubbles all through the night with odd effects on those they touch.

Option Two: Renamon is not discovered yet and drinks all the whine, growing bigger and fatter with every gulp, but the bubbles find a way out of the room and have an odd effect on all those they touch in the castle.
1112122212221121211112212.title: More.. (Greedy time)

choices: Rika woke up floating in midair...
Renamon wakes up with a HUGE hangover...
11121222122211212111122121.content:
((Edited by FFtheSnake))

While Renamon was so busy drinking and blowing bubbles, she didn't notice that CandyMonzaemon and some drones had noticed her on the security monitors, having caught her red handed.

"How in the bubblegum blue blazes did she get in there?!" CandyMonzaemon screamed, frustrated beyond belief. He may have been an advocate of hedonism and fattening, but he did like things to have a bit of a sense of order to them. Guests to his estate sneaking out on their own frustrated him greatly.

"It is unknown, sir," the drone said, "Perhaps she felt the need to investigate her surroundings. You do have a tendency to be overly secretive, sir..."

CandyMonzaemon pushed the drone aside. "Oh, nevermind. Let's just go get her back to her room."

The drones nodded and followed their master outside. They eventually made their way to the storeroom. Finding Renamon there, happily drinking away, CandyMonzaemon chuckled, unable to stay mad at someone getting so fat. After a moment, Renamon noticed him and smiled drunkenly.

"Candymonz... Cananmon... Cannibal... Fuzzy guy with a thing for fat chicks!" she slurred, giggling, "How's it going?"

"Better than I thought," CandyMonzaemon said, "But I think you've had enough. Your hangover is already going to be murder as it is."

"Nonshensh," Renamon said, "I know jush when to fall down, I'll be fine." She began to heft her heavy bulk towards a new barrel of candywine, CandyMonzaemon having his drones grab her and move her away. It was somewhat difficult to hold her, as she had become extremely soft as she had become fat. "No fair..." she grumbled, giggling despite her annoyance.

CandyMonzaemon shook his head at her, and sighed, chuckling. She obviously had never been drunk before, as she was clearly buzzed out of her mind. Plus the bubbles floating around the room concerned him. He gently touched one. When it popped, he felt a brief sensation like he should have been expanding, but because he wasn't an organic Digimon, all that happened was he felt the sensation.

"Huh boy... Blimp bubbles..." CandyMonzaemon said, not entirely without amusement. "Better get her back to her room. We still have preparations to make."

The drones nodded. They were slightly intellegent, though, and one decided to ask a question for the collective. "Sir, what are these Blimp Bubbles?"

CandyMonzaemon smirked. "Well... My DigiCode is loosely based off of the fictional character Willy Wonka. As such, I have the character's penchant for experimenting. The bubbles were my attempt to produce a way for people to still be as fat as they wanted while still retaining immobility. They're a little too effective, though. They add fat, but someone needs to be drunk before they can be produced, and the lighter than air effect doesn't last all that long. Plus, it inflates them like a balloon for that time, and I just think it looks silly. Fat should be produced by eating, after all, not just by drinking sweet liquor."

Satisfied, the drones began to take Renamon back, the foxy mound of yellow flab singing some cheerful song she had heard before. CandyMonzaemon paused a moment, and asked, "What's her partner doing right now?"

"Having a midnight snack, sir," one drone said.

CandyMonzaemon nodded. "Be honest about what happened. And pop those bubbles as they come out. The bubble-producing effect should wear off once she gets some sleep."

The drones nodded, carting Renamon on an anti-gravity platform back to her room. When they got there, they found Rika eagerly making her way through a large ice cream sundae, hot fudge and whipped cream covering her lips. She blinked upon noticing Renamon's drunken state, chuckled, and said, "What happened to you?"

Renamon just giggled and said, "Heya Chika... Shneaka... Whatever yer name is, I think yer hoooot..." She hiccuped, sending out a cloud of pink bubbles

Rika blushed, a drone reflexively going to wipe her mouth clean. "Is she okay?" she asked.

The drone nodded. "She discovered a storeroom where we keep old projects. She imbibed heavily of a concentrated candywine, which is producing these bubbles. They have a light fattening effect upon contact and will temporarily make the user lighter than air, inflating them like a balloon. They'll stop producing once the candywine is fully absorbed into her system."

Rika frowned, looking at the bubbles. She liked the idea of getting fatter from the bubbles, but was still worried about Renamon. "But she'll be okay, right?"

The drone nodded. "Aside from getting a hangover in the morning as large as she is right now, she'll be fine." It looked at Rika and added. "You both should get some sleep. It's past midnight."

Rika nodded, polishing off the last of her sundae. The drone cleaned her up quickly, the others setting a giggling, bubble producing Renamon on the bed. She cuddled up to Renamon, and said, "My belly needs time to digest my last meal and snack. Some rest will do me good."

The drone nodded. Renamon drifted off almost immediately, occasionally hiccuping up a cloud of bubbles. The drone moved to pop them, but Rika waved it off. The drone shrugged, and said, "Very well. Although CandyMonzaemon prefers that food be the cause of weight gain, not enchanted bubbles."

Rika scoffed. "I'll just eat more tomorrow," she said, yawning, fatigue starting to set in.

The drone nodded. "Very good, madam," it said, exiting and turning off the lights, closing the door behind it. Rika eventually fell asleep next to her partner, who kept hiccuping in the night, producing more bubbles of varying sizes. Some were sucked into the air conditioning, popping harmlessly, but some popped against Rika's bare skin, her body bulging slightly each time, starting to literally round out even as the bubbles plumped her up. It was a warm, pleasant feeling that filled Rika's rest with pleasant dreams of being so fat that she outgrew the universe, Renamon by her side consuming all of existence and then some...
11121222122211212111122121.title: Her cover's blown and so is Rika...

choices: The bubble gets absorbed into Rika
The bubble continues to get bigger
111212221222112121111221211.content:
The next morning Rika slowly wakes up from her pleasure dream and notices something strange.

"Why does the ceiling look closer than usual?" Rika asked in a groggy voice.

Then Rika turned her head as far as she could and saw that she wasn't on her bed and came to the conclusion that some of the blimp bubbles must've popped on her and now she's become a human balloon.

"I know I wanted to get fat but not like this." Rika said panicking.

While she was flailing around like crazy she noticed that Renamon was still out cold and still blowing bubbles.

"I thought they said that Renamon would stop producing the bubbles by now." Rika stated in a confused.

Then out of nowhere CandyMonzaemon entered the room with some drones and noticed Rika floating around the room.

"Well I knew this was coming." CandyMonzaemon sighed. "How much of the bubbles has been absorbed into Rika?"

Then one of the drones did a quick scan of Rika and instantly came up with the results.

"About 48% of the bubbles produced have been absorbed into her body." The Drone stated.

I haven't moved from the bed since we got here, so it's not like I've had any chance to adapt to this weight. Do we gain both weight AND muscle while we're here? Deactivate." The scale then lowered her to the floor and she got up. "Renamon will probably want to know about this." She then pressed the button to return the the scale and walked out of the bathroom to find that...

113.content:
Takato and Guilmon walked up to Rika and Renamon. “We found this neato pendant. We need to run but we were wondering if you wanted it” Said Takato. They handed it to her and ran off.

Rika examined the strange medallion. It was a small grey stone with several strange markings carved into it. She handed it to Renamon, who was also stumped by the markings. Rika wondered why she felt so strange when she held it, but quickly shrugged the feeling off and returned to her original thought before Takato gave her a present.

“Renamon, I really think I should gain weight-I am sick of being force fed tasteless slop so I can remain a twig for another day!” Renamon seemed thoughtful about this. Rika began scowled when Renamon didn’t seem very supportive. “What-you don’t want me to do this?!”

Renamon not only dispelled Rika’s apprehension but set her mood to one of the happiest she had been in a while, with a smile and the simple remark “I haven’t had fried chicken in a while...”

A very excited Renamon and Rika ran into a fried chicken restaurant. Rika almost drooled all over the floor when she realized she could have whatever she wanted, and however much of it she wanted. “Renamon, what are you going to order?” Rika said in a pleased voice.

“Whatever has the most fat on it!” Renamon grinned and ordered 3 buckets of deep fried-double battered chicken legs. Renamon, having some more prevalent 'animalistic' tastes, asked if she could have the fat trimmed from the meat, along with a whole chicken dipped in the fat friar. Both ladies dug into their meals enthusiastically. However, just as they were getting nothing but pure pleasure from the fatty foods, the medallion Rika had kept in her pocket began to glow. Rika took it out, and began watching it intently. Soon, the glow began to glow even brighter. Suddenly, a thin beam emerged from the relic and struck the girl’s food. Soon after the beam stopped, the pale green glow began to fade, and then disappear completely. The medallion was back to normal. There appeared to be no change to the food, so the girls reluctantly began eating again after exchanging uncertain glances.

When they resumed their meals, they noticed a change in the food, it tasted unbelievably good -quite possibly the most delicious they had ever tasted. They began shoving food down their mouths a rapidly as they could manage. Despite the huge quantity of the food they had ordered, they ate it without even feeling like they should stop. Renamon finished hers first. She sprung up from her seat and dashed to the counter to order more. Rika yelled up from her chicken, grease and crumbs covering her face.

“Renamon, order me another bucket, will you?” Renamon nodded and ordered a bucked for her and her human friend. She ran back, nearly throwing Rika her bucket. Just as Rika had hoped, the medallion began to glow, this time a little brighter. The beam connected with the food and the girls started gorging again.

They ordered more food to go and trudged out of the restaurant, happier than they had been in a long time. Rika returned home-that’s when she realized her mother wouldn’t be home for a week because of that photo shoot…. Rika dashed off into the kitchen and came back with an armful of granola bars, vegetables, and fat free crackers. She dumped the whole caboodle into the garbage pail and turned to Renamon. “Time to update our pantry!” Rika said with a grin. She ran out to the mini mart on the corner of their block.

Rika came back a short while later, lugging several bags. “Renamon, I know we are going to enjoy this!” Rika pulled out a whole box of beef jerky, about two bags of sandwiches and hot dogs smothered with every topping imaginable, 20 party sized bags of chips, several quarts of ice cream, and lots and lots of cheese whiz, which was a product that Renamon seemed to enjoy almost too much. However, after going on a binge on them about a year ago and beginning to get a little soft, she swore off the stuff and began even more vigorous workouts. Renamon scampered up to Rika and nearly tackled her with excitement. The girls began eating. Rika savored the taste of potato chips, licking her fingers after every hand full. Renamon was literally drinking the cheese whiz, her finger firmly planted on the trigger that dispensed the cheesy goodness from the can. When they were munching on sandwiches Rika ran to the kitchen to see if they had mustard. She opened the fridge, only to notice that the medallion was beginning to glow again. This time it struck a potato-Rika stared as the vegetable turned blue and crispy, like it had been fried. Renamon ran into the kitchen on all fours. “Wow, what’s that smell?” she said in a yearning and strained voice.

“The medallion hit this potato…I think it fried it..." Renamon ran to the fridge, grabbed a handful of potatoes and dashed off into the living room again. “Rika over here-bring the medallion!” Rika entered the living room holding the medallion.

Sure enough, the medallion began to glow again. Renamon extended her claws on one hand and diced the potatoes, then covered them with cheese whiz. When they were engulfed by the green beam, sure enough, cheese covered blue potato chips were created. The girls tasted it... they nearly lost their vision-the taste... was... unexplainable. Rika took out the medallion once again and hit nearly all the food with the beam. Now the food changed noticeably, and the green beam was getting brighter and thicker. The girls began eating. Eventually they were enjoying themselves so much they fell on their backs amongst the food and just stuffed the blue-tinted food into their mouths. Within the hour they dosed off, stomachs nearly popping from the sheer amount of food they had ingested.

The next morning Rika had the shock of her life. She expected to maybe have gained a pound or two, but she seemed to have gained almost twenty over the course of eight hours! Her thin and fit body ahs completely erased, and the remaining weight began to make itself noticed on her body. Her shirt now gave way to a doughy belly, with the indication that she will be developing rolls soon, as when she was in a sitting position, a small crease was forming when she sat. Her arms were beginning to press up against the sleeves of her shirt, and when she tilted her head a double chin was beginning to come into play. Her cheekbones were gone to a layer of fluffy fat. She got up and felt a sharp pain-her jeans were painfully tight, struggle against a new and noticeable layer of fat. Rika blushed, and turned to Renamon, who wasn’t looking much different from Rika. Renamon’s body was beginning to puff out. Renamon probed her body with her hand and found that she could pinch soft flab anywhere on her body. She had put on as much weight as Rika, in fact.

“Ahh... Rika... Are you sure we really want to continue doing this?”

Rika looked down at her stomach reluctantly-then noticed the medallion lying among a pile of wrappers and bones.

“Well... Renamon, do you really want to give up more nights like last night?” Rika kicked an empty cheese wiz can towards Renamon.

“Well... Rika... I... urrmm... Let’s get something to eat!”

RIka nodded her head, finding the medallion among the pile of food wrappers. "Go grab us some pizza, as much as you can carry. I want to see if I can find out anything about this wonderful little thing."

Renamon nodded, shifting into the shadows as she went off to her task. Rika strolled through the house, out onto the surrounding deck as she made her way to her bedroom. She could feel the weight, but at the same time she wasn't feeling tired over overly immobile. Just heavier, and in a good way. She squeezed herself mindlessly, noticing that she was actually somewhat soft and squishy, much better then when she was so thin and muscly. She liked being strong, but she liked being soft better.

======================================

Renamon returned with a wide grin on her face, carrying twenty boxes of pizza in each hand and a large bag of soda and other soft drinks strapped to her back. "I'm back."

Rika smiled, turning away from her computer as she looked at all the pizza, licking her lips and sniffing the air. "It does smell wonderful. Still, I think I found something about this medallion."

After setting down the boxes Renamon moved over to the computer, looking over Rika's shoulder at the web page that was displayed there. "The Morlan?"

"Ya, I guess it was some ancient civilization in South America, a branch of the Incan Empire. According to this professor guy, the Morlan social system saw that the rounder and fatter someone was, the higher up on the social ladder. The kind of logic that they were high enough up in the tribe they could eat a lot and in such have a big belly. The chef was whoever had the biggest gut, and usually managed to stay in power because, minus making a few proclamations and orders, he was left to eat all day."

"So where does the medallion come in?"

"I'm getting to it," Rika replied, scrolling down on the web page. "Now, one legend of the tribe is that one very glutinous king, during some years of famine, horded all the food for himself. The rest of the tribe was starving, and one person in particular went to some river a great distance away from the tribe to find food. At teh river, he found a medallion, one that looks a lot like the one Takato and Guilmon gave us. Supposidly, this medallion turned trees, leaves, flowers, everything around the man to food and fatting food at that. Using the medallion, he overthrew the old king and brought a golden age onto the tribe where everyone could be as heavy as they wanted."

"Sounds wonderful." Renamon said, picking up the medallion. "So, how does it work?"

"I haven't found much on that. We already know that it can somehow change food, making it a lot more fattening. But this website says that it could do other things to. The jewel in the center is supposed to be supported on a turning ring, so that you can turn it to one of four positions, including the first one. So, my guess, it can do four other things to."

Renamon tilted her head a little, fiddling with the medallion until she got a grip on the jewel in the center. As Rika said, after straining a little, Renamon got the center of the medallion to turn and move until it clicked into another position a quarter turn away. It was at that moment when...

===========================================================

Option 1: The light turns to a deep, encompassing blue color that flashes Renamon and makes her stumble back in shock. Rika catches the medallion, seeing the center ring slowly turning back to place before looking at Renamon. Still, the medallion has inspired an almost voracious appetite in Renamon. She is attacking the pizza's, eating three slices at once and not caring how much greese or food she gets on herself. She just eats, and Rika can only stand back and watch in awe.

Option 2: Instead of hitting Renamon the medallion floats up in the air, spins a few times, and then flies into the bathroom. Not wanting to loose their new trinket, Rika and Renamon follow where they find the medallion has landed in the tub and, somehow, the water is running. Still, the medallion is glowing a warm red color and the water itself is turning a white. The smell starts to get to Renamon, and she tests it. The water has been turned into something like a vanilla milk shake, but its ten times more tasty and twenty times more fattening. Renamon can't help herself as she begins to drink straight from the tub, Rika quickly following suit as they gorged their bellies in the white liquid.

Option 3: A yellow light flashes from the medallion, and it knocks both Rika and Renamon to the floor. The medallion hovers in the air, but as it does the pizza begins to fly out of the boxes, circling around the medallion like a tornado of food. The green light then returns for a moment, flashing and turning all the pizza into the crispy blew color before they fly down to Rika and Renamon, who are pinned against the ground by a mysterious force. The pair can do nothing else but eat, and in truth they don't want to do anything else at first. Nonetheless, they really loved each other. From what I remember of that tale, Hanako's body disappeared when Ms. Nonaka looked back after trying to find some help. There was no signs of a blood trail that would indicate that Hanako moved on her own or was carried away."

After hearing what the two rotund Renamon lovers had explained to him, Henry took into account of the details with Hanako's disappearance. Rubbing his chin a little while in a train of mental solving, Henry came to a single conclusion; they were going to need some help in solving this investigation.
