With it, I shall be able to breed endless varieties of species from any female, no matter the species! Human genocide will be undone!!! I, the great doctor Vwak Oh, shall be hailed as the greatest environmentalist of all time."

The doctor's assistant, a small, mousey woman with short brown hair named Sensi Ble, frowned and stared worriedly at the machine. "Sir, the planet is overpopulated as it is! If it can make a female instantly become pregnant with the children of any male of any species she has skin-to-skin contact with as you say it can, it could lead to disaster!"

Vwak Oh just snorted. "Piffle. We'll just induce a Digimon war on this world. From the records I stole from Hypnos, Zhuqiaomon is just itching for an excuse to drop his truce with humanity. Humanity deserves annihilation anyway"

Sensi blinked, paling. "You can't be serious!"

Vwak smirked. "Indeed I am. In fact, I know the perfect subjects to test my device on."

Sensi gulped. "Who, sir?"

Vwak laughed maniacally. "Rika Nonaka and Renamon!"

Sensi blinked, and then her eyes widened in shock, remembering the Tamers who saved the world from the D-Reaper almost two years ago...

"Sir, she's only 14!!!"

"Ask me if I care," Vwak said, typing in directions to the machine. It glowed briefly, and shot out two glowing orbs of light.

Vwak laughed as Sensi moaned. "Soon it will begin! Once they've ballooned out with babies enough, I'll reveal my intent to Zhuqiaomon, getting him to start a war. And then my plan to replace humanity will be complete!!"

Sensi, as Vwak laughed, contemplated the very unsensible choice she made working for such a madman. And as she contemplated, the orbs found their targets, briefly suffusing the sleeping Rika and Renamon in a warm glow, leaving them dreaming of fox cubs gamboling about in the mist...
124.title: Instant Inseminator Machine

choices: Takato nudged Rika and Guilmon nudged Renamon
Takato nudged Renamon and Guilmon nudged Rika
1241.content:
"Rika? Renamon? Hey, guys!" Takato shouted to his friends with his digimon Guilmon by his side.

"Wakey-wakey, Rika and Renamon." Guilmon said innocently.

There was no reply. They just peacefully lied there, as if they were having a beautiful dream.

"Maybe if we nugded them a little, then they'll wake up." Takato suggested.

"Okay, Takato." Guilmon agreed.

Who nudged who?
1241.title: A "Rude" Awakening

choices: Morning sickness
Their bellies start to grow
12412.content:
"I'll try to wake up Renamon and you can try Rika. If I tried to wake her up, something bad could happen." Takato said.

"What kind of bad thing?" Guilmon asked curiously.

Takato gulped. He knew ehat the bad thing was. If he was right next to Rika when she awakes, she'll assume that he's a pervert and slap him into a oblivion. If he was right next to Renamon when she wakes up, she would just eye him in a weird way and that's it. Oh, if they only knew what was going to happen.

Anyway, Takato gave a little push to Renamon causing her to wake up and Guilmon did the same to Rika.

"Huh? Hey, what's the big idea?" Rika yawned as she woke up.

"You were asleep so me and Guilmon thought that this would be the only way to wake you up." Takato said sheepishly.

"Well thanks a lot." Rika said in an annoyed way. Then for some reason, she and Renamon both felt weird for no reason.
12412.title: And The Problems Erupt

choices: They have worse morning sickness!
They start having outward changes.
124121.content:
The "weird" feeling in both of them was a wave of nausea.

It was terrible, and although Rika had an empty stomach she still felt its meager contents reel when she opened her eyes. Her gag reflex started to kick in at the sudden array of smells she felt something rising up her throat. She ground her teeth together turning her head as slowly as she could to try and make her stomach stop flipping.
"Why don't you go now?" she asked taking a deep breath in and out to see if that would relieve her sudden sickness. When it didn't she decided that she better kick the two figures in her room so she could go and empty the contents of her stomach.

"Come on Guilmon, I guess they don't know how to say thank-you," Takato said, his sheepishness disappearing into annoyance. He turned around, dragging Guilmon out with him.
"Bye bye Rika!" Guilmon said cheerfully, before dutifully following Takato.

Rika slowly lifted herself off the floor. The trip seemed to take an eternity, as any sudden movement seemed to induce another pang of nausea. She gripped the table, her knuckles white with concentration. She sighed when she was finally up, before jerking forward and clapping her hand onto her mouth. Her face twisted again as she felt dizzy for a moment. What was wrong with her? The last time she'd had a meal was....two days ago at dinnertime. She'd been dragged out at dawn the next day to chase digimon. She remembered her stomach growling before she'd gone to bed, but she'd been too tired to do anything about it. Her stomach was sending out dull, twisting messages now, and she could hear it growling insistently. Maybe she was just sick because she hadn't eaten in such a long time. She rubbed her stomach, feeling the gaping cavern that remained from not eating for over a day. She exhaled, feeling how slack her belt was. She tugged at it, and regretted her decision as it sent her running out into the hall to throw up whatever was left in her stomach.

Renamon wasn't feeling very good either. She stumbled as she stood up, which was unusual, with her perfect fox-like grace. To her, the floor seemed to keep shifting and she fumbled a few times before she made it out the door and into the kitchen. When she opened the refrigerator she was greeted with several strong smells, and turned her face away in disgust at foods she would have normally enjoyed.

Rika pulled herself up from the toilet. A sour burning taste remained in her mouth, as all she had thrown up was water and bile. She felt weak, dizzy, and nauseous. She'd never been this sick her whole life. She looked at herself in the mirror. She looked a little pale and tired, but besides that she was fine. It wasn't like she ever got sick with anything besides the flu anyway. She started to the kitchen making it halfway down the hall before she lurched again and was sent back to the bathroom. This time she collapsed on the floor in an exhausted heap. She spun around in wild circles. If she literally had nothing in there, she couldn't bring it back up. After another two spells there seemed nothing left, although Rika could barely move. She couldn't feel any liquid jostling around in her stomach as she leaned against the wall. She let out several quick breaths feeling the floor spin around her. When it slowed she grabbed the sink, her hands shaking as she brought herself up. Her arms felt insubstantial...like jelly. Rika slowly followed the wall to the kitchen. There was cereal, as well as a range of juices. The cloying smell of jam filled the air. She considered whether to eat or not, as she would certainly throw must of it up again. Her hunger pangs won the war waged inside her however, and she slathered a piece of bread and took a huge bite.

Renamon fed herself sparingly, as the smell of the food was making her dizzy and unfocused. It annoyed her, as her sense of smell and vision were usually always acute and sensitive. Everything made her head whirl and it made her half-annoyed as well as curious. She had never been ill before....Was it because of some damage she had harnessed yesterday?

Rika finished her breakfast, not feeling much fuller than she had started. She had thrown up four times in twenty minutes and only a fraction of the stuff she had eaten remained. She was feeling less light-headed though, if still extremely nauseous.
124121.title: Morning Sickness

choices: Takato and Guilmon come home, rushing to the aid of the two girls (and touching
Renamon and Rika go into labor while the boys are still out.
124122.content:
Rika pressed a hand to her stomach as its growl was heard throughout the room. "Ugh... I don't feel so well." Guilmon looked at her with concern as she grimaced in discomfort.

"You okay, Rika?" asked the dino-digimon

"Yeah," she replied, getting to her feet. "You two go on ahead, we'll catch up." She quickly excused herself to the bathroom.

Takato was about to follow Guilmon to get some breakfast, but noticed a weird expression on Renamon's face. "You too, huh?"

"I believe it may have something to do with the connection between us," spoke the foxy fighter. "It feels as though she ate something spoiled, but you needn't worry about us."

Takato smirked. Those two never wanted any help. If they wanted to suffer through a flu or whatever by themselves, that was their business. "Okay. If you need anything, me and Guilmon will be back in an hour or so. Hope you feel better by then." As he got up to leave, he gave Renamon an innocent, reassuring pat on the shoulder.

Once,

twice,

three times. Little did he know that her morning just got four times worse.

Renamon stood up and sauntered over to the kitchen, watching through the window as the two boys raced each other down the street. Her stomach growled even more loudly than Rika's, and she quickly poured a glass of water to try and settle it.

Rika wasn't so lucky. She had already thrown up once, and she felt like she'd be forced into an encore performance at any moment. Her mind raced as she tried to imagine what she could have possibly eaten last night to have caused this, when suddenly, the feeling passed.

And then things began in earnest.

Renamon's eyes widened and gave an alarmed gasp; the glass fell from her hands and shattered on the floor as she wrapped both arms about her midsection, which was cramping up as though someone were twisting a fork inside of her. She grunted in pain as she felt her insides grow heavy. After overcoming her initial panic, she gritted her teeth and looked down at herself, noticing a sizable lump that hadn't been there before...

Rika cried out as she felt her insides do a cartwheel. She collapsed against the bathroom wall and hugged herself with her arms and legs, but it did little to quell the tremendous feeling of pressure mounting in her abdomen. She slid a hand under her broken-heart T-shirt and clutched her belly, only to discover flesh was bulging slowly under her fingers. In an instant, all thoughts of discomfort left her, and the girl stared down at herself with complete disbelief as she grew larger and larger. Her eyes wandered to the full-length mirror directly across from her, to the reflected image of the 14-year-old whose shirt was beginning to ride up on her. "Renamon!" she screamed.

"I'm here, Rika!" Renamon burst through the door, her hands flailing for purchase as she lost balance due to her newly gained weight.

"Renamon, make it stop!"

"I can't, Rika!" The digimom (pun intended) gestured helplessly at her own protruding girth, and it was clear to Rika that this was one thing her guardian could not defend her from.

A flutter of movement was felt by both of them, and Rika yelped in surprise as her partner's fears were confirmed. "It can't be!" she protested, "We're pregnant!"

It was as if this final acceptance triggered something deep inside them, for now the two girls grew even faster than before. Renamon arched her back over the sink as her belly grew in leaps and bounds. She kept one hand on the counter behind her for support, while futilely using the other to press down on the mass of life growing inside her. As distracted as she was, she still kept her eyes on poor Rika, who was clawing feverishly at the belt now digging into her belly.

Rika cursed herself as she felt the child inside her writhing against the double-studded belt, now far too tight to remove by hand. <Why'd I have to fall asleep in these clothes!?> was the thought running through her mind as she began to breathe in short, rapid breaths. Having no room left, the baby began to grow inwards, and her lungs compressed further and further until the girl feared she would black out.

"Nooo!" cried Renamon, as she watched her trainer faint from the strain, her belly blimping out from above and below the stubborn garment, pushing the shirt up against her breasts (now filling with rich, warm breastmilk to feed her growing offspring) and bursting the buttons on her jeans. Renamon pushed herself off the sink, but stumbled to the floor just short of Rika. Desperately, she wrestled to get up, but her stomach lurched as the second child began to gestate. Defeated, she gave a long, exasperated moan and ran her hands over her pulsating, watermelon-sized gravidity.

Rika awoke as her belt snapped, filling her lungs with air. Her belly instantly surged forth, pushing her shirt completely out of the way and ruining the waist of her jeans forever. Her chest heaved as she inhaled like it was going out of style, and her blurry, oxygen-deprived vision focused on the sweat-soaked display of motherhood bulging out of her. Even without placing a hand on stomach, she could tell that her infant was moving wildly. Soft moans escaped her lips as it continued to grow, defying all her fervent wishes of it ceasing.

Renamon couldn't take it anymore; she screamed as a third child took root in her womb, the other two shifting and moving inside her to give it room. Each time she inhaled, she watched her belly rise, but grunted as she exhaled when it didn't go back down. All rational thoughts left her as her all-consuming pushing the babies out of her. Unfortunately, it was not yet their time to go.

Rika grew silent as her infant stopped moving. A light shined through her skin as she felt a digi-egg form around her immaculate conception, and tiny tears formed between the broken heart shards on her shirt, stretched beyond its capacity by milk-laden boobs. Exhausted, she let her head droop to the side as she finally stopped growing, watching her best friend's frenzied movements as the fourth and final child took its place among the litter, the digimon's skin stretching thinly over a womb full to bursting with life.
124122.title: Pregivolution

choices: Path of Good
Path of Evil
1241221.content:
With their growth complete, Rika and Renamon pass out where they were. As their bodies rested, there minds lost in the blackness of a dreamless sleep, time passed. An hour after their departure, while Rika and Renamon still slept, Takato and Guilmon were walking along the exterior fence of Rika's house.

"I hope Rika doesn't mind I bought this," Takato thought out loud, looking down at the small box of over the counter flu medicine. After seeing Rika and Renamon feeling a little under the weather it was a nice gesture, but one Takato feared that Rika was going to take the wrong way. Then, when she took it the wrong way she would get mad, and Takato had the sinking feeling he was going to get thrown over the fence by Renamon.

Guilmon, who trotted playfully beside Takato, tilted his head to one side, examining the strange box when a strange smell hit his nose. He stopped, lifting his nose and sniffing the air. Still, a few moments after the smell had appeared it vanished, leaving Guilmon throughly confused.

"What's the matter Guilmon?" Takato asked, coming to a stop when he noticed his partner was no longer walking beside him.

"I thought I smell something, but when I went to smell it the smell was gone."

Takato blinked a few times, taking a moment to decipher Guilmon's sometimes confusing logic before saying, "You just must have caught a wiff of something in the air. Now come on, after we try to give this medicine to Rika we need to get back to the bakery before mom has a cow."

"All right Takato." Guilmon chimed, catching up with the goggled headed Digimon tamer as they gently opened the gate to Rika's house, stepping inside. Takato moved towards the house, Guilmon walking across the lawn and over to the pawn where a few fish twirled, making Guilmon smile as he watched them spin and loop around.

"Hey Rika..." Takato called out, walking through the house as he held the box of flu medicine, "If your still not feeling well I brought you some flu medicine. It's just some basic stuff but it should help you feel better"

Takato scratched his head, surprised he didn't hear Rika replying. He walked around the outside deck, smiling as he saw Guilmon, his gaze so intense that his head was bobbing and swaying with the fish below the ponds surface. After watching Guilmon for a few moments Takato turned, gently knocking on Rika's bedroom door as he called, "Hey, Rika."

Takato listened for a reply, but didn't hear anything but the street behind him. Anxiously, he began to crack the door open, calling out loudly, "Rika, I'm coming in. Shout if you want me stop if your... uh... just shout if you want me to stop."

Still, there was no reply. Takato's eyes narrowed as he opened the door wide, looking in on the empty bedroom. He turned his head a few times, eventually leaning his weight onto one foot as he scratched his head with the box of medicine. "Well where did they go?"

It was then Takato noticed that the door to the bathroom was cracked open and he could see Rika's hand lying on the floor. In an instant several instances clicked through Takato's mind. Could she have slipped and hit her head? Did she need medical help? Where was Renamon if Rika was lying on her bathroom floor? Did a digimon attack them or someone else?

As Takato felt his heart begin to race he quickly moved over to the bathroom door and pulled it open. In that instant where he expected to see Rika in a pool of blood with her head cracked open he instead saw Rika and Renamon, both their stomachs and breasts ballooned to huge porortions, Renamon looking like she had eaten a couple watermelons or was nine-months pregnant with four children. Just as quickly as he had opened the door Takato slammed it shut, turning and pressing his back against the door.

His mind was slipping gears, the image of Rika and Renamon stuck there while nothing came to mind. Finally, as the shock began to wear off a single name popped into Takato's head. Henry... With the bow of medicine dropping to the floor Takato raced out of the room, sprinting across the outer deck of Rika's house, slipping and falling halfway. The commotion was enough to draw Guilmon's attention, who watched his tamer bolt into another part of the house, making the red dinosaur curious until he saw the fish jump out of the water, his interest quickly returning to the pond.

=======================================================
Henry Wong's Apartment
=======================================================

"Yeah, Princess Pretty Pants saves the day with her lovely hat and with the help of her sidekick Mister Cuddelson" Suzie called out, holding up her hands as she looked at Terriermon and Lopmon, who were both on the verge of tears from the Pretty Pants torture Suzie was putting them through. Henry watched from the couch, seeing the game as punishment for earlier when Terriermon had scared him half to death by jumping out of the refrigerator.

It was then, as Suzie began putting a new hat on Lopmon that the phone began to ring. Henry turned his attention away from Suzie's game, picking up the phone and hold it to his ear, "This is Henry Wong."

"OH, THANK GOD YOUR THERE HENRY." Takato shouted, forcing Henry to pull the phone reciever away fromm his ear. When he was sure Takato was finished Henry put the phone back against his head, looking over at Suzie.

"What's the matter Takato? You've haven't shouted into the phone like that since Guilmon at all the bread at the bakery and you need my help to rebake it all before your parents got back."

"Henry, trust me, I've got a problem that is ten... twenty.... a thousand times worse."

"What's the matter?"

Takato sighed, taking a big breath before quickly saying"All right, after our tough fight yesterday I came over to check on Rika. She and Renamon were fine except Rika had a stomach ache. Still, she said it was nothing and both of them looked fine at the time so Guilmon and I left. Still, I wondered if Rika was getting sick so I went down to a nearby convenience store and got her some medicine. As I walked back I was worried if she would get made that I brought her medicine but I still went into Rika's house anyway. I couldn't find Rika for a while so I check her room and she wasn't there adn then I check her bathroom and I found her."

"So what's the problem. Is Rika made you brought her medicine or is she mad because you caught her while she was puking."

Takato groaned, finally spitting out the truth, "Henry, Rika's gotten pregnant."

Henry froze, holding the phone to his ear as he stared at the wall. "What!?"

"Rika is lying in her bathroom, passed out on the floor with a stomach that looks like she either ate an entire thanksgiving turkey or she's nine month pregnant with a really big baby."

"What about Renamon?"

"She's worse, it looks like she's carrying triplets, maybe even quadruplets. I don't know... All I know is I have no clue what to do."

Henry stood up from the couch at his apartment, holding the phone as he began to move towards his room. "All right Takato, I'm coming over. Still, it will take me a few minutes. While I'm coming try to get Renamon and Rika out of the bathroom. If there sick or even if they are.... pregnant, we can't leave them lying in the bathroom. Also, make sure nobody else comes into the house. For some reason, I think Rika would want only a few people to know about this if anyone at all."

Takato nodded, his heart starting to slow, "Thank you Henry." With that Takato hung up the phone, taking a few moments to calm himself down before he walked out onto the deck. "Hey Guilmon, come here. I need your help with something."

Guilmon lifted his head, scales soaked with one of the pond's fish bouncing on his nose. "Okay Takato." He called back, gently tossing the fish back into the pond before moving over to the deck, following Takato inside the bedroom. Takato glanced back at his partner, silently praying that the somewhat childish minded digimon wouldn't act any difficult questions when he saw what had become of Rika and Renamon.

Still, as soon as Takato pushed opened the door Guilmon's voice chimed through the silence, his head tilting to one side, "Why is Rika and Renamon so bulgy?"

Takato hung his head a moment, quickly thinking up an excuse to appease the red dinosaur, "There just sick Guilmon. That's why we brought them that medicine. Still, we need to get them to bed so they can get better."

Guilmon tilted his head to the other side, eventually saying, "They must be really sick."

[You have no idea Guilmon] Takato thought as he finished pushing open the door. "All right Guilmon, I need you to go to Rika's closet, get her futon, and lay it out on the floor. " The red scaled digidino nodded, quickly moving away from the door. Takato turned back, looking down at the hugly expanded Rika and Reanmon. He couldn't pick them up and carry them, they were to heavy even on a normal day. That meant he would have to drag them.

Takato heaved a sigh, moving towards Renamon since she was the closest to the door. He grabbed the digital foxes hand,trying to pull on her when his hand slipped and he tumbled back, smashing his head on the floor. With a groan Takato held his head for a moment, cringing as he bit back a cry of pain. After the the throbbing in his head had weakened his took hold of Renamon again, this time holding both her arms as he pulled her out of the bathroom and into the bedroom.

"Is this what you want Takato?" Guilmon asked, holding up something. Takato turned his head, and in an instant Renamon's hands dropped from his hand. Guilmon was holding up one of Rika's bra's, a small black one that had the suspicious look of being from Victoria Secret.

Takato grabbed the bra, quickly running back to the closet and throwing it in carelessly before taking down Rika's futon. "No, Guilmon, is what I wanted."

"Then what did I have?"

"Something... Rika would be mad you touched." Takato answered comfortably, moving to the center of the room and laying out the futon. He then went back to Renamon, grabbing hold of her arms as he pulled her onto the futon. Once her upper body was lying on the flat bed Takato took a moment to move her legs onto the futon before turning to Guilmon saying, "All right, this time I want you to bring Rika out of the bathroom while I go get another futon... Okay."

Guilmon nodded, smiling as he turned and began to walk towards the bathroom. Takato groaned, quickly moving back to Rika's closet where he had seen a second futon. Guilmon came out of the bathroom craddeling Rika in his arms, a confused look on his face as he set her down on the futon Takato had just laid out, "I think Rika spilt milk on her shirt."

Takato froze, his eyes drifting to Rika's expanded breasts where he noticed two small trails of milk which could have only come from one place. "Yes," Takato lied to Guilmon, "She must have spilt some milk. Now, why don't you go wait by the gate and tell me when Henry gets here."

Guilmon did as he was asked, running ignorantly out of the room, having no clue of the true situation that was contained within Rika's bedroom. Takato slid the window blinds shut, flipping on a light switch as he thought, [Here I was thinking I wouldn't have to worry about those kind of questions until I had a son.]

Still, Takato's attention was pulled when he heard a groan behind him. He turned, seeing Renamon stirring in her sleep. The goggled headed Tamer quickly moved to her side, watching as Renamon's eyes slowly fluttered opened as another groan escaped her lips.

"Renamon, are you all right? What's happened to you and Rika?"

"I don't know," The yellow furred digimon replied, her voice weak and carrying the tones of pain. "It started after you left and... and..." Renamon felt her stomach starting to turn over. Then, as it had started before, Renamon felt her insides suddenly do a backflip. Takato could only fall back on his but, his hand trembling as he witnessed something that he would never be able to forget.

As before Renamon held her stomach, the bulge in her body starting to grow. She tried to fight it as before, but her body was already weak. There was no way for her to fight it. Still, it was not in Renamon's nature to not try. She began to trash about, as if the sudden motions of her body would be enough to stave off her growing children. Still, her belly expanded, and Renamon let out a scream as she felt a sixth child begin forming, the overcrowding her womb becoming worse.

The worst part was the pain Renamon felt as her skin was stretched to its limits. She was going to burst apart, explode from the tremendous pressure building in her body. Still, as she lifted her hands up, trying to push down her enlarging stomach Renamon couldn't help but glance over at Rika. The red haired tamer was much more worn out by her experience, but even in her sleep she began to toss and turn and Renamon could see the blanket of her futon beginning to rise, Rika's pregnancy growing as the tamer slept.

Renamon howled in pain again, a seventh child taken root. Takato sat in utter shock, his eyes wide as he continued to watch Renamon expand. Her stomach could have rivaled a championship pumpkin at some small town county fair and yet it was still growning. At the same Takato saw something else that shocked him even more. Above the bulge of her stomach, her white chest fluff was rising up. From beneath the long fur not only two but four breasts began to rise, growing like bread baking in the oven. There tits were hard, standing erect as the breasts continued to bloom, growing even faster then Renamon's heavily impregnanted body.

A final yelp from Renamon was the sign of an eighth child taking root. Renamon could now no longer reach her belly button, the small indication to the center of her belly, which had become an outy far earlier in the growth, continued to grow farther away. It was then Renamon also began to feel the heavy weight in her chest, each breast having reached the size of a large grapefruit before they began filling with what would be mother's milk.

Finally, after the few tense moments of expansion the process began to slow, coming to a stop as Renamon breathed heavily, head resting on the pillow of the futon. For a few moments there was only silence, a few moans from the sleeping Rika as her own expansion began to finish, leaving her with a much more engorged belly and two, distinct ovals resting beneath her skin.

Takato finally found his voice, trembling as he leaned back forward and looked over Renamon, "Are you all right?"

Renamon shifted her head, glaring up at Takato, "Does it look like I'm all right?"

Takato cringed, realizing the stupidity of his question. Mindlessly he began to reach out his hand, fingers touching Renamon's shoulder as he said, "Here, let me help you get up."

Still, the moment Takato touched Renamon felt the strange sensation return, and with a wide eyed realization she quickly shouted, "Don't touch me Takato."

Takato pulled his hands back, startled by the abruptness of Renamon's command. He then began to reach out again, his voice asking, "I'm just trying to help you get up."

Renamon stared wide eyed at Takato's hand, and was finally forced to take a last defensive messure. With a wide sweep of her arm Renamon grabbed Takato by the throat, her fur touching his skin before she threw him back. Still, as she felt the process of growth beginning again Renamon managed to force out, her breathing becoming short and quick, "Don't... t... touch me. Touching me... causes..."

That was all Renamon could force out before her voice was consumed in moans of pain as her skin stretched further, making room as a ninth and tenth child joined the nursery that had become Renamon's body. The yellow furred vixen Digimon groaned, her hands pressing against her stomach as she tried desperately, hoping that finally she could stop the expansion. Still, it was no use. Soon, Renamon's stomach had come to a stop again, the massive ball of flesh now larger than the rest of Renamon's body.

Takato say back, holding his throat where Renamon had choked him. It was then that...

=================================
The road forks, and the traveler must choose the path of good or evil.
=================================

Option 1(Good Path): Henry arrives, and Takato tells him about what happens.

Option 2: (Evil Path): Takato approaches Renamon, deciding this would be his only chance to live his ultimate fetish fantasy.
1241221.title: Takato and Guilmon come home, rushing to the ai...

choices: Agree with Takato not to do the tests
Begin tests
12412211.content:
"Takato, Henry's here." Guilmon's voice chimed through the room, sounding to Takato like the song of angels. With only a final glance over at Renamon and her mountainous, pregnant belly Takato slipped out of the room, running onto the deck where he saw Henry standing by Guilmon, Terriermon hanging from his usual spot on his tamer's shoulder.

Takato ran up to Henry, tripping a second time on the smooth surface of the exterior deck and falling down at Henry's feet. The blue haired tamer bent down, helping Takato off the deck as he asked, "Okay, I'm here. Now, explain everything to me on more time."

With a nod Takato began, carefully lying out everything that happened before he called Henry. Then, with a bit of anxiousness, Takato began telling Henry of what happened after he had hung up the phone, including Rika and Renamon's expansion to even greater sizes.

"Whoa, Henry, you didn't tell me about all this when we left." Terriermon said in awe, looking over at his tamer.

"That's because I didn't want Suzie or anybody else to hear about it. Still, you said Renamon threw you back. Did she do anything after that?"

Takato nodded, "Yeah, she got even bigger. Still, before that she did say 'Don't touch me. Touching me causes.'"

"Causes what?"

Takato shrugged, "That's all she said. After that it was back to moans of pain and more growth."

Henry held his chin, bending his head downward slightly, "Maybe... she meant to say that touching her is somehow causing this. Still, I need to be certain. Terriermon, go back to my bike and get that box I left in the basket. Takato, let me see Rika and Renamon."

Terriermon and Takato nodded, the green bunny digimon jumping off his tamer's shoulder, floating through the air to Herny's bike while Takato took Henry to the bedroom door, sliding it open as Henry looked inside. A few moment's later Takato shut the door, Henry's face pale as his mouth hung agape.

"I thought you were exaggerating."

"Would I exaggerate about something like this?" Takato countered, looking slightly offended. Still, before more could be said Terriermon returned, holding the box that Henry had brought in his mother's bike. After opening the box flaps Henry pulled out a large, black plastic thing that looked like old briefcase. Still, upon opening it up Henry revealed that contained within was a large mishmash of computer circuits, wires, an old screen and a keyboard.

"What's this?" Takato asked, looking at the device.

"It's something I've been building with my dad. It's a more advanced form of the scanner. It should let us see what's going on at the very least with Renamon's body. We may luck out and it could work on Rika, but I can't be certain."

Takato moved a bit, stepping off the deck as he looked over Henry's shoulder. The strange, cobbled together device roared to life old green lines of code appearing on the screen. As Henry began to type commands on the keyboard, he said, "This is first working prototype my father and I have managed to assemble. Because of it, it only has some basic command line programming. We were hoping to start coding some proper software this weekend, but I have a feeling that plan just got thrown out the window."

With that Henry pressed the enter key on the old keyboard, the device humming as several small lights flicked on and off. Eventually, a series of names began to appear on the screen:

========================================
Detecting nearby entities to be analyzed......
The following entities can be analyzed......

1. Henry Wong (Tamer)
2. Takato Matsuki (Tamer)
3. Rika Nonaka (Tamer)
4. Terriermon (Digimon)
5. Guilmon (Digimon)
6. Renamon (Digimon)

Please enter the number of the entity you wish to analyze: _

============================================

Henry quickly reached over the keyboard, pressing the number six before striking the entire key. The screen went blank, the device whirlling again. Soon, lines of data began to stretch out on the screen. Everything from Renamon's height, weight, type, card number even to smaller facts like number of hairs on her body or favorite color began to appear on the screen. Henry flipped through the long list, his eyes searching until he found what he was looking for. A pair of facts, one directly influencing the other.

============================================

Current state of body: Pregnant
--Number of children being carried by entity: 10
--Basic Data:
----All Children are healthy
----All Children At stage of development where birth should occur
----Mother's body has not yet begun birth due to unknown factor

--Family Tree
-----All Children Share common ancestry:
------------Mother: Renamon
------------Father: Takato Matsuki
------------Means of Conception: Unknown

=============================================
============================================

Takato and Henry stared at the number for a few moments, there eyes narrowing. Finally, Takato found his voice, a weak tremble in his words as he said, "Ten!"

Henry took a deep breath, running a hand through his hair as he leaned back from the computer. "Takato, I need to know... did you..."

Takato blinked a few times, his face turning red before he shook it furiously, waving his hands, "No, No, No, No, No. I did not... I mean... uh.......Digimon aren't even supposed to have gender."

Henry nodded, "All right, I just needed to rule it out as a possibility. Still, ten children. If what Renamon said is true that the growth is initiated by touch, then in the morning you must have touched her ten times."

Takato began to look up at the deck's overhang, counting on his fingers, "Well, I tapped her to wake her up this morning, I patted her shoulder two, no three times before I left. Then, when I got back I tried to drag her from the bathroom, lost my grip and slipped. Tried again but had to stop because of Guilmon. Third time I got her onto a futon and after letting go grabbed her legs and put them on the futon. Then, after that I touched her one more time and then she grabbed me by the throat to throw me across the floor."

Takato looked down at his fingers, seeing that all of them extended and standing in the air, "That's ten..."

"And, for the time being that makes Renamon's theory our best guess as to what is causing this. Still, that leaves so many questions unanswered. We need to find out more, before we have find it out the hard way?"

"What are you suggesting?" Takato asked, a little confused.

"We need to run some tests."

"Tests, are you crazy Henry. If we test then we run the risk of making Renamon and Rika larger. Do you really want to do that?"

"It's playing an odds game right now Takato. If we find out now what can cause Rika or Renamon to get more pregnant then we can make sure they don't come in contact with it. If we don't, for the one child they may gain in the tests they may gain ten when something bad happens."

Takato crossed his arms, "I don't know Henry. I don't think Rika or Renamon would like the idea of being tested on."
12412211.title: Henry arrives at the scene.

choices: Rika wakes up
Something starts to effect Renamon
124122111.content:
"I guess your right." Henry said, typing a few commands into his self-made computer. "Still, we have to figure out what's going on."

"Something has to be causing this." Takato mentioned. "So, if we can figure that out maybe we can stop it from happening."

Henry nodded, "That's easier said then done. Still, if I take my scanning information to Yamachi then maybe he can help. Still, what are you going to do until then?"

"The only thing I can do, keep an eye on Rika and Renamon and help them without touching them."

"Then, might I suggest finding a pair of overalls and some gloves."

"What for?"

Henry eyed Takato for a moment, the goggle headed tamer quickly realizing exactly what Henry wanted him to wear overalls and gloves. So, after making sure they both understood their part Henry left with Terriormon, heading to Hypnos in hopes Yamachi would be able to help with the unusual situation while Takato ran home with Guilmon, after digging and rummaging through his closet for a while, Takato couldn't find coveralls but quickly found a long sleeved shirt and a pair of pants. Putting those two together, it was just as good. Thus, with the dark blue, long sleeved shirt and pants, a pair of rubber gloves jammed in his pocket, Takato and Guilmon began running back to Rika's.

============================================================================ ==

While the boys were gone, Rika and Renamon were left to rest. While Rika was in a deep sleep, exhausted from the experience, Renamon was starting to recover. She opened her eyes, staring at the ceiling. Still, even as Renamon hoped that it was all some crazy dream, she couldn't deny the mounds of white and the even larger mound of yellow that now took up the lower part of her vision. Renamon tilted her head downward, lifting her hands as she gently rubbed her largely protruded belly. The skin was stretched taught, and every once in a while Renamon could feel the babies inside her squirming, kicking at her sides. It was sometimes painful, but not nearly as bad as it had been when they were first growing.

After lying on her back for a time Renamon began to groan, slowly rolling onto her side. Then, using her arm as leverage, she was able to get herself into a sitting position. Her pregnant belly sat out in front of her, forcing the digimon to sit with her legs spread apart. Mindlessly, set one hand on top of her belly, gently stroking the fur as she caught her breath. Then, slowly, with another groan and a loud grunt, Renamon shifted herself into the shadows before reappear, using her special technigue to bring herself into a standing position. It was a strain on her back, Renamon forced to walk with one hand pressed on her back for support. Still, after taking a few moment to regain her balance Renamon couldn't help but smile a little. At least she was able to stand up.

Taking a tentative step Renamon waddled across the room towards Rika. The digimon knew it wouldn't be a good idea to try and bend down and check on Rika, having enough trouble just keeping herself upright. So, with no better option, Renamon just turned herself to on side, turning her head and looking down at Rika. The fire haired tamer was fast asleep, her own gorged stomach standing out from beneath her. It was a little odd shaped compared to Renamon's belly. While the digimon's gut was just a single, large circle Rika's had the distinct form that made it look like she was carrying a pair of digi-eggs in place of normal children.

Renamon tensed, feeling a particularly strong kick from one of her own children. That, and the longer she was awake the more powerful two desires began to press themselves in on her conscience. The first was the fact she needed to go to the bathroom, the other was the fact she was starving. Deciding to head to the bathroom first Renamon waddled around Rika, thankful she could still fit through the bathroom door as she got inside and shut the door.

After relieving herself Renamon waddled out of the bathroom and towards the the door. Still, actually opening the door proved to be a problem. Renamon to turn to one side, pulling the doors open one at a time before stepping out onto the patio. Still, without thinking Renamon turned, and her stomach slammed into something. Panicing, Renamon turned to see Takato sprawled out on the deck, Guilmon standing a few steps behind his tamer. Renamon's panic then grew, holding her pregnant belly as she expected to feel the pain of another child taking. Still, after a tense moments nothing happened and Renamon shifted her attention to Takato, who was just starting to get back to his feet.

"Are you all right?" Takato asked, worried he might have hurt Renamon or the children she was carrying.

"I'm fine but..."

Takato smiled, though Renamon couldn't see it, spreading out his arms and showing he had covered himself from head to toe. Long pants, long sleeved shirt, rubber gloves, a cough mask over his face, his goggles down over his eyes, and a hat on his head. The only part of Takato that was exposed was the back of his neck, and thankfully he had run into Renamon face first.

"I figured that if I don't directly touch you, then I can't make things worse."

Renamon smiled a little, thankful that Takato at least had some common sense. Still, her smile disappeared as a few of her children kicked in unison. Worried, Takato quickly moved forward, helping Renamon keep her balance since the pain was enough she actually began to wobble.

"You should really be lying down."

"I know but... I'm hungry."

Takato nodded, "Okay, Guilmon, go raid the kitchen and bring something back for Renamon to eat while I help her back to bed."

"Okay Takato," The red dinosaur chimed, turning and running off towards the kitchen as Takato led Renamon back inside and helped her lie back down. The digital vixen was thankful for the help, just lugging around ten children for such a short time fairly tiring. Guilmon came back from the kitchen quickly, carrying a few loaves of bread, some fruit, and an uncooked package of hamburger meat.

"Here Takato," Guilmon said, setting the food down beside Takato.

"Great job boy. Now, go keep watch at gate and come tell me if you see Henry, Yamachi, or anyone coming."

"Okay"

With that Guilmon quickly trotted off, glancing back as he said, "I hope you feel better Renamon." The red dino was then gone, shutting the door as he went to stand watch. Renamon glanced at Takato, who only smiled and rubbed the back of his neck, "Ya, Guilmon just thinks you and Rika are sick. He doesn't really understand what it means to be pregnant. Still, what would you like to eat first. There some bread, bananas, a couple apples, an orange, and some uncooked hamburger meat."

"Give me the meat" Renamon said, holding out a hand. Takato quickly passed the package to Renamon, who quickly tore it open and, with little concern for manners or edict, quickly began to eat the raw meat. Takato could only watch as Renamon devoured the meat, quickly finishing off the package before holding out her hand.

"Give me the bread, and please go get me some water."

Takato just nodded his head, passing the loaves to Renamon before standing up and running to the kitchen. Not sure how thirsty Renamon was, Takato found a pitcher and filled it with some water and ice before grabbing a glass and heading back to the bedroom. Renamon had already gone through the loaves of bread, and was now chomping voraciously down on the apples, barely taking time to chew before taking another bite.

Still, Renamon wasn't so lost in her food that she didn't see Takato, quickly finishing off one of the apples before holding out her hand. Quickly responding, Takato poured water into the glass and passed it to Renamon. The digimon had to tilt her head up a little to drink, but soon she downed the entire glass and then went back to chomping on the apples. Takato couldn't help but watch. The only time he had seen anyone eat like this was Guilmon when his father had made a very special batch of Guilmon Bread.

"Peel the bananas" Renamon spat, having taken the whole pitcher of water from Takato and drinking straight from it.

"What..."

"Peel the bananas"

Takato quickly clicked, his mind falling out of its state of awe as he grabbed up the whole bunch of bananas and began to peel. He removed each banana from its skin, passing it to Renamon who quickly shoved the whole thing into her mouth. After peeling all the bananas Takato began to take the skin of the orange, but as he did he moved to the door, cracking it open and shouting out at Guilmon.

"Hey, Guilmon, Renamon needs more food. Grab whatever you can find in the kitchen and bring it back here."

"Okay Takato" Guilmon shouted, quickly moving away from the front gate and running into the kitchen. Thankfully, just after Renamon had stuffed the entire orange in her mouth, swallowing it seeds and all, Guilmon came into the room carrying another load of food. Boxes of cereal, cans of food, a bag of potato chips, and a gallon of milk from the fridge. Renamon began to eat at it all, not even needing a can opener as she used her claws and impressive strength to rip the leads off the cans.

Another trip of food later, and Renamon's appetite had finally be satisfied. The mess of food wrappers and the such was impressive, Takato trying to clean it all up in a mild state of disbelief. Even Guilmon couldn't have eaten all of this. Still, Takato quickly realized that Renamon was eating for eleven, herself plus the ten babies she had started carrying in the course of a few hours.

"Thank you," Renamon muttered, her normal state of mind returning now that she was wasn't starving.

"It was no problem, Guilmon and I just brought the food from the kitchen. So, how are you feeling?"

It was a peculiar question, Renamon mindlessly lifted up her hands and stroking her belly. While this whole situation was very strange, she had to admit she didn't feel bad. Sure, there was the occasional painful kick from the babies, but otherwise she actually felt pretty good. Still, rather than answer the question Renamon asked one of her own, turning to look at Takato, "Do you know what's happening?"

"Well, kind of. I know that if I touch you you'll get pregnant with another kid, and since your already carrying ten I won't push my luck. Still, I don't know why its happening. Henry went to go talk to Yamachi, and I'm sure he'll be able to figure something out so... we'll know what's happening soon."

"Not soon enough," Renamon said, not enjoying the fact she was practically useless with such a huge, heavy pregnant belly and four, large, milk laden breasts. "How is Rika?"

"She's still sleeping." Takato replied, looking over at the red-haired tamer, "but I'm sure she's fine. Just tired. After all, she's done what takes most women nine months."

Renamon glared at Takato, not enjoying his attempt at humor. Still, after letting the awkward moment pass Takato couldn't help but shift his attention to Renamon's belly, the large orb of fur covered flesh larger then he was, at least if he was curled up in a ball.

"Might I ask what's so interesting?"

Takato snapped out of his strange state of mind, smiling weakly, "I'm sorry, I've just never seen a pregnant... anything up close."

Renamon just shook her head, and then cringed as she felt her babies moving around inside her. This time, it was all of them and it such a strong movement that Takato was even able to see Renamon's belly shift. After staring for a time Takato looked back at Renamon, his own curosity getting the better of him. "Do... do you mind if I feel?"

"Feel what?"

"The babies moving."

Renamon eyed Takato for a time, but nodded her head, "Go ahead, just don't take off your gloves."

Takato smiled, nodding as he slowly moved over beside Renamon's belly. He knelt down beside the large yellow orb, and with his hands still safely inside the rubber gloves Takato pressed them against the side of Renamon's stomach. For a moment nothing happened, and then Takato couldn't help but smile as he actually felt something moving inside.

"I'm sorry Renamon... but this is really cool."

"Well, you better think so, its your fault."

"How is this my fault?" Takato quickly asked in defensively.

"You're the one that touched me, dad."

Takato blinked a few times, the actually realization that these babies inside Renamon were his kids setting in. It was really strange, for a young teenager to realize he was the of not only a kid, but ten of them. Add on top of everything that their mother was Renamon, a digimon, and it was a very strange situation. Still, Takato couldn't help but smile as he turned back too look at Renamon's belly, his gloved hands still resting against the yellow, fleshy orb and feeling the children moving around inside. It was strange... but at the same time it was kind of cool.

============================================================================ ================

Of course, the sentimental moment shall end when one of two interruptions occur. You only have to decide which one.

Option 1:

Rika finally starts to come around, and after chewing Takato out, blaming him for everything, Rena's own bodily functions quickly start demanding her attention. After getting a little help from Takato, the red-haired tamer gets to the bathroom and then Takato and Guilmon have to both work to get Rika fed. Still, during the course of events, Rika's hunger gets the best of her and, instead of waiting for Takato to feed her, she shoves the tamer back. Takato stumbles, hitting the ground hard and and falling back a little until his head lands on Renamon's soft breasts. Still, the back of Takato's neck is the one part of his body that is exposed, and the connection quickly causes Renamon to groan and strain. Takato, in a panic, tries to get off Renamon but keeps falling, different parts of his neck coming in contact with Renamon.

Finally, the digital vixen shoves Takato away, but not before the damage is done, Renamon going through the pains of having another set of babies growing in the already cramped space of her womb.


Option 2:

While Rika is still asleep, and Takato is busy cleaning up the room, something starts to come over Renamon. Unsure it was the hormones from carrying ten kids or some other side-effect of the whole situation, Renamon starts to get the strange desire to have more kids, to be bigger. The sensation of the kids moving and kicking changes from pain to pleasure, and Renamon can't help but turn a seductive eye to Takato, the goggle-headed tamer unaware of the fact that Renamon now sought only one thing. To be touched by him, again and again, to have so many babies in her belly she couldn't have another without bursting at the seems.
124122111.title: Agree with Takato not to do the tests

choices: To test on Renamon, because digimon can endure more
To test on Rika, because Renamon is already carrying 10 kids
124122112.content:
"We have to go through these tests Takato. If we don't, Rika or Renamon may end up carrying over fifty kids. Doing tests is the lesser of the two possible evils."

Takato nodded, "All right, but which one should we do these tests on. Renamon is already huge and I don't know if Rika would appreciate being a guinea pig"

"Your right Takato. Renamon may already be at her limit. Still, we have to worry about Rika as well. She's only human, and we can't endure as much as digimon. If she has one or even two babies inside her, I think that's all she may be able to take. Still, I'm the one that wants to do the tests. I don't feel like being the one to pick who we'll have to put through the tests."

Takato grumbled, but agreed as he gently moved over to the sliding door, peering inside as he looked at Rika and Renamon. It was then he decided...
124122112.title: Begin tests

choices: Snakes on the Skin
The not so innocent game of Tag
1241221121.content:
"Then we better test Renamon. If we experimented on Rika both she and Renamon would be made. If we work with Renamon, she'll at least be more agreeable, especially if we explain that it will make it easier for use to protect Rika."

Henry nodded, agreeing with Takato's logic, "All right then. Before we go talk with them lets figure out what we know and what we need to test." With that Takato and Henry began to work, choosing to send Guilmon and Terriermon off to the kitchen. Both knew how playful those two could be and one wrong step could make the situation much worse.

Finally, fifteen minutes later Henry and Takato stepped into the room, Henry holding his analyzer device and a notepad while Takato carried a bucket he found underneath Rika's kitchen sink. Rika was still fast asleep, but Renamon lifted her head when she saw the two boy's enter, watching them wearily as they circled her and took a seat near her head.

"I hope you don't mind Renamon, but I called Henry."

Renamon shook her head, quivering a bit as she felt one of her ten children kick inside her womb. Henry and Takato glanced at each other, Takato beginning to empty out the bucket as Henry began to explain. "Listen, Renamon, my analyzer here says you have ten children, because of what you said, we figured out that Takato touched you ten times. Right now, that means your theory that this.... pregnancy... is caused by physical contact is our best guess."

"Still," Henry continued, "we need to know more about what kind of physical contact will cause you to get pregnant with another child. If we can figure it out, Takato and I can make sure you and Rika stay safe. The only problem is the only way to figure out what will make you pregnant is if we test."

Renamon cringed, holding her engorged stomach, "I don't know if I can stand anymore."

"We know Renamon, but your a digimon. Your body can stand a lot more than Rika's. We can run the tests on her, but who knows how much farther her skin wills stretch. From the looks of her skin she's already carrying two digieggs. Your body can adapt, hers can't."

Renamon lowered her head a bit, looking over at her sleeping tamer, seeing that Henry was right. In her tossing and turning of sleep, the futon blanket had slipped off Rika's body revealing her engorged breasts and stomach, which looked lopsided from the two strange oval shapes contained within.

"All right, if its for Rika."

Henry nodded, "All right Renamon. Takato and I have planned this out as best we can. All right Takato, go ahead with the first test."

Renamon turned her head away from Henry, seeing Takato sitting beside her with a pair of plastic gloves on his hands. Slowly the goggled headed tamer lowered his hands, pressing the plastic gloves against Renamon's fur. For a few moments the pair remained still, Henry watching his digi-analyzer. Finally, after a time Henry smiled, quickly writing something on the notepad he had found in another part of Rika's house.

"All right, that will make things a lot easier. It looks like you have to have direct flesh to flesh contact. Now, we need to see if dead flesh can cause the expansion."

Takato nodded, digging in the bucket and pulling out an old, lucky rabbits foot. Henry's scanner had already confirmed that the foot had come from a male rabbit, and with his hands still in the gloves Takato put the rabbit's foot against Renamon's skin and waited. Again, nothing happened, the only sound coming from Renamon as she occasionally bit back a yelp of pain, the children in her womb kicking at her body.

Henry nodded his head again, writing again on the note pad, "All right. Now, this time were going to see if the length off the contact has any effect." With that Henry looked over at Takato, who quickly shook his head. With a sigh Henry set down the pen and pad, turning to face Renamon as he reached out. " I guess, since Takato feels guilt enough, were also going to see if its something with you and Rika or if something about Takato and Guilmon is causing this."

A few tense moments passed, Takato grappling to get out a stop watch. once Takato was ready, t Henry set his hand against Renamon's skin, keeping it held there as he turned his head, watching the screen of the digi-analyzer.

A few moments after Henry touched her Renamon could feel her insides tensing again. The tensing grew worse quicker, as if her body was beginning to get efficient in producing new born children. Her gut began to expand, ballooning out more just as Renamon's breasts followed, expanding further as her tits began to thicken, becoming as large as the lid to a pop bottle.

"All right," Henry said once the expansion had ended, looking over at Renamon as he made notes, "The length of the contact makes no difference in the number of children created. Were almost done Renamon, just two more thing."

"And what is that?" The digital vixen asked, feeling the skin on her stomach was already stretched far to tightly for her comfort.

"First, we need you to try and reach over and touch Rika. We need to know if whatevers making pregnant is effected is gender specific." With that Henry motioned towards Takato, who used his gloved hands to grab Rika's arm and pull it off her futon, putting it within Renamon's reach. The yellow furred Digimon tensed for a moment, worrying about her own tamer. Still, with Takato and Henry watching Renamon reached out and touched Rika's hand, holding her breath as she did.

Still, when nothing happened Renamon breathed a sigh of relief, looking up at Henry and Takato to see both of them were smiling. Henry finished writing on the notepad, typing a few things on his digi-analyzer before looking back down at Renamon. "Only one more thing. We need to see if this is limited to human's and digimon or to anything."

Renamon looked up at Henry in confusion, but then turned her head when she saw Takato holding something. Her fur tensed, eyes narrowing as she saw what was in Takato's gloved hands. It was a snake. Henry saw Renamon's expression, quickly saying, "It's all we could find that was male, since we've already proven that you can't get pregnant from other girls."

Renamon sighed, lying her head back up as she stared up at the roof. "Just make it quick."

Takato did as he was asked, holding the snake securely as he lowered it down near Renamon's fur. With only a quick brush Takato let the tip of the snakes tail brush against Renamon. He then quickly pulled it away, holding the snake as he and Henry waited.

Still, as the two boys waited for the visiual results Renamon already knew what was happening, her gut starting to tense. With a grunt and groan, this time quieter than before, Renamon felt a twelth child take root in her body. Her gut grew even larger, standing so high that her belly button stood halfway between the floor and the ceiling. Still, as the growth subsided Renamon couldn't relax. It hadn't been as painful as before. Could it mean she was getting used to effects. It was a thought that frightened in the digital fox, even if she wouldn't say it to Takato and Henry.

"All right, so that makes our job a little harder. We can't let anything that's a boy and is alive touch Rika or Renamon. No humans, digimon, or animals. Insects I think are all right, considering I've seen a few small bugs from outside and some of them must have touch Renamon."

"Well, at least we don't have to put up a bug tent." Takato joked, holding the snake as he turned to put it back in the bucket. It was then...

================================

Option 1: The snake escapes and tries to hide from Takato and Henry beneath Renamon, constantly touching her.

Option 2: Guilmon and Terriermon come barreling in the room, playing a game of tag that has gotten completely out of control.
1241221121.title: To test on Renamon, because digimon can endure ...

choices: Growth of children in Renamon
Rika's twins get bigger
12412211211.content:
Still, as Takato bent to put the snake in the bucket he lost his balance, crashing to the floor as the snake fell from his hands. The small garden serpent, competely terrified from just being thrown, started to slither across the floor. Takato jumped to feet, cursing slightly to himself as he chased after it. The snake first started to heads towards Rika, but made a sharp turn as it ducked underneath the nearby dresser drawer.

Takato dropped to the floor, looking underneath the dresser as he saw the snake staring back at him. "Get a hold of it Takato," Henry said as he watched the scene unfold, "We need to get it back outside."

"I know," Takato said as he began to reach under the dresser drawers, his hands reaching for the snake. It was then that the snakes instincts shifted. It had been cornered, and once cornered an animal could no longer take flight from a bad situation. If you can't take flight, then you have to fight. With a low hiss as its only warning the snake lunged out and locked its teeth onto Takato's finger. The brown haired tamer cringed in pain, quickly drawing his arm out and flinging it around, trying to get the snake to let go.

The forces of nature eventually pulled the snake off Takato's finger, sending it flying through the air where it landed flat on top of Renamon's already child ladened stomach. Rena cringed, feeling a thirteenth child starting to form as her skin began to stretch even farther. How much could she take before it was to much. Still, the snake didn't seem satisfied, quickly slithering towards the edge of Renamon's belly before dropping down her side, loosing and regaining contact with her about three time before hitting the floor and then slithering beneath the covers of the futon.

"Get... get it out...." Was all Renamon could force out as the snake wriggled beneath the sheets, loosing contact with her skin before regaining it a few seconds later. Takato just watched in horror as Rena's pregnant belly continued to grow, and Henry's eyes were getting wider as he saw the number of children slowly grow larger and larger.

"We have to get that snake." Henry shouted, stating the obvious but breaking Takato out of his surprised trance.

"But how, if we touch Renamon we impregnate her."

"Renamon," Henry muttered, moving closer to her head, "You have to turn over, just enough so we can grab the snake and get it back outside.

Renamon bit her lip, trying to hold back her groans of pain, "I'll....... try..." With that digital vixen took a deep breath, all of her muscles strainging as she began to tilt herself to one side. Takato stood ready on the other side, watching as more and more of the futon underneath was shown. Then, he saw the snake, and with lighting fast reflexes snatched it from beneath Rena, moving over to the door before chucking it unceremoniously outside.

With a groan Renamon flopped back onto her back, cringing as she held her stomach. Her stomach continued to grow, her fur getting stretched thin and her belly button sticking out further. At the same time her breasts were ballooning, starting to reach such a size that they were now becoming more like large, milk filled bean bag chairs. "It wasn't a dream," she said to herself, "I'm really carrying a digiegg! But why!?"

Renamon nodded. "Okay. First, after we clean up a little, let's find our..." she shuddered, and said, "...our children."

Between them was Rika's daughter, slightly larger than the other two, vaguely lizardlike in appearance, red scaled with tiny, batlike wings on her head, a white belly with a hazard sign on it, and a rumpled head of red hair.

Slowly, the two newfound mothers approached their children. They sat down on the bedmat staring at them. Rika's grin widened, as she placed a hand on her face.

"My baby," she said, gently reaching down to pick up her daughter. The young infant stirred, blinking awake and looking confused. She saw Rika as she arranged the two of them so that the was cradling her, and the baby gurgled happily, smiling up at her. Rika giggled despite herself, a warm feeling growing in her heart as she held the young infant.

All I remember is going to sleep after that awful battle, having some weird, but really nice dreams... heh, this seems like a dream, now that I think of it, even though I know it's real... and then Gogglehead and Guilmon... waking us up..."

Takato, as he worked rapidly to produce a meal, held the phone on his shoulder as he conversed with Henry. It wasn't going well.

"...Takato, you've got to be kidding me."

"I only WISH. Look, Henry, just grab Jeri and Lopmon, and see if you can find Ryou and get them both over here NOW. And make sure that Terriermon understands NOT to touch Rika or Renamon, because I guaran-damn-tee that one or BOTH of them will kill him if he does."

Henry, on his end of the phone, blinked. Takato NEVER swore. He must really be serious.

"...Okay, we'll be over as soon as we can. What about Kazu and Kenta?"

Takato thought for a moment, moving some sausages around in a pan, and sighed. "Get Guardromon if you can, but make sure they both stay behind. I don't think I can trust them not to make this worse. I've already got FOUR kids off of Renamon and Rika's working on Guilmon's second."

"Good grief Takato..."

Takato sighed. "And Henry... Don't tell Jeri everything, okay? I want to explain this to her myself."

Henry nodded, understanding. "Got it, Takato."

Takato hung up the phone, presumably to finish cooking. Henry stared at the phone for a minute, and then sighed, hanging it up and rubbing his temples. Susie wandered in, cradling Lopmon in her arms. She yawned and layed down on the bed, falling asleep quickly.

On top of Lopmon.

The floppy-eared, brown-furred ex-Deva whimpered softly and squirmed out from underneath her Tamer, sighing. She caught sight of Henry and frowned.

"What's wrong?"

Henry blinked, not having realized that "Write a note to Susie. We need leave now."

Lopmon frowned, old warrior's instincts rising within her, "Is there danger?"

Henry shook his head, picking up the phone and dialing again. "I don't know..."

12412221211.content:
((Edited on 9/14/2007 by FFtheSnake))

----------------------------------------------------
At Henry & Terriermon went to Rika's
-----------------------------------------------------

"I don't care how you feel, you two need to stay away," Henry yelled to Kazu and Kenta over the phone, "While we deal with this, you two need to make sure there aren't any rouge agents attacking!"

"Oh all right," Kenta said sadly, "I've just never seen a birth before."

"Knowing you two idiots, you'd end up as fathers yourselves!" Henry hissed, making sure Jeri didn't hear this last statement, as he'd only told the full details to Kazu, Kenta, Guardromon, Lopmon, and Terriermon, Guardomon carrying Henry, Jeri, Lopmon, and Terriermon.

Jeri, sitting next to Henry, frowned. "Sounds like whatever caused this is really bad. I hope Rika and Renamon are okay."

Henry grinned weakly. "I'm sure they're fine," he said. ---Takato,--- he thought, you better hope you can explain this well enough...

--------------
At Rika's
---------------

Rika grumbled softly, hugging Riklmon to her breast as she fingered her swollen belly. While the sensation of being so full of life was not entirely unpleasant, and the feeling of her child nursing at her breast was nicer than even she would admit, it was still aggravating. She felt so helpless. Just one touch and she'd swell up with life again...

Renamon was having similar feelings. Her sons were nursing eagerly from her breasts, resting comfortably up against her baby-swollen belly, her cubs squirming about inside her tummy. She glared over at Guilmon, who was curled up in a corner of the room, not entirely understanding what was going on and afraid he'd make things worse by doing something.

Eventually, a knock on the door came.

"Come in, Takato," Renamon said.

Takato came in carrying several plate of food, setting them down on a nearby table. "Um... I didn't know what you like, so I just kinda made what I could find..."

Both Rika and Renamon managed to surprise themselves by managing to smile.

"It smells delicious, Takato, thank you," Renamon said. She and Rika gently set their children down and tried to heft themselves up. Takato, thinking quickly, grabbed a broomstick and let them hold onto it to pull themselves up.

"Egads, goggle-head, you're actually thinking," Rika taunted. Takato just blushed as the girls sat down to eat. They began eagerly scarfing up the food, both women surprised at how hungry they were.

Takato just stared in amazement. "Yeesh. And I thought Guilmon could eat."

Both girls ignored him.

The doorbell rang, and both Takato and Guilmon went to answer it.

Jeri, Henry, Terriermon, and Guardromon were standing there, looking curious.

"Hey guys, glad you could make it. Rika and Renamon are in the kitchen eating, so I guess you can just come on in."

Jeri smiled at Takato and hugged him, and the two went in together with all the others. Guardromon immediately walked over to Rika and Renamon, who looked up from their food and greeted him politely.

"Would you object terribly if I performed an experiment?" he said.

"Depends on the experiment," Rika said. Before anyone could react, Guardromon gently poked Rika in the shoulder.

There was a stunned silence as everyone in the room waited for Rika to expand again.

But there was nothing.

"I thought so," Guardromon said, the rest of the room breathing a sigh of relief, save for Jeri, who was just confused. Guardromon nodded, and said, "Due to my mechanical rather than organic nature, I am in no danger of accidentally impregnating the two of them. I will supervise their medical care."

"Wait. WHAT?!" Jeri said, confused beyond belief.

Takato sat her down, and said, "I wanted to be the one to explain this to you... Something happened to Rika and Renamon. Now, whenever a guy touches them, even something as simple like the poke Guardromon did, they get instantly pregnant."

Jeri looked from Rika and Renamon, who gave her embarassed looks in return, then to the three children, who were playing with Guilmon, who had lightened up a little, then back to Takato. Slowly, it began to dawn on her.

"Oh Takato..." she said, shaking her head, "Which ones are yours?"

"Renamon's four," he said, "Both the ones already born and the two she's still carrying. Rika's daughter and the one still in her belly are Guilmon's."

Jeri sighed wearily. Renamon stifled a burp and said, "If it's any consolation, Takato didn't intend this any more than we did."

Jeri shook her head. "I know, I know, it's just..."

Renamon shook her head. "Jeri. I know this is disturbing for you, but we need as much help and support as we can get. We're..." Renamon looked at Rika for a moment. Rika nodded, and Renamon sighed. "We're scared. This isn't some enemy we can drive away with our attacks. Just one touch from any male, and we balloon out with life again... We need you to be strong. Remember what Leomon told you, and bring that lion's heart to bear."

Jeri smiled softly, remembering her long dead partner. Her courage and confidence bolstered by Renamon's words, Jeri sighed and hugged Takato, giving wordless forgiveness. She then turned to Henry, who had been sitting quietly with a worried-looking Lopmon, Terriermon having wandered over with a ball to play with Guilmon and the children.

After a moment, Henry said, "Is there anything else you'll be needing? Diapers, or something like that?"

Renamon and Rika traded looks. "Well..." Rika said, looking over and smiling softly at her and Renamon's children, "...they don't seem to need them."

Henry frowned. "Still, it'd be better if we had them, and any other baby supplies we could find. Also, I'm going to get my Dad and Yamaki over here. Are your Mom and Grandma reachable?"

Rika shook her head. "After we came back from the battle with those two angels, they had to leave for a couple days."

Henry sighed. "Less explanations to have to have, then."

Takato chuckled weakly. "Rika's mom would probably kill me..."

Rika gave him a mischievous look. "Of that I have no doubt."

Takato whimpered softly.

"ENOUGH," Henry said, "We need to focus here. Lopmon, can you do anything from the Digital angle?"

Lopmon frowned, and scratched her head. "Well... I was created to be a warrior. I could ask the Sovereign about this, but I doubt any of them would be able to help much," she said, sighing, "I am NOT looking forward to Zhuqiaomon's reaction..."

Rika and Renamon set their utensils onto their plates, finished with their meal. Renamon folded her hands and thanked them, not forgetting her manners. Lopmon left to find a Digital void to consult with the sovereign over the matter.

Jeri watched as Guilmon played with the digimon/human offspring. She walked towards them as she got onto her knees. As Guilmon was with the twins, little Riklmon notice Jeri and slowly waddled to her. She picked up the little digimon, as it giggled adorably. "Oh, it's so adorable," as she held it up to her face. With a small smile to her face, she heard a scream from the other room.

==============
In the Kitchen…
==============

She ran into the other room with the others, with Riklmon in her arms and Kyo and Ryu in Guilmon's, as they both saw Renamon collapsed to the ground, going into labor. "Renamon!"

"Rika-- I, AHH!" She was struggling from the pressure in her stomach. She laid there as Guardromon connected her heartbeat to his systems, keeping her relaxed as well any other reason. She felt her insides twist into knots with the feelings of her offspring moving inside her. Her current cubs were on Guilmon, observing what would happen. She was soon giving birth as the others observe the miracle. The two looked similar to Kyo and Ryu, but one of them had two tails instead of one, and the other had lavender fur on its arms similar to its other's cuffs.

She held the two newborns in her arms, cooing them as everyone congratulated her in unison.

"Congratulations." Everyone said in unison. The two other cubs pounced down from Guilmon and joined their newborn siblings on their mother's bosom.

"Their so… small." Jeri commented with a smile on her face.

"They are aren't they?" She felt the warmth in her heart as she nursed the newborns.

"So what will you name them?" Rika asked, holding Riklmon when Jeri give her to her mother.

"I'm not sure." She thought for a moment. She looked at her little daughters. "Mai… and Yuri."

Takato and Guilmon cleaned up the juices and afterbirth while trying not to touch her and Renamon's stomach recedes to how it was like pryer to this crazy day. Seeing the process, Rika lightly frowned as she looked at her stomach and the life growing inside her, but directed her attention to her daughter, which cheered her up but only a little bit.

Jeri saw her and tried to cheer her up. "Don't worry Rika. We'll help you through all the way," as she stroked her ballooned womb. She gasped, "I can feel it kicking." Rika smiled, but not by that much.
