Riklmon yawned and fell asleep in Rika's arms, as the others saw, blushing from its "adorableness", as Renamon's sons and daughters did the same. Renamon got back up, still with the weight of her breasts throwing her off kilter, as she walked into Rika's room to put them to bed.

Rika gave the sleeping digimon to Jeri. Rika's eyes widened as she fell to her knees, feeling that her water broken. She hollered, as Jeri in her friend's distress, she ran to Rika's room were Renamon pulled the covers over her children. Renamon's ear twitched as she turned around and saw Jeri with Riklmon still asleep in her arms.

"Renamon!"

"What is it Jeri?" She asked as quietly as she could.

"Renamon! It's Rika! Her second is coming!" Renamon widened her eyes at what she heard, running with Jeri to the other room as she left her children sleeping.

============
The Other Room…..
============

As Rika was on the floor, Guardromon held onto her shoulders, Renamon came and held onto her hand, with Jeri standing in the back, calming the startled Riklmon.
Rika's pregnant belly started to glow, showing that it was a digiegg, as everyone else saw in amazement.

Rika didn't see as she was still struggling, she was stunned from such pain, with the feelings of the digiegg moving through her. The others tried to comfort her through the process similar to how she helped Renamon earlier. She felt the Digieggs was beginning to reach the surface, moving through her hole.

It stretched her as it left her body. The Digiegg eventually left her. It was white, with a collection of orange dots decorating it. They all looked back at Rika, who passed out from the strain. Jeri gave Riklmon to Takato while she left to get a wet rag. Takato showed a face of surprise while Riklmon simply stared at him, with neither of them knowing how to react with each other.

Jeri came back with a warm rag and rubbed the sweat off of Rika's forehead. Rika woke back up, still sore from the conception. She try to get up, but wraps her arms around her stomach, still stretched out and trying to heal.

"W-Where is my…"

She looked and saw the digiegg laying their on the floor and felt feelings of warm emotions coming over her. Jeri came with the wet rag and scrubbed the egg's surface clean. The digiegg started to glow,as the shell shattered to pieces, showing the little glowing creature from within it.

Rika picked up the little digimon with the same emotions when she first saw Riklmon.

"Oh, my baby," as she held it in her arms. It was similar to Riklmon, but it had large bat-like wings on its back rather than on its head, but it still had the red skin, little claws, red hair and hazard sign. The little critter looked at Rika with a curious look on its face as Rika smiled at it. The little creature started to smile and giggle at it reached its arms to her, allowing her to hug her newborn.

Jeri put the rag away and sat on her knees, seeing the love they felt. <Thank you Leomon, I see what you ment.>

That was when Jeri touched Renamon....

"Oh no," she held on to her stomach as it started to expand as everyone else got out of the way to see what was happening "not again." She could feel the newest unborn forming into her womb. "OK, mommy-- eh, can't take much more--" as she struggled with her ballooning stomach. She almost passed out, but was able to stay on her knees. Maybe she was starting to get used to it.

Jeri fell on her back and watched, scared of what was happening. She looked at her hands as they where shaking, unable to fathom what she did. "B-But how?!"

Rika got back up with both of her babies in her arms. "We thought so to."

124122212111211.content:
"But how did this happen?" Takato asked, standing there in pause.

"I'm not sure. Jeri touched me once and got me pregnant, but isn't happening again," Renamon answered, looking at Jeri, leaving her head against her stomach.

"But she touched me and it didn't happen to me." Rika pointed out, cradling her children.

Henry started to think to himself, putting his hand to his chin. "Maybe… maybe some of Leomon's data was still with Jeri, and all he needed was some access data to reassemble." Everyone else pondered what he said and all thought he made a good point.

Takato thought further. "I guess that was all of the data since it isn't happening again."

Jeri got up and started to shed tears. She jumped over to Takato, hugging him with powerful feelings. "Takato," she continued, "Leomon is coming back." She cried intensely as Takato slowly started to hug her back.

Rika slowly started to smile, seeing both Jeri's touching moment and her children sleeping in her arms. "Hmm," she pondered, "Jerilmon." Jeri heard this and bent down to her and wiped her tears away. "Yeah, Jerilmon would make a nice name."

Jeri looked at Rika and felt the warm feeling in her heart. Rika got back up without disturbing her babies and walked to her room. She opened the door to her room as quietly as she could and came to her bed. She came to her bed were Renamon's fox cubs were still sleeping and placed her sleeping kids onto her spare pillows and pulled the covers over them and looked at them sleeping. She looked at the sweet offspring and couldn't help but blush at them.

"There so sweet." She looked at the door and saw Jeri who followed her to her room. She walked to her and got on her knees like Rika and joined her as she watched the kids. Jeri started to blush. "Umm… whats… it like?"

"Hmm?"

"Whats it like… to be a mother?" Jeri was uncomfortable asking her.

Rika started to blush with her and tried to answer. "Well… it feels like-- like, like you have something to take care of. Like your heart melts." She started to rub her stomach. "And when your pregnant, you feel like you are feeling another's heart beating. Like You are giving life to another. It feels nice." She blushed further.

"Really?" Jeri started to blush further.

"Could you… keep a secret?" Jeri looked at Rika with a curiose look. "I… I actually always wanted to be a mother." She clenched her hands together. "To show my mother how to really be a mother."

"Rika?"

"My mother never really was there for me. She dressed me like a doll but never actually considered what I wanted." She started to frown strongly. "I wanted to show her how to do it right."

Jeri frowned and hugged her softly as Rika shed her tears. She let go and sat back down next to her. "I wish I knew my mother. She died when I was little." The two-tailed child of Renamon's woke up slowly as it stretched like a kitten. It looked at Jeri and Rika with its big eyes, as Jeri reached out to it and picked up the little girl from the pillow without disturbing its kin. Jeri held it carefully as she tickled the fox's belly, as it purred and giggled. "I just don't want any of them go through the same thing I went through." As she played with the little fox, both showing joy.

"You know, Renamon and I have always told ourselves to be strong… but I'm not sure if I can know. It has all happened so fast." She felt she was gonna cry, but she tried to hold it in.

Jeri couldn't believe her ears. 'Did she really say that?' she wondered "Well, if you can't do it for yourself than… do it for them." She handed Mai (the fox) to Rika, giving her the same look she did to Jeri. "Thanks Jeri." She put Mai down and hugged Jeri.

Rika let Riklmon and Jerilmon down to the floor, as they crawled over to Guilmon as he made a sweetened expression to the both of them.

Henry tried to answer. "Well, we might be getting close to something, but there still isn't that much to help us explain."

"Takato wait," as Jeri grabbed his hand. Suddenly, she collapsed to the ground on her knees. She felt her stomach fill with water and a child fill her womb, with a surge of pain stretch her way. Everyone gasped at what they saw. She held onto herself as she slowly became heavier. She fell to her side as her insides twisted and shifted around. "Takato…" as she passed out.

"I'm here Jeri," as she saw that he was holding onto her hand with a pair of gloves.

Jeri felt shock echo in her body as she started to form tears. "What? I can't be pregnant." She started to cry. "I'm just a kid, and I don't know how to deal with it." She let tears roll down her cheek, as everyone looked at her with sorry eyes. "I don't know how to be a parent."

Rika hugged her, feeling what she was going through. "Don't worry Jeri. We'll get through this," as Jeri hugged her back with the same feelings.

1242.content:
(Author's Note: Given the interactive story limitations that free users have, I'm not sure what's gonna happen when I try posting this chapter, but here goes nothing.)

         Impmon stood outside the Nonaka residence feeling very nervous. "Should I even be here right now," he asked no one in particular? "I guess I have to tell them eventually, especially after what he told me." He then reflected on everything that happened since the D-Reaper was defeated.

========================================
About 10 months ago, only 2 months after the D-Reaper's defeat...
========================================

         Once Digimon were able to return to the material world, Impmon had been hesitant to do so himself; he feared that if he let himself become Ai and Mako's partner again, they'd treat him like a toy again, which was the last thing he wanted. After 2 months of consideration, he gave it a shot, only to find that they had found a new partner; a Gabumon who seemed to enjoy being treated like a toy. Impmon initially felt heartbroken that his old partners had replaced him, but that feeling was quickly replaced by the realization that he'd never have to worry about being treated like a toy again. "Wow I dodged a bullet on that one," he thought as he went to find a new Tamer, preferably one over the age of 7.

         He didn't have to look far, though; he met a young boy about 3 years older than Takato and the others. His name was Fuyuhiko, and he and Impmon hit it off quite well; after obtaining a Digivice from Hypnos, their relationship as Tamer and Digimon became official. After about 4 months together, Fuyuhiko learned about Impmon's pranking habits. He didn't mind at first, but after another 4 months, he grew tired of it and made Impmon knock it off, which Impmon did (albeit reluctantly). Fuyuhiko also told Impmon that he should let anyone he's ever pranked that his pranking days were over and apologize to them, much to his chagrin.

(Author's Note:
To whom it may concern: no, Impmon's Tamer isn't Fuyuhiko Kuzuryu from Danganronpa 2, but I had hoped for you to make that connection. I gave Impmon's Tamer the name "Fuyuhiko" as a reference to how Impmon and Fuyuhiko Kuzuryu share the same English voice actor. I'm not kidding; look it up if you want.)

========================================
Back in the present...
========================================

         "If I have to tell everyone," he thought, "I'll have to tell Rika and Renamon eventually. I might as well start with them." He wasn't sure they'd believe him or accept his apology, but he had to do it anyway. "I just hope they don't attack me on sight." With that, he opened the door and walked in.

         "Whoa, these girls are loaded," he said, awestruck by how expensive the house looked on the inside. Rika was fairly wealthy; one of the perks of having a model for a mother, naturally. As such, she and her family lived in a pretty impressive house, one that was much bigger that its exterior would suggest. "I can't get distracted by that," Impmon said, shaking his head. "I need to find those girls and apologize for all the pranks I've pulled on them and their friends."

         He eventually found them asleep in Rika's bedroom, but he was a bit surprised by what he saw; Rika and Renamon were lying on the bed, hugging each other tightly and nuzzling each other. Stifling a giggle, Impmon climbed up onto the bed, placed a hand on each of them and shook them awake. Yawning, both girls woke up and Impmon climbed down off the bed. When the girls saw him, they immediately got annoyed.

         "What do you want, Impmon? This had better be good," Renamon said, glaring angrily at Impmon; if looks could kill, Impmon would've died right then and there. "H-hi, girls," Impmon nervously replied. "My new Tamer Fuyuhiko made me give up pranking, and h-he wants me to apologize to everyone I've ever pranked." Rika's annoyance faded and confusion took its place. She asked; "New Tamer? You had a Tamer before?" Impmon nervously replied, "It's a long story, and it's really not important. I-I just wanted to let you guys know that I'm sorry for pranking you and your friends, and that my pranking days are over."

         Renamon's eyes narrowed. "That sounds sketchy to me; how do I know that this isn't a prank?" Impmon flusteredly replied, "I-it's not! Honestly, it's not! I promise!" Rika sighed; she had only just woken up and wasn't in the mood to argue. "Fine, we'll believe you for now," she said. "But just know that we're holding you to your promise; if you prank us again, so help me I'll--" "I won't, I won't!" Impmon shouted; he looked and sounded absolutely terrified."

         "Good," Renamon said, still skeptical. Impmon breathed a sigh of relief. "Thank you. Well, I don't want to take up anymore of your time, and I still have to have this same conversation with all 5 of your friends, so I'd better get going," he said. "I'll let them know you're coming," Rika said, reaching for her phone. "Thanks," Impmon said. "I guess I'll see you around." And with that, he left.

         "You don't really believe him, do you," Renamon asked? "I don't trust him as far as I can..." she trailed off when she realized what she was saying. "As far as you can what," Rika asked? She was busy texting Takato and the other Tamers that Impmon was on his way. "I was about to say 'as far as I can throw him,'" Renamon began, "but then I remembered that I could probably throw him over the horizon if I wanted, so that analogy wouldn't really work." "I see," Rika said, hitting the "send" button on her phone. "Well, I don't really trust him either, but we just woke up and I wasn't in a mood to argue, so..." "I guess that makes sense," Renamon said. "So, what are we gonna do today?"

========================================

Option 2: The babies inside the girls need nourishment. An intense hunger hits the girls and they need to eat.

Option 3: Nothing happens, and the girls are fine... at least for now.

Rika awoke to a face full of pillow. Groggily, she rolled over, rubbing her eyes to better see the familiar ceiling of her room. For the first time she could remember, she had woken up before Renamon - whom she had always known to watch over her long before dawn came. Rika gave her digimon partner a long, thoughtful look, watching the fur on her torso rise and fall under her lavender-braced paws. Rika may have been the trainer, but it was Renamon who fought the hardest. It only made sense that she slept so long after last night...

Discreetly, the girl gave a yawn, and fixed her hair, which hadn't been mussed to badly overnight, as her sleep was quite sound. She rummaged through her wardrobe to find a clean pair of jeans, and another of her T-shirts bearing a blue broken heart.

Normally, she had several of both, but her work-busy mother couldn't be bothered to do the laundry this weekend. Funny how the woman spent all day looking at clothes, but as soon as she came home, they were invisible to her. "Damn it mom, what am I supposed to wear?" she vented to herself. She knew her mother would be at work even this early, and probably wouldn't be home until later that night.

Rika tiptoed out of the room, careful not to disturb Renamon, and made her way downstairs to the kitchen. As her mother spent more and more time at the office thinking up new fashions (which would ultimately be tested on her daughter, usually without consent), Rika became more and more used to fending for herself. She turned on the oven and prepared to cook some miso soup and rice, bringing two pots of water to boil. While she waited, she decided to look for a fresh change of clothes.

She knew that her only choice was to raid her mom's scrap pile in search for garments her size. She picked through a few of the failed 'goth girl' projects, around what she dubbed the 'anorexia line,' jeans not wide enough for even her slim frame, and finally settled on an almond-colored silk button-up blouse and a semi-modest black leather skirt. The sleeves were a bit long, and the waist a bit wide, but she was too lazy to look further at the moment. <Besides,> she thought, <I think that water's ready.>

As she turned to head back to the kitchen, one of her mom's sketches caught her eye. It didn't look like somthing her mom would design, the sizes were way too large for the kind of girls she made clothes for. But looking closer, she realized it was a maternity line, obviously sketched with teenagers in mind. Rika was no stranger to her mother's occaisional crackpot ideas, and shook her head as she remembered reading in class about how Japan had one of the lowest teen birth rates in the industrialized world.

But still, it reminded her of her secret fantasy, which she had kept secret even from Renamon. She always wanted to know what it was like to be pregnant, to provide for something so helpless, it had to live inside her. <If I were pregnant,> she reasoned, <I'd show mom how to be a *real* mother.> But even more than that, she wanted to feel a baby kicking in her womb, to buy a nursing bra for milk-weeping nipples (imagine: not being flat-chested!), and to feel her skin stretch as she helped the life inside her grow strong. She soon became lost in the vision of herself at the ninth month, passing a hand over the fleshy confines of her unborn son or daughter, smiling radiantly with a motherly glow. After hearing the water boil over, she snapped out of it, salvaging the meal just in time.

Miso soup and rice was her traditional breakfast, but after a week or so, she was beginning to eat her finished dishes with tastelessness. She looked in her cupboards, and soon found two bottle of mysterious, clear liquids, one pink, one blue. They were of similar make, and likely came as a set, but having been removed from their original packaging, she hadn't the foggiest idea what they were, other than perhaps impulse buys from one of her friends during a digi-dollar spending spree. For all she knew, they could have been the Digital equivalent of ipecac.

Still, she was desparate, and giving the pink substance a sniff, decided it was safe, emptied a few tablespoons into the rice. It tasted sugary, and surprisingly thick. But it went down smoothly, and left a comfortable warmth in her stomach. She fixed a plate for Renamon, wrote her a brief note, and left.
-------
Renamon woke with a start, sitting upright as a dream of last night's events ended abruptly, she could not see her partner, could not sense her through their bond, and nearly bolted for the window before spotting the breakfast tray next to her. She held the note awkwardly in her large fingers and read Rika's hasty handwriting:

"Renamon:

Nothing left in the house for lunch.
Out shopping for your favorites.
I made you some extra helpings of
breakfast, eat up! You fought hard last
night.

Rika "

The foxy digimon sighed as she realized her best friend was safe, although she hated it when she went places without her. "If it makes her happy, I'll stay here for now," she said to herself, lifing a portion of rice to her vulpine mouth. "We'll have time to spend together later." She hesitated at the appearance of the pink rice, sniffing it with concern. The smell was not familiar to her keen nose, but in the end, her trust in Rika won over her suspicion, and she cleaned both bowls, washing it down with lukewarm miso soup.
-------
Rika put the last carton of instant noodles in her shopping bag, and heard a loud rumbling in her gut. It had only been about 45 minutes since she left her house, but she was starting to feel hungry again. At this, she took a few extra items, and hurried to the checkout counter. The line seemed to take forever, each customer chatting it up with the clerk as though they truly had nothing better to do. The boy standing in front of Rika gave her wierd looks every time her tummy rumbled; she blushed, and would not meet his eyes.

By the time she left the store, she was feeling considerably worse, and began to have sharp hunger pangs halfway home. Fearing she wouldn't make it, she turned down a different street, ending up at Takato's door.

"Rika! What are you doing here? No, lemme guess: you've become a social butterfly?"

Takato grinned like an idiot, but the self-proclaimed Digimon Queen wasn't amused. "Can it, dweeb. Can't I do anything nice without you going stand-up comedian on me?"

The young boy rolled his eyes and gestured her inside. "Sheesh, don't take everything so personally. I'm a nice guy, once you... you know - actually speak to me once in a while." Rika opened her mouth to protest, but got cut off as Takato changed the subject. "Have you had breakfast yet?"

"No," she lied, eyeing the spread he'd laid out for himself and Guilmon.

"Well, lughead's not here right now, so I guess you can have some of... his...?" Rika had already begun, devouring junk food and wholesome dishes alike faster than a ravenous Greymon. Takato managed to sneak a few plates away during her greedy feeding frenzy, but at the end, he'd had less than a fourth of the feast.

Takato watched as she leaned back in her chair, one of her rare contented smiles upon her face. "Um... are you feeling okay?" She seemed lost in thought, almost dreaming. He heard a soft grumbling from her overworked organs, prompting a rub from her soft, feminine hands. She sighed happily as she rubbed her new paunch, making Takato very uncomfortable.

Renamon drummed her fingers across the table, her patience beginning to ware thin. Rika should have been back with food by now, but she still hadn't come back. Renamon sat back in her chair, holding her stomach which was growling as if a great beast was contained within. Renamon didn't know why or how, if it was the intense fight yesterday or not, but was starved out of her mind.

Renamon sat up from the table, walking into the kitchen as she began to search the cupboards. Unfortunately, everything was either empty or to old to eat. The only thing Renamon was able to find was a blue bottle, and after smelling it she realized it was similar to the pink stuff that had been over her rice that morning. Still, not completely trusting of the liquid, Renamon set the blue bottle back and picked up the pink, downing what remained of the sweet, syrupy liquid.

Still, as Renamon threw the empty bottle away she only felt her hunger increase, the ravenousness of her stomach starting to cloud her judgment. She couldn't wait anymore, she needed food. Without even thinking about Renamon disappeared from the house, racing through the shadows until she reached the closest grocery store. While still remaining in the shadows Renamon stole plastic bags, filling them quickly with any type of food she could get a hold off. Without a single customer or worker at the store seeing her, Renamon had taken enough food to feed a family for a week, whisking it away back to Rika's house.

Renamon dropped the bags of food flat on the table, some of the contents spilling out on the floor. She had gotten fruit, vegetables, meat, fish, milk, donuts, and a whole mess of other things. Without even thinking about cooking anything, Renamon began to tear at the food, stuffing it all down her throat at a glutinous pace. In half an hour she had eaten everything, her stomach sticking out like a four month pregnant woman. Still, as Renamon laid back and enjoyed the feeling of a satisfied stomach she felt another powerful urge overpowering her body, an urge she had never experience before.

Since the amount of digimon entering the real world had increase Yamachi had begun hiring talented men and women to work along side the tamers, offering support and fighting as best they could. Each tamer had been assigned one member of the digital squadron, and for Rika it was a college aged man by the name of Derden Hierento. Because of his job and duties, Derden had spent a lot of time with Rika and Renamon and, in such, had become a good friend of the pair. He was also a fairly good sparing partner, willing to fight with Renamon whenever she needed to train.

As Renamon's mind drifted to Derden she began to think of how handsome he was, how strong and well built he was. For some reason, she desired him just as much as she had desired food a few minute before. It was like a hunger, and Renamon knew that her desire for Derden would only go away if she satisfied that desire, though she still didn't know quiet what she wanted from him.

Only a few minutes later Renamon landed on the balcony of Derden's apartment, the digital squadron captain living close to the Hypnos building so he could walk to work and enjoy Shinjuku park. Without even knocking Renamon pushed open the glass sliding door, stepping inside the apartment as she began to search for Derden. Eventually, she heard the sound of running water and made a bee-line for the bathroom.

Remembering some of her manners, Renamon knocked on the door and cracked the door of the bathroom before calling out Derden's name. From the back of the room Renamon could hear Derden cursing, quickly shutting off the shower and grabbing a towel. A few moments later Derden opened his bathroom door, holding a towel over his lower half as he looked at Renamon.

Derden was a fairly handsome man, but to Renamon in that moment he looked like an angle. He was originally born in Australia, but had moved to Japan when he got accepted at the local school for martial arts. He was now a master at multiple forms of martial arts. When graduated the academy, instead of going to college, he went into the army and became a ranking commander. That was how he got his position on the digital squadron, for his fine service record and amazing fighting skills which put him on equal ground with some champion level digimon.

"What in blazes... Renamon... what are you doing here? Don't tell me we have another disaster on our hands, I haven't even had a chance to recover from yesterday and that whole 'end of the world' scenario."

"No," Renamon said, "There isn't any trouble."

Derden grumbled, having to look down at Renamon since he was almost a foot taller than her. It was then he noticed the large lump in Renamon's belly, a confused look crossing his face as he asked, "Did I miss the all you can eat buffet at hypnos?"

"No," Renamon replied a second time, "I just... was so hungry a few minutes ago. I couldn't control myself, I ate ten grocery bags worth of food. Now, I have that same powerful urge but at the same time I don't want food."

Derden let out a tired sigh, running his hands through his hair, "Uh, okay, let me finish taking my shower and I'll help you get whatever you want." With that Derden back into the bathroom, his wet feet flapping against the floor and the sound of running water returning to the room.

13.content:
======================
Rika's High School...
======================

Rika sauntered through the school like she owned it. Since she and her friends had defeated the D-Reaper, they had been famous. Rika and Renamon in particular, had been admired. Renamon's skill was adored, and Rika herself over the years had become quite the proficient fighter. Everyone liked her, and it was a kind of adoration she could appreciate. Respect for her skill and actual friendship.

Then one day, someone tougher showed up.

It was a Chinese transfer student, a year younger than Rika, but at least twice as muscular. Her legs were thick, knotted ropes of muscle. Her arms BARELY fit into the sleeves of her uniform. Her chest was solid, a wall with two smallish breasts attached. Her name was Chunli, and Rika dismissed her out of course. She had seen good-looking muscular women, and this freak certainly did NOT qualify as one of them.

Unfortunetly, Chunli had plans of her own. She ambushed Rika after school, and sent her flying into a locker with a kick to the stomach. Rika hit hard enough to dent it, and slid to the floor, coughing and wheezing.

"The Digimon Queen. Pathetic," Chunli muttered, and raised her fist to bring it down on the dazed Rika's head.

But as Chunli's fist flew down, it was intercepted by Renamon, who easily threw the larger girl aside. She glared at her, and prepared a Diamond Storm attack should she try anything else.

Chunli just shook her head. "When your Tamer recovers, tell her that she just had her ass handed to her by Chunli Dohei, the strongest woman in the world," she taunted, sauntering off and laughing.

Renamon frowned, and helped Rika recover, dispersing the attack and cradling Rika while she got her breath back.

"*kaff* T-Thanks Renamon. What the hell was that about?"

Renamon shook her head, waving off several of Rika's friends who came to check up on her. "I don't know. She asked me to tell you that you had had your 'ass handed you by the strongest woman in the world.' I got here after I felt the first kick."

Rika chuckled weakly, getting unsteadily to her feet. "I'm glad you did... But dammit, she needs to pay. I need to get stronger somehow, so she can't do that again."

Renamon sighed. "I'm having similar problems. I don't know if I'm just going soft, or Kazu's a better Tamer than we think, or Guardromon's just that strong. In a sparring match today, I couldn't even dent him. I even hurt my footpaw while kicking him."

Rika shook her head. "This is ridiculous. We need to get some extra power before we lose any more face."

"BONE BAG!"

"MOP HEAD!"

Rika and Renamon were laughing a bit to themselves as the two started play fighting again. Still, within the hour the quartet had sat down at a veritable feast, the digimon Babamon once again cooking enough food to feed a army of tamers and digimon.

"While we appreciate your visit, I have the feeling you two didn't come all the way out here just to keep us company."

Rika nodded, finishing drinking from her water. "Ya, we were wondering if you could help us with something."

"Don't tell us, the D-Reaper's back."

"No," Renamon replied, "It's not something at serious."

"Good, because I still ache from that fight."

"You always ache."

"Actually," Rika interrupted before the pair could get going again, "We're here because of someone at my school. There's this new girl from China, big, strong, and mean. She managed to launch me halfway across the school hall and into a locker with a single kick."

"That's pretty darn strong for a human." Babamon commented between bites of food.

"Yes, and I lost a sparing match to Guardromon."

"That Kizu..."

"Kazu"

"Kazu kid must be doing a great job helping him get stronger then."

"That or me and Renamon have started to slip," Rika said, though it wasn't a thought she particularrly enjoyed. "So, that's actually why we came here. We were wondering if you a way for us to get stronger."

"Well, you could always do what you did in the past, defeat digimon for their data." Babamon said, but after seeing the pairs reaction smiled a little, "But, you don't want to be killing innocent digimon just so you can win a fist fight at school."

"Absorbing digimon's the hard way to go about it anyway." Jijimon commented before getting a large mouthful of rice.

"The hard way?"

"Yes," Babamon replied, "I know of a few old home remedies that are guaranteed to increase your strength without all the hassle."

Rika and Renamon smiled, glancing at each other. "That's great, what are they?"

"Well, that depends. I have some things Jijimon and I used during the D-Reaper incident, temporary boosts in strength. Still, I have a feeling you two are looking for a more permanent solution."

"If you have something that can do that."

"We do," Jijimon commented, wiping his mouth, "The only question is how much stronger do you want to be and how fast to you want to get that strong."

"As strong as possible," Renamon said.

"As fast as possible," Rika quickly added.

"Well, we usually don't tell this secret to anybody, besides Azulongmon we're about the only two digimon in the whole digital world that know about it. Still, you two have good reason for wanting to get stronger and have good level heads. I think we can trust you with the secret."

============================================================================ ===================
What is the secret to amazing strength Jijimon and Babamon hold. Pick an option to find out.

Option 1: It's a special potion. The instructions are simple, drink a serving of the potion and then start working out the muscles you want to make stronger. The potions effects last for one hour, and has astounding results that are quiet visible to the pair.

Option 2: It's a spell, cast by the two old digimon. The way it works is if the pair ever get into a fight, then they will start get stronger during the fight until they are twice as powerful as their opponent. This will let Renamon beat Guardromon and Rika defeat the girl at school, but what will happen the next time the two spar against each other.

Option 3: A little bit of a mixture path. Jijimon and Babamon's secret is that of mind over matter, the pair able to will themselves stronger if they want. Still, to get the ability Rika must gain a small bit of digital nature while Renamon, for that part of her bodily code to be unlocked, has to do something no other digimon has ever done. Give live birth. (This is an unbirthing/then birthing option between Rika and Renamon.)
1322.title: They go seek Jijimon & Babamon...

choices: Renamon wants more
To defend the city, the pair have to keep going
13221.content:
After they had finished dinner Jijimon pushed the table to one side of the room, making space for Babamon to put a large, black cauldron. In true fashion of an old witch she filled the cauldron with water, using fire underneath to bring it to a boil. Thankfully, the dining room had a vent out the roof for this kind of thing, keeping the room from getting too smoky. Jijimon came from somewhere in the depths of the pairs home, carrying a basket of stuff. Babamon smiled, taking a few of the items as she either tossed them straight into the water or diced them up using a knife. It was strange, but they weren't weird or even uncommon ingredients. It was food, a variety of foods just prepared and then put in the boiling water. Rika, having brought on along a backpack with a few supplies, found a notepad and began writing down the ingredients as Jijimon and Babamon added them.

"There," Babamon said about twenty minutes later, when the water in the pot had turned practically turned into a stew, a dark brown liquid with bits of meat and vegetables floating among its contents. "Now, all we need to do is expose this stew to a certain item and it will become the potion.

"What item is that?"

"This," Jijimon said, reaching down to the box on the floor before lifting up a bit of crystal. "It's a piece of Azulongmon's crystal castle, and in such it has very special powers and properties."

"And with the crystal present, hanging above the liquid, all that is needed is a small incantation to activate the crystal's power."

With that the pair began speaking in unison, the crystal giving off a small flash of light as they said the incantation.

"Surge and broaden, growth and power
Let they who swallow a gulp of this potion
Be gifted with ability for the following hour
Let their toils of labor offer even greater strength
Let their power surge exponentially forth
And let never this gift turn sour."

Rika and Renamon were surprised when after the last few words were done the stew quickly started to turn a strawberry red color, everything in it dissolving away into just a liquid.

"There you are, one Jijimon and Babamon Eternal Strength Potion, guaranteed to work or your money back."

"They didn't pay money," Babamon corrected.

"Your satisfaction guaranteed." Jijimon attempted again, sinking an empty milk gallon into the cauldron and filling it with the red mixture. He gave the gallon of the liquid to the girls while Babamon gently tossed a match onto the liquid. Catching fire, the remaining potion began to burn away in the pot.

"Why are you doing that?" Rika asked, not wanting to see all that potion go up in smoke if it really did work.

"Because, you two only need a gallon at best."

"But then why did you make so much?"

"The crystal fills the potion with the same amount of power no matter how much is there. If we had made a smaller batch, then the power contained would have been more concentrated. Making it in this large of batch will give you all the strength you need and shouldn't overwhelm you."

Rika and Renamon nodded, being polite and thanking the two aged digimon as Rika silently slipped her notepad back into her backpack.

"Now, listen carefully because I'm only going to say these instructions once. To make yourself stronger take a drink of the potion before you begin a workout. For every swallow of the potion you drink will make the effect last an hour. So three gulps, three hours. This will work up to eight hours, and if you start drinking more potion than that in a single setting its effects will start to increase and I wouldn't suggest it. While under the effects of the potion, work out any part of your body you want to have it increase in strength and you should find the results quiet amazing."

They left the old couple a few minutes later, the pair quickly breaking out into a fight since it was just part of life for them. While thankful for to the pair for giving them the potion, Rika was skeptical about how well it would work. Since she had written down how to prepare the potion, and most of the ingredients were just common food items, the pair decided to use the Hypnos portal to make a quick stop at Azulongmon's crystal palace. After searching the nearby area for about an hour they found a small broken off piece of the palace, about the same size as the crystal possessed by Jijimon and Babamon.

With the crystal tucked away in her bag and Renamon carrying the gallon of potion, the pair returned to the real world. Deciding there wasn't any point in waiting, Rika and Renamon returned home. Since they had a few spare rooms in the house, due to the fact it was bigger than it needed to be size for a family of three plus one digimon, Rika had convinced her mom to turn one of the rooms into a home gym for her and Renamon. It wasn't a big room, but thanks to its array of multifaceted equipment, like the Bowflex home gym and things like that, it had more then enough machines to give the girl's their usual work out.

"So, which one of us is going to try this first?" Rika asked, opening up the lid to the gallon and sniffing at the liquid, which really didn't have an odor.

"While I trust Babamon and Jijimon, I would feel better if you let me go first Rika."

The red haired tamer nodded, disappearing for a few seconds before returning with a glass. She poured a little bit of the liquid inside, just enough to give Renamon a good sized, single swallow of the potion.

"So, you feel anything."

"Well, besides the fact that the potion tastes blueberries," Renamon said, looking over her body, "I don't really feel anything else."

"Try using one of our weights," Rika said, pointing over to the rack of hand weights. They ranged in a variety of sizes, from smaller 10 pound weights to larger ones that neither one of them could lift, but came with the set anyway. Renamon picked up a fifty pound weight, usually a mid-range work out for her digital body as she began to do a few reps. Rika distracted herself sniffing the potion, trying to figure out how something red could taste like blueberries.

"Rika, I think the potion is working."

The red haired tamer turned, setting down the gallon of potion before moving over to Renamon. The digital vixen was still doing reps with the fifty pound weight, but each rep was becoming faster then the last. Also, every time Renamon flexed her muscles they didn’t quiet unflex all the way when she lowered her arm. Her arm was actually becoming visibly more muscular with each repetition.

"It actually feels like the weight is getting lighter." Renamon said, finishing off a rep before setting down the weight. She held out her arm, letting both she and Rika examine the new musculature that had seemed to form.

"Wow, how many repetitions did you do?"

"No more than twenty," Renamon said, gently prodding right arm to find that it in fact felt larger and firmer than her she remembered.

Rika smiled, pouring herself a single swallow of the potion before quickly drinking it down. "Okay Renamon, let's go show them that we're still the strongest galls around."

============================================================================ =============================================

(Author Note: It's never specified so we'll say its a few years after the D-reaper incident. The tamers are in the Japanese educational systems equivalent to just beginning high school. In all, the tamers look the same if only a little taller in comparison to their partners. The digimon look the same, of course. To put a size reference to it, most of the tamers are now tall enough that they are about equal height to Renamon, where in the time of the show they were all about a head shorter than her. Also, lets say after a little work between the parents the gang ended up going to the same high school, a school good enough to get them into good colleges but not to over the top for people on smaller family budgets than Rika's family.)

"So, how did you do on your math test?" Henry asked, he and Takato walking down the hall. It was a co-ed school, though Takato and Henry didn't see very much of Rika since they didn't have any classes with her and her locker was at the other end of the school. It was lunch time, so Takato and Henry were putting their books away so that they could grab their lunches, the cafeteria's food never something you wanted to eat on a daily bases.

"I didn't do to bad, about an 85%."

"That's a solid grade, and to think you didn't want to study that weekend."

"I hate studying for math," Takato grumbled, making Henry laugh a little as the pair reached their lockers. Both began spinning their combination when, out of no where, Takato felt someone grab him by the back of the neck and haul him off the ground. The next moment he found himself pressed up against the wall.

"What the heck are you doing?" Henry asked, looking at the girl who had just pinned Takato against the wall. It was Chunli Dohei, the girl who had dropped kick Rika for no other reason then she wanted to and could.

"Showing everyone that you tamers aren't so tough. You all think you’re so strong because you have your digimon, but they won't always be around to protect you. And then its people like me who are strong without anyone else that are the real big hitters in this world."

"Put him down." A voice called from down the hall. Chunli, Henry, and Takato turned their heads to see Rika standing there, a very pissed off look on her face. Chunli smiled, dropping Takato and leaving him coughing, gasping for air as she walked down the hall to the red haired tamer.

"Didn't learn your lesson last time,"

"No, I'm here to teach you a lesson about being a pigged headed putz."

Chunli's anger flared at this, bringing her fist around with full intention of punching Rika right in the face. Still, thanks to her training with Renamon, Rika dodged the punch and launched her own, her fist plowing into Chunli's gut. The big, overly muscular girl stumbled back, the wind being knocked from her lungs. "What... what the hell?"

Rika just smiled, gently pulling off her uniform jacket. School uniform policy, at least for this school, was that you had to wear the school's selected bottom and jacket, but that the shirt underneath could be anything as long as it was a single, solid color. Usually, Rika wore a white long sleeve under her jacket since the lining of the uniform bothered her arms. Still, for today, Rika had chosen to wear a sleeveless, white shirt. Upon taking off her jacket, the tamer revealed her new, more muscular body. It wasn't like Chunli, where her body was bulged out in odd places that didn't look right. For Rika, it was different. While she definitely had greater strength and musculature from the potion, she and Renamon had a set workout pattern that had worked for them for years. It made it so that not just one part of Rika's arms, chest, or torso was overly muscular, but every muscle had been given its due intention. It made Rika look strong, but at the same time didn't subtract from, maybe even added to her natural beauty.

"Whoa... Rika?" Henry said, jaw hanging agape at the sight of his friend. He had seen Rika without sleeves before, they had sparred together at his master's dojo. Still, the once strong but thin and smooth arms that were once attached to Rika's body now had sturdy muscle definition. Also, if Henry didn't know better, he would have said Rika's shoulder's also look broader, and her chest seemed puffed out more, not from her breasts she had developed in high school but from something else.

"What was that you said yesterday, about being the strongest woman in the world..." Rika taunted, getting into a defensive potion. It was like setting fire to a stick of dynamite, Chunli exploding as she charged Rika, fist ready to plow right into the red haired tamer's nose. Rika, however, brought up her arms, blocking the punch before shifting and kicking Chunli in the side, sending her toppling to the ground. Chunli attacked a few more times, Rika always only counter attacking. It was so she could defend herself in case the school tried to punish her for fighting. Chunli would get in trouble for attacking, but she wouldn't get any trouble for defending herself.

Finally, Chunli had worn herself out and, thanks to Rika, was now sporting a black eye. "Don't... don't think this is over. I'm still... the strongest woman in the world."

"No, you’re just the biggest knuckle head in the world." Rika said, picking up her backpack and jacket before walking over to Takato and Henry, who were still staring at her awe struck.

"So, you two okay?"

"Ya, we're fine." Henry said, only to be interrupted by Takato.

"Man Rika, when... when did you get... so... I don't know... buff."

Rika smiled, flexing a little and showing off her muscle definition, "Renamon and I just started a new workout program and it’s having amazing effects, really intense stuff."

Henry whistled, shaking his head, "It's impressive all right. I wonder what Kazu will do when he sees. You know him and Kenta have been talking about what it would be like to be even half as strong as this.”

" Ya, but it doesn't help that their definition of a workout is shouting instructions while their digimon spar. Besides their gym class, I doubt those two do anything that could really be considered a workout.” The trio had a laugh at this, Rika slipping on her jacket again and concealing her arms.

===============================================================


“I don’t believe it,” Kenta half moaned as he walked towards Shinjuku park with Kenta, planning to meet up with their digimon partners.

“No, really, Takato was telling me about it during last period. Rika and Renamon started some new workout, and its amazing. The last time we saw Rika she could kick our butts, but her arms didn’t show it. Takato says that Rika now looks buff.”

“Buff shmuff,” Kenta countered as the pair entered the park. “Rika can be as strong as she wants for all I care. As long as me and Guardromon can still beat Renamon, I’ll be the best tamer around.”

“Oh really, care to prove it.”

Kenta and Kazu stopped, looking up into a tree where they saw Renamon’s blue eyes glowing back. Kazu quickly got fired up, enjoying any excuse to be able to prove himself as a great tamer.

“Didn’t get enough butt kicking last time?”

“Kazu, what are you doing? Remember what Takato told me, Renamon’s been doing the same workout Rika has.”

“You worry to much. She couldn’t even dent Guardromon last time. No workout in the world can change that in less than a day.”

“So, I guess that means you’ll take up my challenge.”

“Just let me go find Guardromon and we’ll be more than glad to.”

Ten minutes later Kazu, Guardromon, Kenta, and MarineAngemon were standing on the far end of the an open plot of dirt in the park, one of Kenta’s favorite places to have sparing matches with the other tamers. Kazu was smiling as if he had already won, cupping his hands around his mouth.

“Hey, Renamon, you there? We’re ready, that’s if you aren’t to chicken to come fight us?”

At his provocation Renamon dropped out of a tree at the far end of the sparing area. At a distance, the digital vixen didn’t look any different. Still, as Renamon slowly stepped forward the smile began to slip from Kazu’s face, becoming replaced with an open jawed gape.

Renamon had even better results with the potion than Rika, her digimon body taking to the changes much more freely. The best comparison to Renamon would be a woman that was in the army. Arms and legs were well defined with muscles, each curve well shaped by the workout. Her shoulders had become a little farther set apart, Jijimon and Babamon’s potion also allowing a person’s bone structure to change to fit their increased muscle mass.

To Renamon’s chest, it was more defined. Digimon were genderless, so Renamon didn’t have any breasts, but the white fur puff on her chest definitely stuck out more because of her larger pectoral muscles and, as the final touch to everything, Renamon had the early beginnings of what could, in time, become six pack abs.

“How… how did?” Was all Kazu was able to stutter out, his hand shaking as he pointed at Renamon.

“Can’t give away my secrets like that. So, are we going to spar or do I need to go find a challenge?”

Kazu shook his head, competitive instincts bubbling to the surface. “No way, Guardromon will still kick your butt. Let’s go…”

“Actually, I’d rather not fight.” Guardromon asked politely, only to get a cold glare from Kazu. Finally, he moved towards Renamon, putting up his fists. Renamon smiled, taking a defensive position before using her two fingers to give the well known “come and get me” hand sign.

Guardromon shifted a little, and then quickly jolted just to Renamon’s left, obviously intending to hit the digital vixen in the side. Renamon turned, blocking the blow and getting sent into the air. Kazu was about to make a cheer of victory when Renamon span around in the air.

The attack had the force to launch her into the air, but it hadn’t the strength to daze the vixen. Smiling Renamon landed on all fours and, after taking a brief moment to look up, surged forward.

With increased strength came increased speed, and before Guardromon could really register what was going on Renamon was a few feet in front of him. Jumping and spinning, Renamon’s foot connected with Guardromon’s chest. Now, the previous time she had tried this move it had hurt her foot. Still, Renamon could only smile as she saw Guardromon’s metallic body give a little under her foot before the android digimon was sent crashing into a nearby tree.

“Whoa!!!” Kenta said, “Did you see that?”

“Ya, I saw it.” Kazu grumbled, fist shaking. “And I’m not about to let her get away with it. Guardromon, show Renamon who’s boss.”

Guardromon got back to his feet, feeling the spot where Renamon kicked him. “I did not want this sparring match when we began. But, now my honor as a fighter has been challenged, and I shall meet that challenge full force.”

Renamon grinned, spreading her arms out, “Well then, lets see what you got.”

“You asked for it.” Guardromon said, lighting the rockets on his back as he quickly lifted off the ground and charged at Renamon. The digital vixen waited until about the last moment before quickly dropping down below Guardromon. Then, after he had just passed over head, Renamon turned and grabbed Guardromon’s feet. After getting her footing Renamon actually made Guardromon come to a dead stop, even with his rockets firing.

“What the…?” Was all Guardromon could get out before Renamon shifted, swinging Guardromon and sending him flying straight up into the air. Then, with a forceful jump Renamon zipped up past Guardromon, getting above him before she spun around and brought the heel of her foot down on his stomach. This time, her foot left a medium sized dent and sent Guardromon crashing back to the ground.

“Oh, Guardromon, you okay buddy?” Kazu asked, Guardromon dazed after hitting the ground like a meteor.

“Yes, once you make the world stop spinning.”

“Don’t worry, he should fine. Guardromon’s been through worse.”

Kazu looked up at Renamon, glaring at her a bit. Kenta, however, was smiling as he went up to Renamon, lifting her arm up as he began to declare her the winner of the match like a true wrestling or boxing referee.

After getting a speech from Kazu about how Guardromon would wipe the floor with her the next time they fought, the boys left. Renamon watched them until they had fallen out of sight, and then with a pleasant smile on her face quickly made her way back to Rika’s house. The tamer was just finishing off the last of her homework for the evening when Renamon came in.

“So, where have you been?” Rika asked, glancing over her shoulder at her partner.

“Leaving a foot shaped dent in Guardromon’s stomach. Anything interesting happen at school?”

“Laid that pig headed girl Chunli out without breaking a sweat.”

The pair nodded, smiling. Oh ya, this was the way they liked it. The two didn’t flaunt their strength, but when it came down to it was nice to know that they didn’t have to worry about loosing a fight. Besides that, it was Rika’s firm opinion that she looked pretty darn good with some muscle definition, having admired herself in the bathroom mirror that morning.

“So, Henry wants to celebrate me giving Chunli a black eye so we’re heading to the movies. You going to come?”

“Is it a movie I would enjoy?”

“Probably not.”

“Then you can tell Henry I graciously decline his offer.”

Rika nodded, “Ya, I guessed as much.” About a half hour later, Rika was at the movies and Renamon was meditating on the roof as she did most nights, calming her mind after the day.

===============================================================

What will happen next?

Option 1: While Renamon is trying to meditate, she can’t get her fight with Guardromon out of her head. She had struggled long in the digital world to have this kind of strength, and now that she had it one thought kept bubbling up in her mind. She wants to be STRONGER.”



Option 2: New digimon have begun to appear in the city with the strange ability to stop the digimon from digivolving or the tamers doing a Biomerge. To keep defeating them, Rika and Renamon have to keep making their normal, everyday bodies stronger, more muscular, more powerful.
13221.title: The Mega Workout Potion

choices: Rika walks in.
She starts growing without the need to work out.
132211.content: "This strength... It's amazing!" she said to no one in particular. A thought popped into her head. How strong could she possibly get? Knowing that nobody was home, she went into the kitchen and picked up the container with the potion. Without a second thought, the fox-like Digimon began drinking it.
132211.title: Renamon wants more

choices: No, Rika takes revenge on Chunli
No, but unforseen side effects happen soon
Yes, but they've overdosed and now suffer side effects
133.content:
It was a week after that first incident did the pair finally find something. "Where did you find this again?" Rika asked her digimon.

"E-bay," Renamon replied. It was true, for the entire week, Renamon was searching the internet for ways to grow stronger quick. She came across this book in the cheap section of E-bay's books, "The Amazons spells and potions book."

"And you actually trust it?" Rika asked.

"Yes," Renamon said, "I believe it to be trustworthy."

"All right, let's see what we have here," Rika said, flipping through the pages. Inside were various spells or potions to enhance clothing, endurance, vitality, giving men a longer lasting time. But Rika's eyes came to a potion called the quick growth formula. According to the text in the book, it was used on accepted women to the Amazon clan. "Let's try this one," Rika said.

"All right, I'll get the ingredients," Renamon said. Renamon took the book and vanished.

"I'll go get a pot ready," Rika said.

After a few minutes, Renamon returned to the home. The pair started cooking. After an hour, Rika added the final ingredient. The potion went from a bright yellow to a dark blue.

"Do you want me to try it?" Renamon asked, "I'll know if it's dangerous to you."

"All right, but be careful," Rika said.

"Always," Renamon said. She took a teaspoon and dipped it into the potion. She pulled out a full spoon and drank the potion. All over her body, Renamon felt hot. She couldn't tell what was happening, only that it was.

Rika, however, saw something. Renamon's arms just puffed up like bread in an oven. It was small, but noticeable.

"It worked," Rika said, ladling the potion into two cups. Each cup was filled to the brim and neither girl dared to spill a drop. oth drank generously before putting the cups down. Both girls felt hot all over. To Renamon, this was a far more extreme heat than before. Due to her clothing, Rika could feel her new found body growing against her old clothes. Soon both girl grew several inches in height. Their arms and legs grew with massive muscles until both Rika was twice as big as Chunli. Rika stared at her ripped clothes.

"I'll say it worked," Renamon said, flexing her muscles, "Should we have some more or not?"
133.title: They find a potion...

choices: Yamaki calls, wanting to show off a new Digimon-enhancing gizmo...
One of the models, secretly a witch, gives them a potion...
Rika convinces her mother to pay for enhancements...
Rika & Renamon find a genie with a breast fetish...
Lactationmon, the breast-grower Digimon, attacks!
14.content:
=====================
Raigeki Studios...
Osaka, Japan...
=====================

For Rika's 16th birthday, she had decided to give her mother a present: She agreed to do some modelling. But there was a condition: Renamon had to be a part of the pictoral.

That was fine for the ecstatic Rumiko Nonaka, who felt she owed Renamon everything and then some for keeping Rika safe and strong all these years.

So, that day, they travelled over to Osaka, to Rumiko's favorite studio. As Rumiko arranged things with the manager of the studio, Rika and Renamon decided to look around, eventually spying a photo shoot taking place where a beautiful, huge-breasted woman was sauntering up and down a rampway, clad in a filmly, blue silk evening gown. Rika had to give the photographer credit. He was completely professional, didn't babble on about 'making love to the camera' as he took pictures of the model in various provocative poses.

Renamon just shook her head. "This looks ridiculous. We just pose and let some man take pictures of us?"

Rika nodded. "Basically. That's what modelling is; looking pretty for the camera so people can drool over how good you look."

Renamon snorted. "Ridiculous. This is one of the most shallow occupations I've ever heard of."

The photographer chuckled, having heard the whole conversation, and said, "I don't know about that. It may be shallow, but it pays well."

Renamon blushed, a little embarrassed that she had insulted the man's occcupation, and Rika laughed.

The photographer, a stocky black man with a light Jamaican accent, finished the shoot and thanked the model, who just snorted disdainfully. She straightened out her evening gown and stormed out of the room, shoving Rika aside roughly as her overside breasts jiggled and bounced from side to side with each step.

"Out of my way, B-cups," she muttered. Rika and Renamon both glared after her indignantly as she left. Renamon smirked wickedly, and said, "Say the word and I'll embed her head in the wall."

Rika snickered. "Nah. Her boobs are probably fake, and would pop under any pounding you give her. I don't want you to get silicone all over your fur."

Renamon looked a little startled, but mostly amused. "Humans can enhance their breasts? COMPLETELY ridiculous!"

Rika just shook her head, agreeing. Although she had to admit she was a little jealous of the model. After all, her breasts weren't all that impressive, although she more than made up for it in athletic good looks.

Rumiko, the studio's manager, and the photographer came out again, smiling.

"Okay, my dear. My name's Yoshihiro, and the one who'll be taking pictures of how good you look is named Jamal. You're going to be doing some swimsuit modelling. Is that all right?"

Rika pouted, and said, "Awww, I wanted to do nude modelling!"

Renamon giggled. Jamal smirked. Rumiko blanched. Yoshihiro just shook his head. "No, we don't do that here. There will be some topless shots, but you won't be completely exposed. Just shots with your arms over your chest, or with your partner blocking, or with your chest away from the camera. Okay?"

Rika thought about that for a moment, and nodded. Yoshihiro smiled, giving her a two-piece swimsuit, and directing her to the changing rooms.

She came out, her hair flowing down past her shoulders, and blushed slightly. "What do you think?"

"You look gorgeous, honey!" Rumiko gushed.

Renamon just smiled warmly, communication her approval wordlessly.

Jamal looked her over once, and smiled. "Fabulous. If you and your fox friend will come with me, please?"

Jamal led them both to a beach scene, and told them the first position to take.

All in all, the photo shoot went well. Jamal took around thirty pictures, using a whole role of film. The poses he had Rika and Renamon go through were all very tasteful, with only a few verging into mildly risque lesbian-esque situations. 15.content:
===========================================
A Digital Field outside Takato's bakery...
===========================================

You'd think, after Takato found the Digital Portal three weeks ago and brought the Digimon back to live with their partners, that they'd all be able to live together peacefully.

Get real.

Shortly after D-Reaper's defeat, 7 Demonic digimon lords, a Leviamon, a Belphemon, a Barbamon, a Lilithmon, a Daemon, another Beelzemon, and a Lucemon Chaos Mode had teamed up, trying to take over the Digital and Human worlds. The Sovereign could protect the Digital World, but the Tamers were left with the job of defending their world from almost daily attacks by lackies of these seven demons. And today, another attack was occuring.

Rika, on Kyubimon's back, came bounding into the Digital Field. Takato, Henry, Kazu, Kenta, Growlmon, Gargomon, Guardromon, and MarineAngemon were already there, looking around for the Digimon that was supposed to be here.

Kazu snorted as Rika hopped off of Kyubimon, who joined the others in searching.

"Nice of you to show up, your majesty."

Rika glared at him. "Kyubimon's fast, but not even she can get by rush hour traffic that fast. Where's Ryo?"

Takato shook his head. "He, Cyberdramon, Susie and Antylamon, and Beelzemon are all on the other side of town. Another Vikaralamon has appeared and they wanted to deal with that before it got into the city."

Rika nodded. A good ordering of priorities.

And besides, she wouldn't have to share credit with him on this defeat now.

"THERE!!" Kyubimon shouted, her superior senses picking up the Digimon before the others. Guardromon's scanners picked it up a moment later, and the image of the attacking Digimon, a clownlike, ball-shaped Digimon with a massive device with many metal coils on it, appeared on Kazu and Rika's D-Tectors.

"Inflatamon. Ultimate Level. Special Attack: Digi-Ballooner. Loves to inflate Digimon like Balloons," Rika said, reading off her D-Tector's listing of this Digimon. Kazu blinked.

"And this is one of the bad guys?!"

Rika shrugged. The gathered Tamers all slashed enhancement cards through their D-Tectors, and the powered up Digimon charged into the mist, attacks blazing.

About a minute later, Gargomon and MarineAngemon came floating back out, plugs in their mouths and their bodies bloated out into ball shapes.

"MARINEANGEMON!!!" Kenta wailed.

"Gargomon?! What the hell happened?!"

Gargomon giggled nervously and muttered something around the plug in his mouth that sounded like 'Moumentai.' He would have shrugged as well, but at that moment he was so bloated that his arms were stuck out at his sides.

Takato, Rika, and Kazu traded nervous looks, and ran deeper into the mist, where sounds of battle were still occuring.

They arrived just in time to see Inflatamon giggle, shooting out tubes into Growlmon and Kyubimon's mouths. Takato and Rika watched in horror as their two Digimon started to inflate, their bellies starting to bulge out, becoming immense as they struggled to get the tubes out of their mouths.

Guardromon snarled. "FIEND!! Let them go!!"

Inflatamon laughed. "HA! Never! In fact, you can join them!!"

He shot out a tube at Guardromon, forcing it into the robot's functioning equivalent of a mouth, and began to pump helium in...

Only to have Guardromon open a vent on his back, pumping it right back out again.

Inflatamon gulped nervously as Guardromon took aim, Kazu laughing and giving his partner a new attack.

"NEEDLE SPRAY!!" Guardromon shouted, firing his missiles, which exploded into a million cactus needles, popping Inflatamon and scattering his data.

Kyubimon and Growlmon gasped, the helium rushing out of them.

"WHEW! That was close, Takatomon!" Growlmon said, his voice squeaky from the helium.

"I'm just glad you're okay," he said, hugging the massive dinosaur, who just giggled cutely.

"Not bad, Kazu," Rika said, running off to check on Kyubimon. She had felt something from her as she deflated that bothered her. Kazu beamed, and went over to celebrate with Guardromon, who was doing a dance he saw on a football game.

Kyubimon coughed, and smiled at Rika. "You'll forgive me for not talking much, you understand," she said, her voice high and squeaky.

Rika smiled, and thought to her ~Okay then. Are you okay?~

Kyubimon sighed, and thought back. ~Honestly? I was kind of hoping to go all the way. I have a bit of a fantasy about being blown up like a balloon.~

Rika blinked, and shook her head in moderate amazement. ~Interesting.~

Henry came up to her, and told her about a meeting they wanted to have tomorrow to try and figure out the source of these attacks. Rika nodded as she helped Kyubimon stand up, bidding Henry goodbye.

Later on, at Rika's house, she was thinking long and hard about what Renamon said. She thought back to the battle, and how she felt Kyubimon bloat up through their mental link. Only now when she thought of it, it was accompanied by a slightly erotic shiver going up her spine. It was then that she made a descision.

"Renamon?"

The fox digimon appeared out of the mist, kneeling at Rika's side, a habit she had never been able to break.

"Yes, Rika?"

Rika smiled down at her partner. "You said you have a fantasy about being blown up like a balloon? How would you like to live it?"

Renamon's eyes widened, a slow smile spreading over her face.

"Do you mean it?"

Rika hugged her. "Of course I do. I want you to be happy! But I want to be blown up as well."

Renamon hugged her back, grinning widely. "Of course Rika! This will be wonderful, thank you so much!!"

And so they started to discuss how to go about their inflation...

Later that evening....
========================

Henry stared at the phone, shaking his head. "You... you're joking, right?"

Rika, on the other end of the line, shook her head. "Nope. Renamon apparently has some sort of fantasy about being inflated up like a balloon. She says that this attack today helped her realize she had it."

Henry shook his head. "This is soooo weird," he said, rubbing his temple.

Rika chuckled. "I know, I know. But she's my partner, and I like doing things for her."

Henry sighed, closing his eyes and leaning against his wall. "Is this some sort of sexual thing?"

Rika shrugged. "I don't know. But I'm planning on trying it out myself."

Henry's eyes popped open. "WHAT?!"

Rika rolled her eyes. "Relax, would ya? I'm not gonna take any chances and do this into the Digital World, where my body is Digital and most likely can expand safely."

Henry sighed. "I don't know about this..."

Rika chuckled. "Put yourself in my shoes, Henry. If it were Terriermon asking, would you do it for him?"

Henry smiled softly. "Okay. I'll look through my cards and see if I have some that could inflate you and Renamon. On one condition," he said, smirking.

Rika sighed. She guessed this was coming. "And that would be?"

Henry grinned. "I want pictures. Or better yet, a film of the whole thing."

Rika rolled her eyes, chuckling. "You men are all alike."

"That we are. So is it a deal?"

Rika laughed. "Yeah, okay okay. We'll see you tomorrow. Later Henry," she said, hanging up the phone.

1511.content:
Rika and Renamon waited anxiously for Henry to call them back, hopefully carrying some good news. Finally, the next morning the call came through, Henry asking the pair to stop by his families apartment. No sooner had Rika hung up the phone before Renamon had scooped her up, disappearing into the shadows as she carried her tamer across town in an instant.

"Wow, you two don't waist anytime." Henry said when he opened his door a few minutes later, letting Rika and Renamon step inside.

"You can thank Renamon. She swept me off my feet as soon as I set the phone down. I didn't even get to grab my shoes."

"Well come into my room. I've got the cards ready" Henry said, motioning towards the red haired tamer and her digital partner. As the trio walked Renamon looked around, noticing that the apartment seemed rather empty.

"Henry, where is your family and Terriermon?"

"Dad and Mom are at work, my brother's at a friends studying, my older sister took Suzie, Lopmon, and Terriermon to the park. I told them I would be along once I finished up a few things I was working on."

"I guess handing me and Renamon a bunch of inflation based cards would have drawn some unwanted attention."

Henry nodded, smiling weakly as he opened his bedroom door, "That's about it." With that Henry, Rika, and Renamon stepped into Henry's room. Little had changed about the teenaged Henry's room except for the simple fact that his computer set up had doubled in size. Taking up one entire wall his computer sat opposite the bed, at least a dozen computers humming and working together on some mysterious task.

"I never knew you were such a geek Henry." Rika joked, drawing a cold glare from Henry before he went over to his cluttered desk and picked up a stack of twenty cards that were rubber banded together. He handed the cards to Rika, and mindlessly the tamer looked down at the cards and saw they didn't look like official cards.

"First, I'm going to say there are only a few cards in the entire digimon trading card game that deal with what you two are interested in. Of those cards I had none so I called up an old friend and got him to bring the cards by so I could copy them. Otherwise, I was forced to make most of those calls myself."

"You made them?" Renamon said, slightly surprised.

Henry nodded, "Yeah, I've been working with my father on something for Yamachi. It's supposed to let use create the kind of cards we can use in battle. The program is still very basic, but I was able to use it to place a code on the metallic strips of those cards. They work like any normal card, and they each have a printed description on them. They just don't have a picture and some of the other flashy things."

"Just tell me this, are you sure they'll work?" Rika asked, holding the cards up beside Henry's face.

"Positive. I've even included a card to get you two to and from the digital world, since that's where you were intending to do all this. Also, there is a reset card at the bottom of that stack, so you can get back to normal before you come back to the real world."

Rika smiled, taking the cards and slipping them into her pocket, "Thanks for thinking ahead Henry. Well, we'll see you around." With that Rika and Renamon turned to leave, but before they stepped out of Henry's bedroom the blue hair tamer tapped Rika on the shoulder. Rika turned, raising an eyebrow as she asked, "What?"

"Aren't you forgetting something?" Henry mentioned, reaching over to his desk and picking up a small, video camera. Rika rolled her eyes, remembering the deal she had made with Henry. Boy's and their one track minds. Still, if it hadn't been for Henry she wouldn't have been able to do anything to help Renamon live her fantasy. So, with a quick snatch Rika took the camera, saying a quick goodbye to Henry before she and Renamon left, returning to the house.

Once at the house, Rika and Renamon stood in the front yard, Renamon watching anxiously as Rika flipped through the cards Henry had given her. There were some basic ones, some digimon cards like one for Inflatamon, and some other that made Rika blush a little, surprised at what Henry had come up with. Still, slipping out the transportation card Rika swiped it, and in a flash she and Renamon had disappeared from the yard, reappearing in the
